campaign.story:
Introducing Froggo's Adventures Interactive Enamel Pin Collection✨
Hi there, I go by Pinnovating! 
I’ve been making pins for about 3 years now! You may find some of my previous projects on here as well as on my Instagram! @pinnovating

Want to follow along with Froggo? 
Click HERE! (for more Froggo!)

I’m so happy to introduce my beloved Froggo & Friends pin concepts & finally bring them to life! 

Project info:
Each Goal Tier SET  will unlock the freebies along with the pin. For example 1 "pin" tier also unlocks all the freebies that come with it. Each TIER SET  you pledge for gives you EVERYTHING that's part of that set! You can pick from any of the unlocked Tier Sets! Want to match with a bestie? Sure you can pick 2 of the same tiers! But I won't be able to mix and match the unlockables!  You will have the opportunity to add specific ones after the campaign is over in the "add-ons" section of the survey!

Each Froggo Adventure comes with it's own Story! These are the tales of young Froggo and Snail going out on an adventure to solve some mysteries and expeditions!! These will be KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE! SO DON'T MISS OUT!!

 *Every backer will receive one free small pin board! * (One of the unlockable freebies from the first Tier!)

Raffle Prizes:
For everyday you're part of the project you will be entered in a RAFFLE GIVEAWAY! The prizes will be announced after the campaign is over from the unlocked selection, including pins and the freebies! The winners will be announced daily! Your backer number will be your raffle ticket! Only participating backers can be winners.

Froggo's Adventures Limited Edition Pin Designs:
***These are Digital Mockups and final Design colors may vary ever so slightly due to the screen color differences***
 Freebies will be announced in the "Updates" section! Stay tuned!
My previous projects:
PLAY

PLAY

PLAY

Project & Risks:
I’ve experienced many difficulties with manufacturers in the past, luckily with time I have been able to get more experience under my belt and have learned how to handle tough situations and approach problems with effective solutions. I currently run a monthly pin patreon with over 60 members!

Delays can happen!! This industry is a very finicky one. Please be understanding of the process, I communicate most efficiently on Discord. I've been doing nearly daily to weekly updates so please join us there if you'd like to be super hands on with the project! But Ks will mostly be for just major news and updates!

The pins will come in matching packaging (also great for gifts!) Packaged individually for extra security. All pins will have 2 pin backs attached to them as well as a backstamp (with the exception of the mini gatchas).  All boxes will be shipped via USPS First Class, which includes tracking.
Thank you for taking the time to check out my Froggo Project! He is a very loved Character of mine, inspired by the challenges we face to bring positivity and change into our lives. Did know thats what frogs symbolize? Google it! It’s worth checking out!
I hope froggo brings you as much happiness and care as he does for me! Have a wonderful day!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There may always be the possibility of challenges along the way, if anything were to be of concern I will notify you to take the best course of action together.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Last of the Raffle Winners! AND FAQS
updates.update_content:
WE DID IT!!!!
Thank you guys so so much for backing Froggo's and Snail's Adventures!
There's actually a lot more I have in store for this project! If you've been following along on discord you probably know some of the little secrets and gems we have planned for this little adventure pack!

It was brought to my attention the code doesn't work if you don't use add ons!
Bigcartle wont allow me to change this setting, when I'd tested this prior it seemed to work just fine! I apologize for any confusion!

For anyone who doesn't want add ons it seems I will have to stick with the surveys through Kickstarter, Please allow a few hours for those to go out!

Thank you for your patience!! Lots of updates! HERE WE GO:

Update 1. Surveys:
Here are the directions for doing the surveys!! Below check out the step-by-step guide to find the answers to do the survey correctly!

Hey guys I am hosting a popshop live event where I will be doing the raffle spin the wheel and chatting about pinnovating as a whole! The surveys will launch right after the event is over!

It starts today at 6:30 pm mountain time!
https://pinnovating.carrd.co/

Hey froggo friends!
I've had the surveys pretty much done since before my move but I needed to clarify some add ons with a manus I was working with. I had put in a little coin purse/small zipper bag sample into production late march/early april to hold/carry froggo masks (I am also working on). The coin purse manu didn't put my order through and I'd been waiting for an update for sometime now. Unfortunately they had not worked on this product all this time and so I am moving forward without this piece. This has been the major hold up for the add ons side of the surveys.

Hi everyone! Thank you guys for your patience!! My fiance’s work transfer finally was accepted, we’ve been looking forward to it the past few months! It fianlly went through! We have less than a month to pack and get going (although it is ok as we were anticipating this!) We are relocating from Cali to Colorado! So your patience means a great deal, after today we should be all caught back up!!

RAFFLE WINNERS!! DAYS 5-7!

Sorry for the delay! It was a really good, but long day! I recieved my pin club pins today and getting ready for a move! 
(I’m having trouble uploading vids on to KS today, but you can see the raffle drawings on my stories and I’ve linked the video of the spinner below!)

Winners for day 3:

Day 2! I’ve devided that from now on I will be doing 3 winners daily! Until the very last day! Best of luck eveyone!🍀🍀

For those that joined us today, starting tommorrow you’ll be entered in the raffles til the end of the campaign!

project_data.project_name: Froggo Adventure's Interactive Enamel Pin Series

campaign.story:
Hello! We're Evan and Josh, lifelong quirky board gamers and general mischief makers. You might know us as the creators of Puns of Anarchy and Charty Party, both games we've previously Kickstarted and are now real live things.
We love words.  And while beautiful sentences have a time and place, it's the bizarre and terrible writing (usually found on the internet) that's our favorite. From nonsensical Facebook posts to unhinged Craigslist ads,  we can't get enough.
But, unless you're in the middle of a heated Youtube debate, crafting a hilariously terrible sentence can be tough. That's why we made Ransom Notes: a game that gives you no choice but to create awesomely horrendous sentences to get your point across.
We wanted to make a party game that would be playable over and over, and be totally unique every round. We've playtested dozens of times, and the only things that've stayed constant are hilarious, tears-streaming-down-your-face funny sentences people come up with.
We love this game concept, but only get to produce it with your support. So, please help us bring Ransom Notes to life! 
Thanks,
Evan + Josh
Meet our Stretch Goals!
We've been amazed by the support for Ransom Notes so far, and we want to make the game even better! 
UNLOCKED!
If we can get to $160,000 raised, we'll be able to include 200+ more word magnets (for a total of 800+) in each game. These will include some of our favorite words to play with, from "bulbous" to "innards!"

UNLOCKED!
If we can get to $75,000 raised, we'll be able to include five extra "Roast the Judge" cards so you can make fun of your friends with word magnets right to their face.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Since launching our first game, Charty Party, and our second game, Puns of Anarchy, we've learned a ton about card game production and have a fantastic relationship with our game manufacturer. We've just completed our fifth print run of Charty Party and have a great understanding of the timeline and logistics for getting games produced, shipped, warehoused, and sent to your door. But, creating a game with word magnet tiles was new to us, so we're working hand in hand with our manufacturer to make sure the components are all high quality and long lasting.

It's also really important to us that everyone gets their games on time. We were able to stick to a quick delivery timeline with our last games, and we plan to do the same with this one. That's the reason we've decided not to include lots of gimmicks or custom reward elements, since they can really muck up timely production. And, even though the current pandemic situation has affected supply chains everywhere, we've been in constant communications with our manufacturing and fulfillment partners to do our best to ensure we can deliver on time despite new uncertainties. As always, we'll keep all backers up to date on the production with frequent, transparent updates.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: While Ransom Notes is printing... here's a discount on our other games!
updates.update_content:
Hey Ransom Noters,
Production is running right on schedule for your favorite word magnet-based game, but waiting is still never fun!
To say thanks for your patience, we're offering an exclusive discount to all our Kickstarter backers on our other two hit games, Puns of Anarchy and Charty Party.
Puns of Anarchy

Hey everyone,
Hope you're having a great week — we know we are! We just received the first production sample of Ransom Notes, and we're loving the look. Check it out:

updates.update_userinfo: Starting the Production Process with Ransom Notes!
updates.update_content:
Hey Ransom Noters,
Hope you're off to a great week! We've been hard at work with our manufacturer checking print files and production techniques, and we're really happy with where we've ended up. Word magnet tiles were a new challenge for us, so we're taking extra care to make sure all the die cuts are correct and the magnets will match other standard size sets in case you want to mix and match.

updates.update_userinfo: Ransom Notes Next Steps + International Backer Options
updates.update_content:
Hi Kickstarter folks,
We've said it a lot but we'll keep saying it — you guys are amazing, and there really is nothing cooler than having a concept we were playing with virtual sticky notes six months ago now be gearing up for a mass print run! 
Believe it or not, despite both living in Memphis, your favorite game creators Josh and Evan haven't been able to play a tabletop game together in a full year (including Ransom Notes!) due to COVID precautions. Now both vaccinated, we were able to get together for the first time last week and play, and it was made all the better knowing we had the support of nearly 5,000 people!

updates.update_userinfo: We hit our Stretch Goal + Surprise Design Upgrade!
updates.update_content:
Hi Ransom Noters,
We've had our faces glued to our computer screens, because something incredible happened: we hit our $160,000 Stretch Goal! We're so excited to be able to add 200+ more word magnets to the game, and it's all thanks to you.
There's one more surprise bonus, too: we've been working with an incredible designer who was able to help us tweak the box design a bit to really bring out the "magazine cutout" theme that Ransom Notes brings to mind (thanks to all that suggested that!)

updates.update_userinfo: New Stretch Goal: We Want to Add 200+ More Word Magnets!
updates.update_content:
Hey Ransom Noters,
We're so blown away by all the enthusiasm for this game, and we've been in lots of talks with our manufacturer about how we can make it even better.
Exciting news: we've run the numbers, and if we can get to $160,000 raised, we can upgrade the game from 600 word magnets to over 800!

Hi creative people,
Wow — there are few things more exciting than seeing a bunch of people rally around a fun idea, and we're so grateful for all the support and new backers we're seeing every day! We've achieved our Stretch Goal, too, meaning we'll be adding in five new "Roast the Judge" cards to the game.
We can't wait for you to try this game, but in the meantime, we wanted to share some of our playtesters' recent favorite rounds:

updates.update_userinfo: Thank you! We're over 500% funded and almost to our first Stretch Goal!
updates.update_content:
Hey future Ransom Noters,
Whoa — as much fun as we had designing this game, we didn't dream it would be this enthusiastically received: we're 530% funded and it's only Day 5! You guys are amazing.
With all this support, we think we can make the game even better with our first Stretch Goal. If we can raise $75,000, we'll be able to add in five more "Roast the Judge" cards that let you use word magnets to make fun of your friends right to their face:

project_data.project_name: Ransom Notes: The Ridiculous Word Magnet Game

campaign.story:
WELCOME!
Hi everyone and welcome to another collab project!
I've grouped up with some talented artists to bring you these amazing designs that are based off the Chinese Zodiac. 
Each design is unique and designed by a different artist! We are hoping to be able to unlock ALL 12 designs by the end of the campaign.  

ABOUT THE PINS
Hard enamel 
Approximately 1.25-1.60 inches wide
Two rubber clutches
Gold plated
"Lunar Buddies" back stamp
Gold foil backing cards
The omamori part of the pins will be exactly the same size which will make the pins themselves vary in size due to the small features extending outside the omamori. 
These pins are KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE and will not be remade! All left over pins will be sold by the original artist that designed them so you will not be able to combine shipping if you would like to purchase the set. 




Backing card mockup designed by TheKittenBomb - Tiger designed by _kevuma ( NOT TO SCALE )
STRETCH GOALS
$3900- Free Omamori Pin for all 12 pin backers! 
$4300 - mini pins/board fillers 

HOW DOES KICKSTARTER WORK?
**Short form** Kickstarter is a all or nothing crowdfunding platform and you will only be charged at the end of the campaign and ONLY if it is funded. **
Once launched the Kickstarter will run for 20 days total. During the 20 days we will raise the funds to unlock all the designs. Your credit card will not be charged at this time.
At the end of the 20 days and ONLY if the project is fully funded your credit card will be charged. A survey will be sent out for you to choose which type of omamori you would like as well as state if you have any add-ons.
It takes Kickstarter 2-3 weeks to finalize funds and deposit it into the account. Once payment is clear, products will be purchased , manufactured and shipped

SHIPPING
For this Kickstarter, the default shipping will be as follows:
 Canada: $3 (Canada Post letter mail / untracked / 2-14 days)
 USA: $6 ( USPS First class mail / tracked / 2-4 days)
 International: $8 ( POST NL / tracked/ 4-75 days)
Want to add tracking to your package? You can do so at the end of the campaign! Please note that there will be additional costs and are as follows:
 Canada: $9 extra ( $12 for tracked using Chitchats / Canada Post / 2-14 days)
 An Important Note for UK Backers 
Due to the new regulations regarding VAT that started January 1st, 2021, all UK residents' have a different process to support this KS and get these super cool pins! All UK residents will need to pledge to this KS by pledging to the $1 place holder on this campaign. After the KS is funded I will be sending over an ETSY link for you to purchase your order. Pin, VAT and shipping will be gathered at that time ( minus $1 ) 
Shipping on other tiers for UK residents have been set to $100 to prevent people from pledging. If you happen to pledge to a regular tier and you are a UK resident you will be asked to change your pledge to the UK $1 tier. 

FUNDS BREAKDOWN
65% of the cost goes to production - getting the pins made.
20% goes towards shipping
10% goes to Kickstarter/Processing Fees
5% Packaging

SCHEDULE
Feb 23rd - Mar 15th - KS start/end
March 29th - Funds released
March 30th -April 20th - Pin production
April 27th - pins arrive
April 27th - May 4th - Pins shipped out
These are all approximate dates and may change.

ARTISTS & SOCIAL MEDIA LINKS
Missdoodlesalot
Dressy_Deer
SiopaoCheekss
Kiranfreak 
_Kevuma 
TheKittenBomb 
Anezi.animates 
Scribblezwithsquigglez 
Kalbunn 
Starlidae 
Marinaxstudios  
Yuzbunni
 Akihari_Chiko

Thank you so much for your patience and support!

Hi everyone!
Thank you so much for your patience!
It seems like we're a little behind schedule with production. The mini pins are finished production but the large pins are still being worked on. 
Here's a little production photo for the horse design! 
I'll post more update when I receive them.

Hi everyone!
Sorry for the delay in updates! <3 I got a photo to share! <3
The blanks are finished and just need to be filled! We have over 1300 pins being made so it is taking a bit longer than estimated ><
We only see 10 here but don't worry the other designs are also in production <3

Hi again!
Just a small update!
I have received Kickstarter funds and I have confirmed the order with the manufacturer!

I'll ask the manu for progress photos so keep a look out for another update in a couple weeks <3

HI everyone!
We can't express how happy we are that we were able to fund all the pin designs, add the cat design plus the extra add-ons! It's been such a fun experience and we're extremely thankful for all the love and support we've received during this campaign. 

Surveys will up this week so everyone can choose which pins and stickers they would like.

Hi again and thank you for all the continued support ! We're super excited that we've funded these pins + more !
We've reach the funding goal for our mini pins and washi tape!!
These can be added from the add-on menu!! 
At this time we don't have any additional stretch goals but I am brainstorming what other goodies we can make for everyone! <3

Hi again!! Sorry for all the updates!
I just wanted to let y'all know that we unlocked our special 13th pin in the series! We were going to do a sneak peek but the goal just kinda happened haha.

Hi everyone!
Thank you again for you support!
After some recalculations of funding and goals we are actually able to reduce the full funding amount from $4200 to $3600cad!! This is due to many of you pledging for more than one pin!! Thank you! <3

Hi everyone!
I wanted to thank everyone for your continued support! I'm so happy we were able to reach the goal for 6 designs in 12 hours!! 
We do have a fair bit to go to be able to get the remaining 6 designs but I am hopeful! <3

project_data.project_name: Lunar Buddies Omamori Enamel Pin Collection

campaign.story:
Hello!!
My name is Malisa, the creator, and designer of these cute enamel pins!
In September of 2020, I casually picked up roller skating as a hobby but little did I know how much I would fall in love with the sport and its community. 

Thus I came up with the idea to illustrate cute animal buddies, having a bit of a difficult time on skates! The reason I wanted to capture them freaking out is that we often see roller skaters looking super poised and smooth, but falling and tripping over oneself is just as much part of the experience. And I wanted to celebrate that.

My hope is that this project will make you guys laugh and celebrate the not so classy ways we fall over! Because the best part is getting back up and doing it all over again!

 The pins are priced at $10 for early bird specials, $11 for Kickstarter exclusive price, and $13 after the Kickstarter ends.

Extra Details!
Pledge now, pay later. You won't be charged until the end of the campaign, and only if the initial goal is funded
After the campaign ends, I will send you a survey to fill in to choose which buddy you would like to take home! This is also where you give me postal details etc.
Amend or cancel your pledge at any time until the project ends!
Cost Breakdown
Pin Production: 72%
Shipping / Packaging: 18%
Kickstarter Taxes: 10%

UNLOCKED!!
UNLOCKED!!
UNLOCKED!!
UNLOCKED!
UNLOCKED!

UNLOCKED!!
UNLOCKED!
Jan 25st, 2021: Kickstarter launch
Feb 24th, 2021: Kickstarter ends
Feb 27th, 2021: Backer survey sent out
March 5th, 2021: Kickstarter releases money, Pins ordered
April 1st, 2021: Pins Arrive
April 15th, 2021: Pins are ready to be sent out! : D 
All pins are available on my website
There may be a slight change in design for details because of mold capabilities, but those changes will be updated as soon as I can after I communicate with the manufacturers.  The color (monitor color vs enamel colors) and the thickness of the lines (mold limitations) may differ in the final product.
With enamel pins, there is no guarantee that all the pins I receive will be perfect or with little flaws (A grade). I will only be sending out A grade pins to my backers, and if my manufacturer does not make me enough A-grade pins, I will have to request them to remake the pins, which will increase shipping times. I will be quality checking every pin to make sure that only the best goes out to the backers.
All domestic mails will be sent with tracking. However, there is always a risk that a package will get lost/stolen. If this happens, please PM me and we can work something out.
All international mails run a risk that it may get lost. I am charging higher shipping so that all the packages are tracked, but I cannot guarantee that they will arrive on time. If the packages never arrive, please PM me and we can work something out. I highly suggest that international backers pledge in groups to reduce shipping costs!
If you have any questions, please reach out to me!
Website: www.malisasuchanya.com
Instagram: @lisabanana
Email: malisa.suchanya@gmail.com

Thank you so much for taking the time to check out my first ever Kickstarter project and I hope you decide to back these adorable pins! I'm so excited to see these cuties in real life! 

So much Love,
Malisa Suchanya

campaign.story:
Behind every great latte art are thousands of shitty latte art from practice. In the spirit of these "shitty" latte arts, I'm making 100 (Make 100!) enamels pins of each of these shitty animal latte arts! I hope these make you laugh like it made me laugh as I drew them (we all need some laughs these days). Go grab yourself a latte, and enjoy these pins. :)
The initial goal of $900 includes three pins (Cat, Frog, and Rabbit). The pins are priced at $8 for earlybird, and $10 for kickstarter exclusive price. Stickers will be a stretch goal! Pins will be priced at $12 after the kickstarter ends!
(money not taken out until Feb 5th so pledge now!!)
(NOTE: UK Backers will be refunded due to the VAT, but these pins will be available via etsy in the future. For those who funded this project, I will send them a discount code to honor the kickstarter price).

I will be ordering these pins from overseas, so there is a chance that the pins might be delayed. However, I have done 2 kickstarters previously, and I have frequently ordered from abroad.

campaign.story:
Hello! This is MindytheTurtle, and I am excited to debut my Fuzzy Buzzin' Bumblebee enamel pin collection! This is my first kickstarter, so my nerves are definitely buzzing about.
What started out as some adorable spontaneous bumblebee ideas and sketches quickly turned into the foundation for this collection. I have awlays loved adroable fuzzy bumblebees and thought others might too. Initially, I was planning on having the collection be surrounded with adorable bumblebees being lovey-dovey, but some of the ideas I had later on were too much fun to not include like "Bee-were"!

As with all kickstarters, this is an all-or-nothing crowdfunding platform which allows creators to generating funding through pledges. No charges will be processed until the project is 100% funded. Please note that the project funded amount is for the first enamel pin, Bee Cheer. This means that if a pin you're hoping for might not be unlocked even if the project is funded. I do hope that all the stretch goals are unlocked, so I can bring this whole collection to life!

If a country you live in is not listed for shipping, please contact me!
**Due to the changes in VAT for the UK, I won't be able to ship to the UK via kickstarter. This is because I'm not registered for VAT, and with Kickstarter, they leave the responsibility to the creator. However, if you would love to support my project, please check out my etsy listing.

If you would love to see more of  my work, please check out my twitter and instagram!
January 12, 2021: Project is launched
February 11, 2021: Project end and surveys are sent out.
Mid-Late February, 2021: Kickstarter transfer funds and all pins are ordered
February to April: Pins are in production
April: Pins arrive! Quality control over pins begins.
May: Items will be shipped out!
There may be delays in shipping due to the pandemic.
Domestic (USA) - All parcels within the US will receive tracking number once the orders are shipped.
International - International packages might not have a tracking number available to ensure that shipping costs are kept low for international backers. Packages rarely get lost in the mail, but if it does happen, please reach out to me.
Thank you for your support and pledges! I am excited to create this project with fluffy bumblebees, but I wouldn't be able to do this without all of your support. And if you're just stopping by to look, thank you for taking time out of your day to do so!

With much love,
MindytheTurtle
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Colours:
- Colours may appear different in real life to how they appear on the screens.
- It isn't possible to achieve 100% colour accuracy because pantones are mixed individually and by hand. I will work with the manufacturer to ensure that the colours turn out well.

Design:
- There might be minor changes to the design based on manufacturer's capabilities. This will most likely reflect on the small areas.

Delivery:
- Since there is a pandemic and holidays are coming, there might be delays in delivery and original estimated production time. I will post any updates I receive from the manufacturer.
- I have added a little bit of wiggle room to include delays, but if the pins need to be remade, it will impact on the delivery date. My biggest concern is quality over speed.
- Please note, there won't be any returns due to delays in delivery.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello everyone!
According to my record, there are 23 pledges left for me to package and ship out. I'll be dedicating my time tonight and tomorrow to package them and ship them out on Monday! Thank you all for your patience since I know the pins took longer than I initially anticipated.

If anyone wants to order the leftover bee pins, I will be reopening my etsy shop on Monday, 6/28/2021 around 3 PM PST.

updates.update_userinfo: Update: Locking Shipping Addresses on June 9th
updates.update_content:
Hello everyone!

Hope you're still well!
Some updates for earrings! They're super adorable and tiny, and all the details on them can be easily seen. They're going to be soft enamel due to their sizing, and currently, I'm waiting on pictures of a sample with epoxy on them to see how they turn out. If they look good, I'll most likely continue to have epoxy for all the earrings. According to my manufacturer, the epoxy should be able to withstand water just fine. The manufacturer recommended that if you go swimming with them, please clean them after your swim.

updates.update_userinfo: Update: Pins have been shipped and shipping address confirmation
updates.update_content:
Are you guys tired of me yet?
So good news! More updates on the pins!!
Currently, I have received pictures of 3 mini pins and Bee Mine. I have approved of the sample for Mini Beeloved, Mini Bumble, and Bee Mine, but was concerned about the colour of the flower for Mini Busy Bee. However, my manufacturer has sent me additional pictures cleaned up, in different lighting, and next to the pantone book. It looks a lot better in the new lighting, so I approved it as well.

Hello everyone!
I just wanted to update you that the artwork proofs for the pins are being made! After I approve the proofs, the manufacturer will be creating the molds! I'll definitely be asking for pictures as the pins are being made, so everyone can have a little behind-the-scene sneak peek!!

campaign.story:
Welcome to my tasty Kickstarter project! My name is Tracy, and I'm the creator of a small business called Atomik Cupcake Designs--I make kawaii accessories such as stickers, jewelry, keychains, and of course, enamel pins! This will be my 5th enamel pin Kickstarter project, and I'm really excited to share it with everyone! To have a look at the finished products of our past work, visit our shop here!

This collection of designs was actually influenced by my mother (how fitting!), who told me that she thought animal cookies would make great pin designs. It always weirded me out that these delicious cookies came in such obscure shapes, so when designing them, I tried to make them a more recognizable and give them a bit more personality. I also swapped out the traditional camel shape for an alpaca, because why not? =D

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR UK BACKERS:
Due to new VAT collection laws, I am unfortunately unable to take UK pledges on this Kickstarter, and all UK pledges will be refunded at the end of the campaign. If you are from the UK and want to back these pins, please use these links to pre-order on our Etsy page:

 Animal Cookies Pins: https://www.etsy.com/listing/954546775/kawaii-animal-cookies-soft-enamel-pins 
 Inflatable Shaker Charm: https://www.etsy.com/listing/954551593/kawaii-animal-inflatable-bag-shaker 
 Heart Filler Pins: https://www.etsy.com/listing/940605160/kawaii-heart-shaped-cookie-mini-pin 
Learn more about all of the tasty designs below!
Each of the four pin designs comes in the two traditional pink and white cookie colors! Because we wanted to dye the metal for these, our designs are soft enamel with an epoxy coating, with sprinkle details printed on top of the epoxy! Each pin measures between 1.5 and 1.75 inches on its longest side. They each have a backstamp of the Atomik Cupcake Designs logo, as well as two backing posts and pink rubber clutches.

These goodies have been added as stretch goals outside of the main design! All of these extras have been unlocked!
 Freebie rewards are compounded,  so higher tiers will get all of the rewards of the tiers before it! Those who pledged for a shaker charm or heart filler pin/earring set will receive both the glitter and cupcake sticker as freebies!

How add-ons work: If you'd like to add extra sticker sheets, filler pins, or keychains, just add that additional amount to your pledge. When surveys are sent via Backerkit, you'll have the option of choosing which rewards you pledged for!
 Project Launch: January 12
 Project End: February 5
 Production Begins: Middle/end of February
 Rewards Shipped: mid/late April
Thank you so much for checking out our Kickstarter campaign! If you'd like to follow us and see what other cool stuff we've made, click the links below!

 Website: www.atomikcupcakedesigns.com 
 Instagram: www.instagram.com/atomikcupcakedesigns 
 Facebook: www.facebook.com/atomikcupcakedesigns 
 TikToK: www.tiktok.com/@atomikcupcakedesigns
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I have now successfully created over two dozen enamel pin designs, most of which have been funded with the help of Kickstarter! As a result, I have gained valuable experience in understanding not only how to manage a Kickstarter campaign, but about manufacturer standards, quality control, and how much time it really takes for pins to be made.

There is always the risk of factory mishaps which can delay the progress of a Kickstarter. These can include pins that have the wrong color, a high defect rate that requires a reorder, shipping delays, and other issues that can delay the production of pins. I've done my best to anticipate that sometimes these things happen (especially considering how crazy this year has been due to COVID), and I have set my delivery date accordingly to allow for PLENTY of time to get these all out to you!

Backers will be notified every step of the way on whether we're ahead of schedule, on schedule, or delayed, so there will be no surprises!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Enamel pins are made of a combination of hard enamel and plated metal. They are designed to be worn for a VERY long time, and they can be a part of your collection for many years to come!
Sustainable Distribution
Last project, Atomik Cupcake Designs switched from using plastic bags to recyclable glassine ones to protect our enamel pins during transit! When we use boxes, we've also switched from using plastic to using recyclable kraft boxes with eco-friendly, recyclable synthetic cotton linings!

updates.update_content:
OH MY GOD GUYS, I finally finished it. xD I'm sorry it took me ages--in the future, I now know what it'll take to send out 300 orders at once and will be much more prepared for it! This was by and far my most successful project, so thank you all for your patience while I learned!

ALL Animal Cookies rewards have been shipped out as of today! Some of you have e-mailed me for tracking numbers, and if this is something you would like, you may continue to message me on here, on Instagram, or e-mail me at atomikcupcake@hotmail.com!

Hey everyone! I just wanted update you that pin rewards have begun shipping! I'm about 20% through all rewards--please bear with me as I'm only one person, but I'm doing my best to be speedy. 😂 I started out sending individual tracking numbers, but it was a cumbersome process, so if you would like to be notified of your reward shipping and would like a tracking number, please contact me and I'll do that for you!
I also wanted to share a couple more pictures, for those who don't follow me on IG and may not have seen them!

HURRAY. The pins arrived to me yesterday--there are a lot of them. =D I haven't looked through all of them yet, but the ones I've seen look beautiful! I LOVE that the screenprinting on the outside of the epoxy makes a little shadow on the enamel underneath, it makes the sprinkles look 3D!

Here's a sneak peek at some of our awesome goodies!
I love them so much! There are so many...😅 Here's a little video and some pictures!

The die-cut circus performer stickers have arrived! These were available as a pack in the add-ons store...but don't worry, they'll also be available individually with free shipping if you didn't see these sooner, or if you're just interested in one or two designs!

updates.update_userinfo: Non-pin rewards sent, pins are on the way!
updates.update_content: AHHHH, I'M SO EXCITED. Some of the cookies already have their sprinkles on, and they look absolutely adorable. =D Here are a couple manufacturer photos (the pink one's a bit blurry, sorry!)--here we have both color bears and the unicorn!

Good news! My manufacturer sent me some progress photos of the pins today, and I am SO EXCITED. They look good enough to eat! Here's a couple shots (minus the sprinkles of course, as those are screenprinted on last)!

campaign.story:
Thank you for visiting my  “Kitties Need To Chill - Hard Enamel Pins” Kickstarter campaign! I am Catherine, the artist behind Walnut and Clam! This is my fifth hard enamel pin Kickstarter, and just like all my previous campaigns, this one is also inspired by my love for cats! The year 2020 is almost over (finally!!), and I am sure that this has been a challenging year for many of us. To be honest with you, the kitties and I are both feeling a little exhausted. So, I designed this set of pins to remind myself and hopefully anyone else who sees them, that it is okay to take a break and chill. I hope you like this set of pins, and thank you so much for your support!

Pledge now and pay later! This means that you will have plenty of time to change your pledge throughout the campaign (in this case 18 days)! Your payment will only be processed at the end of the campaign when it is successful. A survey will then be sent to all backers, where you can pick your rewards!

By pledging for this Kickstarter, not only that you will be the first one to receive items from my new series, but you will also be paying a lower price for them!!! If there are any leftover items, they will be sold at my Etsy store at a higher price. 


These are gold-plated hard enamel pins with the "Walnut And Clam" logo at the back. There will be one or two back posts depending on the design, which will be determined during the manufacturing stage. All pins come with a backing card.
The initial goal for this KS is $400 CAD, and that will unlock our first pin, "The Cloud Watcher"! Both colour variants will be unlocked at $400 CAD! The remaining designs are available as stretched goals, and they will be unlocked as each goal is reached!

The acrylic charms measures around 1.5" to 2" depending on the design.

The stickers measure around 1.5" - 2" depending on the design. Sticker pack comes with seven stickers (six of the original design + rainy day kitty freebie sticker)!

Backers will receive freebies on top of what they have pledged!
(1) All backers will receive a random freebie sticker from this series.
(2) The first 20 backers who pledged for this campaign will receive a sticker pack that includes all the stickers from this series!
(3) Pin backers who pledged for two or more pins will receive the Cat-us freebie pin once it is unlocked at $2000 CAD.
(4) Early bird four pins tier backers (15 spots) will get a freebie sticker pack!
(5) New! - Upon unlocking the new stretch goal (Rainy Day Kitty), all backers will receive a Rainy Day Kitty freebie sticker. If you ordered a sticker pack, the freebie sticker will be added to your sticker pack instead!

The following ADD-ONS are available! Please use the new Add-On Page when making your pledge! 
Additional sticker $1 CAD 
Additional sticker pack $6 CAD
Additional acrylic charm $10 CAD
Additional "Cat-us" filler pin $11 CAD
Additional pin $15 CAD or $13 CAD for early bird only


Nov 24 - Kickstarter launched and will run for 18 days.
Dec 12 - Kickstarter ends and backer survey will follow shortly.
Dec 26 - Receives funding from Kickstarter. Production begins!
End of January - Receive pins, stickers, acrylic key-chains from manufacturer. Grading begins.
Middle of February - Send out rewards to all backers!
*This is the ideal timeline if everything goes smooth. If there are any production delays due to quality issues and other unforeseeable reasons, I will send out an update to all the backers immediately.

Sticker Packs - All sticker packs (unless combined with acrylic charms or pins. Please change tier as shipping cost is different for pin/ acrylic charms) will be shipped using either regular Canada Post or USPS mail. Tracking will not be provided for sticker packs, but it will be available as an add-on if you are interested in it. Please feel free to contact me for more information.

Canada - All Canadian rewards will be shipped using Canada Post. Tracking is not included, but it is available upon request (price varied depending on location). Please feel free to contact me for more information.

US - All US rewards (excluding sticker pack only pledges, see above for more information) will be shipped using USPS with tracking. 

International - Most international rewards will be shipped using Asendia with tracking included. However, in some rare cases, this option may not be available for some international addresses. I will inform you ASAP if this arises, and the package will be sent using Canada Post regular mail without tracking. This happens very rarely, and if you have any concerns, please feel free to contact me at any time. 
 Here are my previous Kickstarters! Thank you so much for checking them out!
Gourmet Cats
Kitties Love RPG
My Cat Is An Alien
Three Tiny Cats
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Color variation - As no two computer screens display colors exactly the same, what appear on your computer screen may not be exactly the same for the actual product. However, I will work closely with my manufacturer to make sure all the colors appear as close as possible to my design intent.

Minor design adjustments - All the designs shown here are conceptual designs. During production, some minor changes might be required to ensure the product is manufacturable. Usually these changes are very minimal, and will not have an impact on the overall aesthetics or the turnaround time. However, if any issues arise, I will send out an update to all my backers immediately.

Defects - If any of the products (pins, stickers, and postcards) are defective upon receipt from my manufacturer, I will get them remade. This means the order for my backer will be delayed. I will send out an update immediately if that happens.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Thank you so much for all the love and support to the "Kitties Need To Chill" Kickstarter! All the stretch goals I originally set out were unlocked within a few hours after launch, and I am just overwhelmed with how well this campaign was received! Thank you!!!

We just finished an amazing first week with almost 100 backers! And with how strong we are going, I decided to add a new stretch goal to this campaign! This design - The Rainy Day Kitty - will be unlocked at $4500 CAD! You can add-on this pin at $15 CAD or $13 CAD (early bird backers)! Once unlocked, everyone will also receive a sticker of this rainy day kitty as a freebie (or it will be included in your sticker pack if you got one)! Thanks again for all your support! I hope you like this new design!

campaign.story:
We were craving a perfectly frozen coffee from our favorite cafe, but had zero desire to step out in the humid summer heat to go get it. After a few [failed] attempts with a blender, instant coffee and a bunch of ice, we had the idea for ICEY.
Making an icy drink with your blender at home is never quite the same as the refreshing frozen drinks you get at a restaurant. We wanted to recreate the smooth texture and the satisfying feeling of that first sip. And now that we have, we’re excited to share ICEY with you all.
Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While there are always risks & challenges with creating and delivering a brand new product, we've minimized both by having the entire process, from production to delivery, already set and arranged.

We have already signed agreements with key suppliers and manufacturers, and our prototype has been finalized. 

All of this, along with our strategic partnerships with experienced crowdfunding and fulfilment experts leaves little room for error and ensures quick delivery.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear ICEY backers,
We wanted to update, that unfortunately things are a bit stagnant at the moment due to a failure in one of the mass production molds.

After sending dozens of units to friends and family for logistical checks and seeing that everything had indeed arrived and working, we entered mass production earlier this month. Unfortunately one of the plastic molds failed in the production loads, causing a distortion that we thought we could overcome quickly and only today we got an update that the process is not so fast.

We wanted to update that although we did everything so that all the shipments went out this month to all our dear supporters, unfortunately only some will be able to go out towards the end of the month when all the other shipments, will came out gradually during June.

It's closer than ever and we are glad that despite all the difficulties we managed to get to the point we reached.

See below, some photos that centralize the final production process:

Dear ICEY backers,
It’s been a few weeks since our last update, but we haven’t forgotten about you! We We have finished printing the packaging (see below) and they are currently waiting for the completion of the production of your ICEY. Right now everything is working according to our schedules so we keep galloping forward.
Please expect your credit card to be charged between 1-3 business days through Backerkit.

Dear ICEY backers,
As promised, see further update on production progress. Most of the plastic parts have already arrived for inspection and have been approved for mass production.
We more than believe that all ICEY devices will be delivered on time as promised.

Dear ICEY backers,
The survey is closed, please contact us (info@theicey.com) within 48 hours in case you haven't done it yet.

We also excited to share with you the progress of production. The molds for mass production of external silicone huggers and motor shaft seals have already been produced . We received an examples and we are very pleased with the result.

Hello Dear backers,
Although 83% completed the survey, there are still 873 backers who haven’t yet completed it. We want to produce the ICEY, so we must lock the orders on February 19th - please don’t postpone it any longer.
Thank you to all those who filled out the survey and thanks in advance for the cooperation of those who haven’t yet done so.

It took some time for reasons unrelated to us, hopefully from now on everything will run faster.
Soon, you’ll receive an email from us with a special link to your BackerKit survey. It’s important to respond to your survey as quickly as you can since we need this information to fulfill your rewards.
You don’t need to create a BackerKit account to fill out your survey. When you receive the email with the survey, click the survey link to respond. Answer the questions about your reward preferences, provide shipping information, and purchase add-on items if you like. You don’t have access to this survey link yet, but it will be available soon via email!
We’re so grateful to have your support and excited to have you along for this journey. Together you’ve helped us raise $446,843. We can’t wait to ship ICEY to all of you!

We are super happy to announce that we have reached $ 400,000 and wanted to take this opportunity once again to thank everyone for the huge support.
In addition, at the request of quite a few supporters, we have decided that we will prepare for you a number of recipes for making different types of frozen drink and attach them to each device you have purchased.
See some examples of drinks that will probably take part in the recipe page we will prepare:

campaign.story:
Hello fluff-loving friends! We're Fluffnest, a group of friends here to bring all the soft and fluffy things that we love to you! Lily, our designer, loves all things fluffy and cute! Our organizer, David, enjoys penguins. And Jenn, well she’s just here to help! The PuffPals are a passion project that we’re so excited to share with you!

What is a Puffpal?
Have you ever wondered what it'd be like to hold a cloud? Cuddle with one? It's something close to that. Puffpals are the happiest, softest, bestest friends you could ever ask for! Winston (Cream) Ollie (Green) Melon (Pink) and Tommy (Blue) are our cuddly herd of sheep that are eager to join your family! And no farm is complete without a wide assortment of other friends. As the campaign progresses, each stretch goal will unlock one of our sheep's best friends!

Why Kickstarter?
Our friends are not cheap to take care of (or manufacture). Plushies have a pretty big initial production cost, Kickstarter allows us to make the plushies we want to make without bankrupting ourselves in the process! And it's great that we get to share it with you at a discounted Kickstarter exclusive price as well ♥︎
♥︎ Kickstarter is an all or nothing platform! Your card will not be charged until the end of the campaign! You can edit or cancel your pledge at any time before the campaign ends! ♥︎

Winston the Cream Sheep: The oldest of our family, Winston’s head is in the clouds most days. He’d much rather be lazing around with his friends watching the clouds float by than anything else. Despite his broken wings, Winston still dreams of flying with the rest of his family.
Ollie the Green Sheep: Ollie is the most energetic of his siblings, always eager to play or start up a game. Ollie is often the one to drag his family into all sorts of trouble, encouraging his herd to be more adventurous and fun. He still can’t seem to convince her siblings to skydive, though.
Melon the Pink Sheep: Melon is the brains of the operation, trying her best to keep her siblings in line. It’s all fun and games until one sheep loses its way, so Melon keeps track of everything going on in her little family. Melon’s favorite activity to do in her free time is counting sheep.
Tommy the Blue Sheep: The careful sheep, Tommy is shy and quiet but is full of not just fluff but love. He sticks close to his siblings and follows them everywhere, hoping one day to muster up the courage to be as outgoing as they are. Tommy’s one hobby is writing poetry about the pastures and farmland he grazes.

Winston was not easy to come by! It took many many prototypes and searching many many manufacturers to get him to this state of perfection ✨
♥︎ ALL PLUSHIES ARE ROUGHLY 8 INCHES TALL (EXCLUDING EARS) AND 12 INCHES LONG ♥︎
The fluffy part is made out of soft coral fleece and the rest of him is ultra soft minky fabric! They’ve been tested and they are safe for all ages!




♥︎ We will unlock more rewards if we reach more funding goals! You may pledge for locked goals to help us reach them faster!♥︎
** STRAWBERRY COW AND HALLOWEEN SHEEP ARE IN PROGRESS**
♥︎ You may add on additional items on top of your current pledge! Click “manage my pledge” and increase the pledge amount by however much each add-on is. You can edit or cancel your pledge at any time before the campaign ends!♥︎
ADD $32 PER PLUSH IF YOU'RE AN EARLY BIRD BACKER!

** HIGHER TIER PLEDGES COME WITH FREE SHIPPING! **
THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR LOOKING! You can find me (Lily) on instagram or email me: lily@fluffnest.com! Please don't hesitate to contact me with any questions or concerns! :)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Production delays may be the biggest issue with all Kickstarters, since we’ve never placed a bulk order for plushies before we added some wiggle room for potential delays. The plush may have defects in which we will not be shipping them and reordering more if that becomes an issue, we hope to order double of what the bulk minimum order is to ensure everyone gets the most perfect puffpal! There are many challenges to each step of the process and we’re very determined to solve them and get the fluffy friends to you as soon as we possibly can!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey all,
We’re so excited to announce that the PuffPals are being shipped as we speak! Tracking will be provided within the next week via email and some of you that live closer to L.A might even receive your fluffy pal as soon as next week!!

**WE CANNOT MAKE ANY ADDITIONAL CHANGES TO YOUR PLEDGE AT THIS POINT**
Just a heads up, for some of you that ordered more than four PuffPals, they will be in separate boxes but still under the same tracking, and for those of you with more than 25 items in your order, it will be split into two shipments, and will ship at different times!

Hey all,
GOOD NEWS! Our PuffPals are being received at our warehouse and we’ll be shipping them out beginning NEXT THURSDAY! It’ll take a few days to ship everything out but they are finally here and ready to meet you all!!
Please make sure that your surveys are locked in with no payment errors on Backerkit if you have any add-ons. Some of you have not filled out the survey, please contact us at .

Hey all!!

If you haven’t received your survey, or there’s an issue preventing you from filling it out, please send us an email so we can get things worked out before we ship!

Some backers had card errors on Backerkit as well, please remove the add-on items or fix the payment method so that we can proceed to lock the order and the address (the charge is only for any add-on items that you may have selected within the Backerkit survey, it is not a double charge to your Kickstarter pledge).

Hey y’all! This is a small reminder that the surveys will be locked tomorrow!! If you need to do any of the following, please do so before Saturday 2/20/2021 11:59 PM PST!!

Change your address
Adjust your add-ons
Request tier change
Adjust the payment method/credit card on Backerkit

Hey all,
We’ve confirmed that the blue sheep Tommy is actually going to ship on time with the rest of our precious Puffpals!! We’ve also secured the shipping containers and booked the sail date! If everything goes smoothly without any unexpected delays, we will be welcoming all the Puffpals in mid-late March!

updates.update_userinfo: Keychain Plush PHOTOS! LOCKING SURVEYS SOON!!
updates.update_content:
Hey all!

It’s been a while since our last update, hope everyone had a great holiday and got a nice little break!
We have a few things to share with you today, we hope this update answers some of your questions!

Happy Thanksgiving!! 

We’re so grateful for the love and support our project has received and so happy to see that Lucie is getting a lot of love from the survey selections and add-ons! 

By now most of you have received and completed the survey! But—for those of you who still have not received it, here are a few reasons why that might be...

Hey all,

*EDIT*: SINCE WE JUST SENT THEM IT MAY TAKE A BIT TO REACH EVERYONE'S INBOX. PLEASE BE PATIENT AND IF YOU DON'T RECEIVE I+T IN 24 HOURS THEN LET US KNOW

All surveys are now sent!! Please check the email that you signed up with on Kickstarter to access it!

If you have any questions regarding the survey, please address it here so other people can see it too! Can’t wait to see which Puffpals y’all pick!! Stay safe and have a lovely rest of your week!!

Best,
Fluffnest Team

updates.update_content:
Hey all,
We've sent out the smoke test! Check your emails, we've sent test surveys to 5% of backers! Smoke tests are required by Backerkit to make sure that our survey is set up correctly so that we can proceed to sending it out to everyone without any issues! If everything goes smoothly, we will send out all the surveys soon!

project_data.project_name: PuffPals! Cute Animal Plushies

campaign.story:
🍁  Hi there, I'm Ashley! (aka "Le Spirit Designs" across the internet). I'm an illustrator & graphic designer, who loves making fun and cute designs! My brand mascot is an adorable little ghost named Spirit, who loves to have fun! 🍂
By pledging to this campaign, you are helping to bring to life enamel pins of little Spirit, something I have wanted to do for a few years but never had the courage to do! And just in time for spooky season~ 👻  These pins are all hard enamel, gold plated mini pins, each measuring just under 1" on the longest side! They all have screen-printed details, metal clutches and my logo stamped on the back!
The price you pledge for will also be a cheaper rate than any leftover pins will be sold for in my shop, so pledge now (or grab an Early Bird tier, if any are left!) to ensure you get the best price! Once the initial goal is met, there will be several stretch goals available. Your pledge can be increased, decreased or cancelled at any time if you want to add more pins or change your mind. And because this is an all-or-nothing campaign, you won't be charged until the end of the campaign, and only if the initial goal is met.
The initial goal of $240 will fund production, packaging, shipping and Kickstarter fees for one pin, "Logo Spirit"!
"Logo Spirit" has been unlocked! 24mm in size. Colors and details are subject to change.
If the initial goal of $240 is met before the campaign deadline of September 9th, stretch goals will begin to become available! When stretch goals "unlock", that means the campaign has earned enough money to fund them. However if the campaign ends just shy of a stretch goal unlocking, that pin will not be available.
"Witch Hat Spirit" has been unlocked! 24mm in size. Colors and details are subject to change.
"Happy Spirit" has been unlocked! 21mm in size. Colors and details are subject to change.
"Pumpkin Spirit" has been unlocked! 21mm in size. Colors and details are subject to change.
 The final pin stretch goal is this set of teeny tiny board fillers! The trio counts as ONE pin, and will come as a set! 
The "Tiny Pin Set" is unlocked! Each pin is 13mm. Colors and details are subject to change.

The final stretch goal after the pin goals are met will be freebie stickers to all backers! Designs coming soon~
Early Bird rewards are available in limited quantities, for a very limited time! Each Early Bird comes with a specified number of pins, and vinyl sticker sheets featuring the pin designs and other fun Spirits! Grab them before September 1st!
Early Bird Rewards feature two or four pins, plus vinyl sticker sheets!
August / Early September: The campaign period will last 2 weeks, ending on September 9th. Within this time, I will be sharing my project with anyone willing to listen! I will also be designing additional stretch rewards, just in case.
Mid September: If the campaign is funded successfully, I will be able to send pins to production in mid-late September (Kickstarter funds take up to two weeks to deliver into my account).
October: Assuming pins are successfully in production in late September, October is production month. My manufacturer's turnaround time is typically 3-4 weeks, and if all goes well and no reprints are needed, pins should arrive to me in late October.
November: Operating under the assumption that all pins get funded, I will need a few weeks to sort through them all for quality control, packaging, fulfilling rewards and shipping. This may take a while for one person! So I've given myself a cushion of time through November to fulfill all rewards, and if there are ANY delays, I will send out an email to backers with updated information!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This will be my 8th production of enamel pins, so I am familiar with the process. This is also my fourth Kickstarter-- the first three were successfully funded, so I have faith that this project will come to fruition! My artwork has already been approved for production, and the manufacturer is only waiting for funds. To ensure pins are produced within the timeline, my order will be submitted for production as soon as funds are received (which can take up to 14 days after the campaign ends).

Once pins arrive to me, depending on the total end quantity (read as: depending on how many stretch goals are met), it may end up taking longer than one week to sort through for quality errors, attach backing cards, and assemble pin(s) and other backer rewards for shipping. To ensure this process goes by quickly and efficiently, I will be enlisting the help of my boyfriend (and others, if necessary!).
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey everyone! ALL Kickstarter packages are officially packed and in the mail! Thank you all so much for your support and helping me make these pins a reality!
If you need help accessing your tracking number, please let me know! And if you didn’t order the full set but would like to add to it, there are a small handful of leftovers of each design in my shop!
Have a fantastic holiday season, and stay spooky!

Hello everyone! I hope this update finds you well~

I just received word that the pins are shipping tonight! Hopefully I will have a tracking number by the morning, so I can get an idea of how long their transit will be. My manu sent over some photos, and I'm really excited to get all these tiny babies!

Hey everyone!
I wanted to first check in and remind anyone who hasn't filled out their survey yet, to please do so as soon as possible! I won't be able to mail your rewards if I don't know which pin(s) you want or where they're being sent! If you have trouble finding or accessing your survey, please let me know!
Second, I wanted to let you know that I have received the Kickstarter funds and the pins have gone into production! I'm waiting to see if my manufacturer will give me a timeframe for production, but I did learn recently that China will have a national holiday lasting about 7-10 days around the 1st of October, so I'm already expecting some delays. This may push delivery towards the end of October, but I will let you all know when I have a better idea of time!

Good morning! I just wanted to let you all know that the surveys have been sent out, so please complete them as soon as possible! The quicker I get a count of each pin design, the quicker I can get them into production.
If anyone has any issues or questions regarding the survey, please feel free to reach out!

And that's a wrap, everyone! Thank you all SO much for your support with this campaign, it means so so much to me that so many people want pins of my mascot! 
If you're seeing this and you happened to have missed the chance to pledge, the pins will be available for preorder in my shop until the end of September! Find them at www.lespiritdesigns.com.
I'll be sending out reward surveys this weekend, so please be sure to fill them out as soon as possible! Once I have a count for each pin design, I'll be able to quickly send them into production. The sooner I get them in, the more likely they are to arrive by Halloween!

Hey backers!
We are closing in on the final 24 hours of the campaign! Thank you to everyone who has supported and shared so far, I truly appreciate it!
We are still about $100~ away from unlocking the tiny pins, but I think I’m going to go ahead and unlock them!

Hello everyone!
I wanted to send out a reminder that Early Bird tiers that are currently available will end on Saturday, September 5th at 12:30pm PST! If you are considering pledging for a higher amount of pins, now is the time to do so~
We are a little more than $300 away from unlocking the set of tiny pins, and I'm confident we can get there before the campaign ends on Wednesday! If anyone is willing to share this project on their Instagram, here are a couple of graphics you can use to post:
Hello lovely backers! I am here to reveal the next and final stretch goal pins for this campaign!

updates.update_content:
I woke up this morning to see that the final pin has been unlocked!! I'm so excited!!
I'm working on the finishing touches of the final stretch goal, as well as some freebie items! Please stay tuned for those!
Keep an eye out for the update with the new pins! Thank you all for your overwhelming contributions!!

campaign.story:
Hello I'm Cremecherie, an illustrator of cats and all things cute! Halloween is my absolute favourite so what's a better combination than having both cats and Halloween? Hope you'll enjoy my pin babies as much as I do 
I'm so excited to announce my first ever Kickstarter, which features 8 adorably spooky enamel pin designs. These kittens and friends have many tricks and tasty treats in store for you all!
Your support for my Kickstarter would mean the world to help unlock all pin designs ♡
You can find me at Twitter ♡ Instagram ♡ Shop
For extra Sticker Packs, please add $7 AUD to your pledge! 
For extra Kitten Mini Pins, please add $13 AUD to your pledge! (They aren't a set you'll only receive 1 unless you add more, unlike the Jelly Babies and Kitten Candy which are sets of 3)
If you would like tracked shipping please message me and I'll let you know how much to add to your pledge
All packages will be sent via Letter Mail both domestically and Internationally to keep costs down! For international orders it may take anywhere from 2 weeks to 4 months to arrive to you due to covid, and packages will not be tracked. Please let me know if you would like to add tracking!
August 29th the Kitten's Trick or Treats Kickstarter begins!
September 13th Kickstarter ends, and reward surveys are sent out to backers. Production will then start for the pins
Pins are expected to arrive mid-late October, I will then quality check and start packaging and sending out rewards to all backers!
Kickstarter is an all in or nothing platform, if our goal isn't reached you won't be charged anything. If the goal is met Kickstarter will then charge you when the campaign ends! Feel free to change, cancel or add to your pledge at any time before it ends
Early Bird spots are limited to the first 24 hours of the Kickstarter! Once that 24 hours passes there is no way to get that tier any longer. If you un-pledge you won't be able to re-pledge for an Early Bird spot again. If more goals or add-ons are added you can still change or add to your Early Bird pledge!
Your pledge will help to unlock the stretch goals! If the design you'd like hasn't been unlocked yet, please still consider pledging as it will bring us closer to unlocking the next goal!
You choose the pins you want at the end of the campaign. I'll send out surveys for all backers via email to fill out once it ends, where you'll be able to let me know which pin designs you'd like! Make sure to fill the survey out as soon as possible so I know final numbers
If you have any questions please feel free to send me a message~
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I've had experience making pins before and have a reliable manufacturer so I'm quite confident everything will go well! Due to the hand-made nature of pins however possible, there may be delays in production or potential alterations in the final colours of the pins

If the pins must be remade there will be a delay in shipping them out to backers, however I will keep everyone updated if any delays arrise

Due to the current pandemic, there may be delayed delivery times for both domestic and international orders.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

project_data.project_name: Kitten's Trick or Treats Enamel Pins

campaign.story:
Welcome to the "GOURMET CATS - Japanese Cuisine Hard Enamel Pins" Kickstarter Campaign! I am Catherine, the artist behind Walnut and Clam! This is my fourth enamel pin Kickstarter! If you had a chance to see my previous KS or visit my Instagram account, you would know that I simply love drawing cats! Cats are amazing creatures, and they always put a smile on my face when I see them, and I hope that this set of pins will bring you happiness as well! 
Pledge now and pay later! This means that you will have plenty of time to change your pledge throughout the campaign (in this case 21 days)! Your payment will only be processed at the end of the campaign when it is successful. A survey will then be sent to all backers, where you can pick your reward!
Finally, by pledging for this Kickstarter, not only that you will be the first one to receive items from my new series, but you will also be paying a lower price for them!!! If there are any leftover pins/ stickers/ acrylic charms, they will be sold at my Etsy store at a higher price. Thank you so much for your support! 
The hard enamel pins are gold plated with the WalnutandClam logo at the back. Sizes are approximately 1.4"-1.5" tall, depending on the design. Rubber clutches will be used for these pins. Each pin comes with a backing card.  

STICKER PACK includes six different waterproof stickers measuring ~1.9"-2" each!
HOLOGRAPHIC ACRYLIC CHARMS come in six different designs. The main part (cat character) is approximately 1.75"-1.80"tall. The key chain comes with a little golden bell.
Make sure you check out these freebies! Which will be included in addition to your rewards.
(1) STICKER PACK for the first 20 backers who pledged for this campaign!
(2) STICKER for every backer! It will be randomly selected from one of the six designs! You can also choose to upgrade to a sticker pack for $6 CAD (Regular price $8 CAD)
(3) STICKER PACK for Early Bird Full Course Meal Backers! This means that if you are also among the first 20 backers to pledge for this campaign, you will receive two sticker packs!!!!
(3) FREEIE PIN is available for backers who pledged for 4 or more pins. Free matcha ice-cream dessert! This pin is also available as ADD-ONs once unlocked. For example, if you backed one pin and you would like to get this matcha ice-cream cat pin, please change your tier to two pins instead.  
 Here are some additional items you can add-on to your pledge. Please add the corresponding amount to your pledge to get them!
ONE STICKER +1 CAD
STICKER PACK (Upgrade from a freebie sticker) +6 CAD 
ACRYLIC CHARM +9 CAD
ONE ADDITIONAL PIN +13CAD (early bird tiers only)
July 21st - Kickstarter launches and will run for 21 days.
August 11th - Kickstarter ends and backer survey will follow shortly.
August 25 - Receive funding from Kickstarter. Production begins.
End of September - Receive pins, stickers, acrylic charms from manufacturer. Grading begins.
Beginning of October- Send out rewards to all backers!
*This is the ideal timeline if everything goes smooth. If there are any production delays due to quality issues and other unforeseeable reasons, I will send out an update to all the backers immediately. 
 Please feel free to check out my previous Kickstarters!
Kitties Love RPG
My Cat Is An Alien
Three Tiny Cats
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Color variation - As no two computer screens display colors exactly the same, what appear on your computer screen may not be exactly the same for the actual product. However, I will work closely with my manufacturer to make sure all the colors appear as close as possible to my design intent. 

Minor design adjustments - All the designs shown here are conceptual designs. During production, some minor changes might be required to ensure the product is manufacturable. Usually these changes are very minimal, and will not have an impact on the overall aesthetics or the turnaround time. However, if any issues arise, I will send out an update to all my backers immediately.

Defects - If any of the products (pins, stickers, and postcards) are defective upon receipt from my manufacturer, I will get them remade. This means the order for my backer will be delayed. I will send out an update immediately if that happens.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Gourmet Cats KS - All Rewards Shipped!
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone! I just want to let you know that your KS rewards for the Gourmet Cats campaign have been shipped! In fact, some of you might have already received them if you are in Canada. The US orders will probably be delivered sometimes this week. As for the rest of them, please be patience as it might take a little bit more time due to the current situation. 

Once again, thank you so much for this successful campaign!! Have a wonderful day!

project_data.project_name: GOURMET CATS

campaign.story:
My Favorite Way To Drink
Licking water from KittySpring’s shallow and wide dish is a pleasure. My adorable whiskers never brush against it and never hurt because of whisker stress!

Enough Water Every Day
KittySpring ensures I satisfy my daily need for a cup of fresh water (0.8 oz/lb) for 2 looong days. Now Mom and Dad don’t need to fill up my bowls and refresh the water in them several times a day. It’s a life saver for both of us!
Pawesome addition to any home interior
I simply can’t stop admiring the sleek design of my new fountain! It can be placed in almost any corner of the house and still look great. 
Hard to knock over
I’ve already paw-tested KittySpring. After hitting the light yet stable fountain a few times, it never flipped over! The fountain stands strong against any of my paw attacks. No more puddles of water, I promise.

Purremium, safe materials
KittySpring is made of FDA and RoHS certified materials, which means all of its components are  100% non-toxic, safe, and me-friendly. 

Non-electric, just gravity 
I never knew what gravity was until I got my KittySpring. Meow I know — it’s a kind of thing that fills up my dish automatically once I lick a few drops … and it never adds to Dad’s bills. Meowgic!
Silent like a sweet nap
KittySpring has no motor, which means no scary noises for a fluffy like me and a quiet night’s sleep for Mom & Dad. 

Hard  to destroy
The durable materials make KittySpring my long-term water fountain: time and even naughtiest of tricks will never put it out of order. 

No need to replace the filter
The built-in stainless steel filter lasts for years. This actually means 2 things: no troubles for me and no extra expenses for Mom and Dad.
Easy to install
Simply unbox it, fill the bottle with water and place it in any corner of your house. No plugs, no cables needed!
Track the water level easily 
With the transparent water bottle, Mom and Dad always knows when it’s time to refill the bottle of my favorite water. 
Easy to clean 
Cleaning KittySpring is super easy and super important. Make the dish and the bottle bacteria-free in seconds by simply taking them apart and washing in tap water using a brush or sponge and soap. Everything is also completely dishwasher-safe.

Single size. RRRight size
KittySpring is purrfectly suited for both large cats like me and small kittens. Depending on the size of my fellow cats, KittySpring offers enough to drink for 1-2 days. And it will always stay fresh!
Good for many cats  
With its ultra-large dish, KittySpring can serve water not only to one but even two cats. The second cat is often my friend, Max. We just love drinking together from this fountain!

Designed with comfort-loving cats in mind
Each component of KittySpring is designed to combine useful with pleasant and comfortable. Thanks to its ergonomic design, drinking water from this fountain is almost like drinking from a natural spring.

Two pawesome color options for your cat
Crystal White
Emerald Green  

KittySpring vs Regular bowl


Absolutely cat approved
KittySpring is approved by all representatives of my cat family. This means British shorthairs like me, Bengal and Persian cats, Sphynx, Scottish folds and all the rest just love KittySpring.
Dimensions and Weight

Our Pawesome Story
Last year my cat, Oscar, suddenly fell ill. The vet diagnosed the fluffy with dehydration and resulting kidney problems. The poor thing had to go through lots of pain and long treatment to regain his kitty self. We all worried for him pretty much as he was our team’s absolute favorite. 
And fortunately one bright day he started meowing happily again. We all sighed with relief and decided to join our efforts and design a water fountain that would help cuties all over the world avoid such problems and always stay hydrated. 
In designing KittySpring, we considered each detail of feline physiology to turn our fur friends’ drinking experience into the most enjoyable and comfortable one. We also tried to balance cats’ preferences for running and still water, creating an amazing gravity fountain perfect for any cat. 
With KittySpring, we hope to improve the life of our fluffies, keep them healthy and help loving cat parents like you take better care of them. 

By backing now, you’ll get KittySpring at a discount that is only available during the crowdfunding campaign. What’s more, you’ll join our community of cat parents and receive useful tips on keeping your furry friend hydrated and healthy.
We ship worldwide! Please check out the shipping costs for your reward as it may vary depending on your country. Also note that costs like VAT, GST, duties, taxes, etc. are not included in the reward price and are covered by backers on delivery, in the amount determined by your shipping country.
Here is our estimated shipping timeline:
KittySpring Regular Version - Orders made before August 12 - October
KittySpring Regular Version -  Orders made after August 12 - December
KittySpring Glass Version - For all backers - December
We are planning to start the shipping of your KittySpring from China, which means that it first has to reach our European, American, or Australian warehouses and only then be delivered to you.
If according to the aforementioned timeline the shipping of your KittySpring starts on October 1, it will reach our warehouses on November 2 and be delivered to you within 3-7 working days. In case of December shipping, it will reach our warehouses in January and be delivered to you within 3-7 working days. To make the process more transparent and predictable for you, we will keep you updated on all the developments in detail.
Lockdown has affected almost any business, including our company. Nevertheless, we continue working hard and already have estimated dates for production and delivery based on all the known variables. We promise to keep you posted in case anything out of our control forces us to change our plans.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We know from experience it takes a lot of planning, hard work, and persistence to successfully launch a new product. As most of the new projects, there are always some risks and challenges.

The team is confident we have taken the right steps to mitigate risks such as shipment delays, product defects or supplier reliability. Over the past year, we have been prototyping, testing and refining to make sure the final product we deliver to our backers far exceeds expectations.

Our team at Desimore will update you regularly on progress. If there are any issues, we promise to communicate with you every step of the way!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
