updates.update_content:
Howdy KittySpringers,

Finally, Christmas is just around the corner!🎅🎄⛄
We know, we know, your fluffies cannot wait to receive their KittySpring.
Our team cannot wait to deliver it to them either.

Hey KittySpringers!😻
It’s been almost two months since we sent out surveys to all of you to confirm your items and shipping information.
After receiving your surveys, all our team has fully focused on the production, shipping out any meaningful stock to you through our overseas warehouses once it’s ready.

Hey KittySpringers! 😺
Long time no see.
Guess what we were busy with?
Our entire team was working hard on fulfilling KittySprings for your lovely fluffies.

project_data.project_name: KittySpring - The most cat-friendly water fountain on Earth

campaign.story:
Hi! I’m Lauren Yu, also known as @missdoodlesalot on Instagram/Twitter! I've being making fandom and original merch for the last couple of years and have been pursuing it full time since I graduated. I've been creating enamel pins the last several months, and self funded 4 of my designs. Now I've decided I want to reach a wider audience and have my ideas be crowdfunded.
For this kickstarter I created 2 rootin' tootin' cowboys and 2 dastardly bandit pins that are full of personality. I love creating adorable and silly designs of animals that standout when you look at them. I think with each design there's something for any animal lover to enjoy.
With this campaign, I wanted to focus on these 4 designs to start, but there are several other designs I plan to release if all 4 of these get funded! If we continue to surpass the goals set there's also the possibility of unlocking more goodies! The more pledges I get, the more stuff you all receive!
All pins pledged for in this kickstarter are at a discounted rate from my retail prices on my store. If the project is funded, backers can also purchase additional pins on top of their pledge for the kickstarter.
Please note that you will NOT BE CHARGED until the campaign ends with successful funding! 
The Tumbleweed Mini Pin will be free with all pledges!
Western Frontier Washi Tape will be available to pledges of 3pins or more. I will also have it available for preorder after the campaign for $6!
 June 30th: Kickstarter Campaign launches
 July 20th: Campaign ends. 
 Late July: Kickstarter processes and collects fees. Surveys are sent out
 August/September: Pin Production
 September/October: Pins start being shipped! (Tracking Number Included for those who pay for tracking)
 PIN MANUFACTURING: 70% of the funds will go towards producing the pins
 PACKAGING: 5% will go towards packaging supplies (ie mailers, backing cards, etc)
 SHIPPING:  15% will be towards shipping the packages out
 KICKSTARTER FEES: Everything else goes toward Kickstarter fees. Kickstarter charges every successful project a small fee for credit card transactions and for using their platform.
All past enamel pins I've designed and self funded! Each are available on my etsy (link via the picture).
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
A common risk with enamel pin production is slight variations from mockup designs and finished products. I'll be in close contact with the manufacturer to make sure that any, if at all, changes are minor. All backers will receive standard grade pins even if there are some second grade quality pins.

Another thing for backers to keep in mind, is that different screens show the colors of each design differently. I will do my best share updates of the pins during production and in different lighting.

Due to COVID, there is the possibility of delayed shipping/production, even more than there was before. I will continue to maintain close contact with my manufacturer about the production process as well as updating my backers on all updates I receive. 

Please be sure to check if your country is accepting nonessential mail as there are some countries that aren't due to COVID. Customs and international travel may increase shipping times. To make sure packages do not get lost, please make sure that your address is current and up to date.

Backers will be notified immediately if anything happens to the pins during production, packaging, or shipping.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Yeehaw everyone!
Hope you're all having a great 2021 and that your yeehaw critter pins have gotten to you safely! Or at the very least are on their way to you!
I wanted to share a new project I'm working on that you all might be interested! If you click the banner it'll lead you to the campaign page.

YEEHAW!!!!
It's been a long process, but every single reward has been mailed out! Please check your messages for your tracking number. If you haven't received one please message me to get yours! But for now, we celebrate!

I want to thank every single one of you for being a part of this process. My dream of making some wild west critters wouldn't have come true without your support and for that I am truly grateful. I've already been tagged in some rewards reaching their destinations, and it's been a joy to see everyone's reactions to them! Please make sure to tag me @ missdoodlesalot on twitter or instagram if you post your package!

Howdy yall!
Pin grading is FINISHED. Got some help from some wonderful friends and finished looking over all 1000+ pins! I'll be spending the rest of this week packaging and sending out orders asap.
What this means is that by the end of today (11:59PM PST) I'll be locking in addresses so PLEASE update them! I want to make sure everyone receives their pledges.

Hey all, to start I wanted to apologize for the radio silence. It's been a bit crazy with personal life problems, but there are so many updates I have for you! So let's dive right in.
Pins actually finished about 2 weeks ago but there was a mistake with the Bandit Armadillo design that needed to be remade. My manu offered to send the other pins sooner but I would have had to pay for shipping for the armadillos again which I wanted to avoid. So they have been remade to be correct and they look perfect!

Hey everyone! Hope you've all been having a great September! Just wanted to send out some updates and pictures of the production so far!
We have 5 out of the 11 designs completely done and I'm hoping to get the rest in by the beginning of October. However I was just told recently there will be a week long holiday for the factory, at the start of the month. If they aren't finished by the end of September we will most likely get them early-mid October, which means we will be a little behind schedule in mailing out rewards. I'm a bit disappointed, but everyone deserves a break! Especially with how great the pins are turning out and that it would only go into the beginning of November! Thanks for all your patience as these pins are being made and I'm hoping for the best. Hopefully these updates make you just as excited for them to come in as I am!

Hey all! Just a mini update of sorts. Stickers have come in early! So I'll be sending the sticker set tier out by mail soon!
Color corrections for the pins have been made and they are in production now! I'm confident they will come out in time for October fulfillment since we will have all of September even if we experience delays.
I also have preorders for the pins open in my store! If there are any you missed out on and want to add to your order just leave me your backer number in the notes section. Also here's a coupon for 15% off purchases on my store: SAVEUSPS2020

Hey everyone! We're now at the end of August and I had a couple more updates for everyone. The samples have made it to me despite some shipping delays and there are some definite color changes I'll be making. I'm hoping that by taking care of these color issues now, the production time won't be stalled! Here are some shots from a lil photoshoot I had when they came in. Despite the colors being off from what I wanted, the quality of the pins are amazing!

Hey all! Just a mini update for everyone. Surveys are going out slowly as I've had to deal with a lot of stuff at home, but I hope to get them out all in the next couple of days!
While we're waiting for the funds from Kickstarter, I went ahead and I've ordered the samples for some of the pin designs so we should be seeing those early/mid August! 
And lastly, the results are in! Sheep Dame is our next design! I know a lot of you were hoping for Can-Can Lizard but I will definitely have her made later or even have a preorder for her!

campaign.story:
We reached our first funding goal of $7,500 in 9 days! Since then, we've passed three more of our funding goals ($10,000, $15,000, & $20,000). Our new goal is to make it to $25,000 by the end of July, but we can only do it with YOUR help! If we reach $25,000, we'll have some extra money for the next round of production, and we'll begin the process of creating new vegan milk chocolate products (hopefully by Halloween)! We'll also be able to help animal sanctuaries even more. Thank you to everyone who has been part of this journey so far! We appreciate each and every one of you, and we still can't believe all of the support you lovely people have given us.
- Brian & Charlie, AKA the Veggie Brothers
We're a vegan milk chocolate company owned by the Veggie Brothers and based in Gainesville, FL! This Kickstarter marks our official launch and the creation of our first chocolate bar, Vegan Rice Crunch. Vegan Rice Crunch tastes as delicious as the milk chocolate you already know, but without the animal cruelty.
The Veggie Brothers, Brian and Charlie Trupo.
We are Brian and Charlie Trupo, 21-year-old twins who grew up in Delaware. Two years ago, we created an online blog on Instagram called Veggie Brothers to spread the message of compassion, empathy, and being kind to all kinds. Since then, we've gained a following of over 25,000 people. 
In our experiences as vegans, we discovered a gap in the vegan chocolate market, so we decided now would be the perfect time to launch our own vegan milk chocolate company. Our mission is to create the best vegan milk chocolate in the world and help animal sanctuaries at the same time.
Our Vegan Rice Crunch is a vegan milkless rice crunch chocolate bar. Vegan Rice Crunch has the same creamy taste you're used to with milk chocolate, but we achieved it through the use of cocoa butter instead of dairy. It's free from dairy, tree nuts, peanuts, gluten, and soy!
Vegan Rice Crunch Ingredients: Vegan Cane Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Unsweetened Chocolate, Wholegrain Brown Rice, Rice Syrup Powder, Sunflower Lecithin (An Emulsifier), Salt, Natural Vanilla, Natural Flavor.
The minimum cost for our first round of production is approximately $7500. We have an idea, we have a passion, and we have a dream, but as university students, we simply don't have the funds to do this ourselves. All we need is demand and for people to want to buy our products. That's where you come in!
Through Kickstarter, we're pre-selling our Vegan Rice Crunch bars, and if we reach our goal then we'll start production on August 15th and get your chocolate to you as soon as we can.
To order Vegan Rice Crunch bars, click on "Back this project." We have 5 different bundles that you can choose from! These include:
 Chocolate Cruncher- Comes with 4 Vegan Rice Crunch bars. This bundle is designed for those who eat chocolate every once in a while.
 Chocolate Lover- Comes with 10 Vegan Rice Crunch and a Trupo Treats sticker. This bundle is designed for those who crave chocolate regularly and eat it almost every day (*ONLY BUNDLE AVAILABLE FOR INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING* ).
 Chocolate Destroyer- Comes with 20 Vegan Rice Crunch bars, a Trupo Treats sticker, and a personalized "Thank You" video from the Veggie Brothers. This bundle is designed for those who have the power to inhale chocolate in a matter of seconds.
 Chocolate Connoisseur- Comes with 50 Vegan Rice Crunch bars, a Trupo Treats sticker, and a personalized "Thank You" video from the Veggie Brothers. This bundle is designed for those who have the capability to destroy chocolate in a matter of seconds but prefer to take it slowly and savor each bite.
 Chocolate God- Comes with 100 Vegan Rice Crunch bars, a Trupo Treats sticker, and a personalized "Thank You" video from the Veggie Brothers. This bundle is designed for those who can't get chocolate out of their mind. You'll know if you're a Chocolate God.
If none of these sound appealing to you but you still want to support us, there will also be an option to donate however much you would like! 
2020
Raise $7500 for first round of production.
  Create a vegan milk chocolate bar, vegan chocolate balls, vegan peanut butter cups and other vegan chocolate varieties.
  Get into small vegan stores, animal sanctuary shops, and small wholesale accounts.
  2021
Source beans that are Fair Trade certified, and join the Food Empowerment Project list.
  Start our own non-profit to distribute donations to animal sanctuaries and rescues.
  Build a bigger team.
  2022
Start our own chocolate factory.
  Get into grocery stores around the US and aim to expand to other countries.
  Today, we're partnering with VIVA Global Horse Rescue! Here is a list of other sanctuaries we're partnering with throughout this fundraiser:
 July 5th-6th; Arthur's Acres Sanctuary in Parksville, New York
 July 7th-8th; Aloha Animal Sanctuary in Haleiwa, Hawaii
 July 9th-10th; Sleepy Pig Farm Animal Sanctuary in Redding, Connecticut
 July 11th-12th; Love Always Sanctuary in San Fernando, California
 July 13th-14th; Goosepond Mountain Sanctuary in Chester, New York
 July 15th-16th; Critter Creek Farm Sanctuary in Gainesville, FL
 July 17th-18th; Luvin Arms Animal Sanctuary in Erie, Colorado
 July 19th- 20th; Iowa Farm Sanctuary in Oxford, Iowa
 July 21st; Charlotte's Freedom Farm in Ontario, Canada
 July 22nd-23rd; Uplands PEAK Sanctuary in Freedom, Indiana
 July 24th-25th; Catskill Animal Sanctuary in Saugerties, New York
 July 26th-27th; Big Island Farm Sanctuary in Captain Cook, Hawaii
 July 28th; VIVA Global Horse Rescue in Southern California
 July 29th-30th; Austin Farm Sanctuary in Cedar Creek, Texas
 July 31st; Lighthouse Farm Sanctuary in Scio, Oregon
Front of Vegan Rice Crunch.
Back of Vegan Rice Crunch.
Our mom enjoying a Vegan Rice Crunch chocolate bar.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have already raised over $7,500, so we will definitely be able to start the production of our Vegan Rice Crunch bars in August! We'll also aim to ship in August, but this may be delayed depending on the arrival date of our labels. The absolute latest our Vegan Rice Crunch bars will be sent out is September.

Thank you for supporting us :)
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hi you,
Thank you so for your support and patience! We have finally set up our vegan chocolate facility and have a team making our bars this week. We also have all of our shipping supplies in and we are extremely excited to assemble the packages.  As promised, the bars will be shipped out in early September (most likely next week if all goes well)! Follow more of our progress on Instagram @TrupoTreats.

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for helping us hit $25,000 today! It means the world to us that you all believed in our mission and were willing to pre-order in order to enable us to build our company. We will keep you updated with the progress of getting the chocolate factory ready and can't wait to send you all your vegan rice crunch bars chocolate soon!
All the best,

updates.update_userinfo: Just hit $22,500 in sales-- 3 times our original goal!
updates.update_content:
Hello beautiful people! We just hit 3 times our original goal of $7,500! We now have raised $22,500 and are pushing for $25,000 by the end of our campaign (July 31st at 11:59 PM)! We still have so many wonderful sanctuaries to work with and still need your help to raise as many funds as we can for them: Big Island Farm Sanctuary in Hawaii (today), Viva Global Horse Rescue in Southern California (tomorrow), Austin Farm Sanctuary in Texas (Wednesday and Thursday), and Lighthouse Farm Sanctuary in Oregon (Friday). 
Share our Kickstarter one last time with your friends and family before our campaign ends in 4 days: . Thank you all so much for your continued support and we can't wait to start production very soon!

Hi all :) Just a really short update here that we reached $15,000 in sales yesterday (in a total of 18 days)! Thank you all soo soo much for supporting us throughout this incredibly difficult phase of starting a business. We couldn't have done it without you!

Sincerely,
The Veggie Brothers & Co-founders of Trupo Treats (Brian & Charlie Trupo)

WE DID IT! 
GUYS, WE HAVE REACHED OUR GOAL of $7,500!! The Trupo Treats team literally could not be more grateful for this moment. We want to thank each and every one of you, no matter the size of your pledge, for your contribution to this Kickstarter. Our dream of starting a vegan chocolate company and giving back to animals while also making vegan food more accessible is finally coming to life. Soon, we will start ordering wrappers that will take a couple weeks to get here and then will start production shortly there after. We don't want to promise a final date but just know that we are trying our hardest to make all 5,000 of these chocolate bars as quickly and efficiently as we can!

campaign.story:
Hello! My name is Airu/Iris and I am the owner of Airustotle on Etsy and Instagram. As a Taiwanese-American, I enjoy designing  pins and stickers pulling inspiration from common Asian nostalgic items and foods. Today I'm introducing four (now SIX!) designs to be made into rose gold hard enamel pins! These pins are for all my foodies, video game geeks, and Asian/Korean culture fans out there!
The Designs:
 Stretch Goals: 
(stretch goals will continue to be updated as we reach new milestones!):
1.  PEACH version of Soju-Mana Pin:
Peach Ver. Soju-Mana Potion

*New Peach ver. Soju-mana pin to be unlocked at $2,800! (36mm, Rose gold hard enamel) 
2."Shin" Ramen pin:
*New "Shin" Ramen pin to be unlocked at $3,000! (approx. 30mm, Rose gold hard enamel).
-To add this pin (or additional pins in general) to your pledge, just add ($9/additional pin) to your current pledge for early birds ONLY OR add ($10/additional pin) to your current pledge for regular backers.
 Pin Specifics:
 Kimchi-Health Potion: 28mm in height, 1 pin post
 Soju-Mana Potions: 36mm in height, 2 pin posts
 Citron Tea-Stamina Potion: 30mm in height, 1 pin post
 Kimbap-Powerup Item: 36mm in length, 2 pin posts
*BONUS* Peach ver. Soju-Mana Potion: 36mm in height, 2 pin post (Unlocks at $2,800)
 *BONUS* Shin Ramen-Powerup Item: 30mm in height, 1 pin post (Unlocks at $3,000) 
Backing the campaign! Early birds pay $9/pin+get extra goodies like matching mini stickers and Regular backers pay $10/pin. Extra pins will be sold on my Etsy for $11+/pin. There are four designs that will be unlocked at their respective funding milestones (info in the graphic below).
Pledging is risk free. Since Kickstarter is an all or nothing platform, your money won't leave your account unless the project succeeds. You are also able to change, or even cancel, your pledge at any time before the end of the campaign!
Timeline
 End of Campaign in Mid-July
 Production starts in Mid-July and finishes Late-August
 Ships packages out in Late August-Early September
*Please note that all of these dates are estimates of the timeline. Any major variations from this will laid out for you guys via Updates.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Date of fulfillment may be subject to changes due to Covid-19. I have worked with this manufacturer for several past pins and have good faith that there will also be no issues with the quality. I have also gotten these designs proofed and checked by my manufacturer so designs such be able to completed without major design changes. However, colors on screen differ from those that can be physically mixed so there may be slight differences in pin mockup colors versus the colors in the physical pins. As with any changes, I will be as transparent as possible and will update backers timely!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Also, thank you to those that filled out the optional questions! It seems that many of you are interested in seeing a part 2 of more korean food inspired designs so I will be working on more in the future:)

updates.update_userinfo: IMPORTANT: Slight design change for soju mana + Surveys coming out this week!
updates.update_content:
Hey guys! Just wanted to update with two pieces of news:
1. Surveys will be sent out sometime this week. Just taking the time to double and triple check everything is done right on my end so thank you for your patience!
2. I received some picture updates on the pins from my manufacturer. In particular, I found that there will be a slight design change for the original soju mana (blue) pin. It's a slight difference where part of the cap is filled with yellow enamel rather than being filled entirely with metal as shown in the original mockup (I've attached the new version below). Please note this change when filling out the survey and deciding whether/if this affects your pin design picks. If you have any additional concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me as I know even small details like this can be super important to some. Really sorry for any inconvenience from this design change, but I will do what I can if you let me know!

Now that the campaign is over, here is what to expect next:
I will be sending out the Kickstarter surveys in 14 days (14 days because that's how long Kickstarter takes to fix up and process payments!). On the surveys, you will be able to specify which pins designs you want, how many of them, your mailing address, emails etc. I will send out more reminders about this in 14 days:)

Hey guys! Another reminder as this campaign comes to a close that there are only 3 days left to back these pins so make sure to pledge or adjust pledges now before the campaign ends! I will be working on surveys (where I can ask about the specific pins designs you want and more info, etc.) to send out to you guys in the upcoming days. 
NEW FREEBIE ALERT: 
I will be including a new freebie for orders of 4 or more pins! It will be a clear sticker of a original character (like a pin-sona)!  You can read more about him on my !

Hey guys! We're almost reaching the campaign's last week so gentle reminder to pledge soon if you haven't already! ALSO, new stretch goal alert (details below)! We currently have a total of 6 pin designs (Check out the new banner!) in the Korean food RPG set now so make sure to add the addition pledge amounts if you're interested in copping these additional pins and to also help us unlock them:)

Hey guys! Thanks so much for your support these past few days! I have created a new stretch goal where a
*New "Shin" Ramyun pin will be unlocked at $3,000! (approx. 30mm, Rose gold hard enamel)

updates.update_userinfo: Unlocked ALL designs in 25 hours! Thank you so much!
updates.update_content:
Thank you to all backers for not only helping this Kickstarter reach its initial funding goal in 6 hours, but also unlocking ALL 4 designs in 25 hours?!! As an artist with a small following, I am absolutely blow away at the warm reception.
As an extra thank you, each pin design will now come with their own unique backing card variations! Let me know what you guys would like to see for upcoming stretch goals now that we have unlocked the pins (new pin designs, washi tape, charms, stickers, etc.)!

campaign.story:
Hi! I’m Rachel, a college student and frog enthusiast living in the Bay Area, California. I like to draw frogs. I sell my froggy wares on my website, and also have a monthly pin club/frog cult on Patreon where you get frogs delivered to you every month. I have made 2 successful Kickstarters before this!
I made this bag because it is impossible for me to find a purse that is both cute, holds my water bottle, and also properly displays my love of frogs. i am tired of having to choose between holding my water bottle in my hands or just going dehydrated, so I decided to turn my character Son the Frog into a bag! 
Son the Frog is just your average, every day frog. His hobbies include making new friends, cosplay, and committing crimes. just normal frog stuff 🐸
There are three bags available: a purse, a backpack, and a mini bag! They are all ita bags, due to the clear front pocket. Ita bags allow you to display enamel pins securely inside the pocket without the fear of them falling off! is this all just a marketing scheme to sell more pins? possibly. 🐸
**Please note that shipping for bag tiers will not be charged via Kickstarter. You will pay for it later via Backerkit.**
Please consult this table for shipping prices:

✧ Purse & Backpack features: ✧
a very handsome frog flap that resembles Son the Frog’s face. has 2 magnetic button closures. lift the frog to access the main compartment.
  2 water bottle pockets on the sides. hydrate or diedrate.
  an ita window for displaying pins
  2 removable ita inserts. The default colors are pastel pink & blue. Each insert features a tiny lilypad design on the lower right corner. Wear a different color and different pin collection every day!
  a large compartment that can be used to store things like notebooks, partial skeletons, snacks, etc.
  a padded laptop/tablet compartment. The size of laptop/tablet it will hold varies between the two bags.
  a secret phone pocket on the back right side
  pastel pink interior lining
  5 small pockets on the inside for holding things like pens, small bones, phone chargers, etc. 2 of the pockets have zippers, while 2 have flap magnetic closures.
  cute star shaped zipper pulls on the inner zip pockets. The outside zippers are standard zipper pulls that you can put keychains on. this may or may not be a ploy to sell more frog keychains
  ✧ Purse Special Features: ✧
Dimensions: 13 x 11 x 4 inches (not including height of eye bumps)
  made of PU (faux leather)
  can carry 4.4 lb (2 kg) of weight
  3 interchangeable straps! can be worn with 2 straps as a backpack, or one strap as a purse
  a padded iPad/notebook/illegal document section in the main compartment.
  will Not fit a 13 inch laptop. Can fit a 12 inch iPad in a padded section, and up to 12.75 inches in the non padded area.

  Update July 8th @ 12:45 PM: I didn't know you were supposed to measure laptops by measuring diagonally. Whoops. I have personally tested that a 13 inch laptop won't fit, but I don't have other sizes to test. The height of the interior compartment of the purse is 13 inches at the center, and 11 inches on the sides. So even if your laptop is under 13 inches, the corners will stick out if it is greater than 11 inches. 
**Please note that the purse is Not meant for carrying very heavy items on a regular basis. The interchangeable straps are not meant for carrying heavy loads, and could potentially break if you choose to continually abuse them. If you want to carry around textbooks or large boulders, please consider getting the backpack!**
✧ Backpack Special Features: ✧
Dimensions: 17 x 12 x 5.5 inches (not including height of eye bumps)
  made of waterproof* Oxford fabric
  can carry 11 lb (5 kg) of weight
  weight-bearing padded shoulder straps so you may carry heavy things comfortably
  padded laptop compartment (will Not fit a 17 inch laptop, anything smaller is ok)
  the back features an open pocket, perfect for shoving papers and receipts inside and then promptly forgetting about them
  *Waterproof actually means water resistant. please do not dunk your frog bag in a body of water, he will be wet because water is wet. spills and raindrops are ok. the fabric repels water, but is not meant to be submerged. 
Update July 8th @ 12:45 PM: I didn't know you were supposed to measure laptops by measuring diagonally. Whoops. I have personally tested that a 15 inch laptop will fit, but I don't have a 17 inch to test. The height of the interior compartment of the backpack is 16 inches vertically. Please measure your laptop vertically and see if it will fit!
 new! ✧ Mini Bag ✧
this bag was added last minute out of pity for those international shipping prices. The sample is still being made, so all images and info is subject to slight changes.
Mini Bag features:
Dimensions: 8 x 7 x 2 inches
Ita window dimensions: 4 x 6 inches
made of PU (fake leather). Same material as the purse.
has 2 magnetic flap closures and a 6 inch tall open pocket on the back for shoving your phone in quickly
each compartment has 1 zipper pull.
will Not have interchangeable straps. it can be worn as a purse/crossbody only. the strap will be length from 2 feet to 4 feet. This is because it must be as light as possible to not go over 1 pound for shipping reasons.
can fit an entire Nintendo Switch Lite inside. can fit a normal Switch if you remove the joycons.
perfect for carrying your phone, wallet, keys, and a piece of lint. maybe 2.


Current images are of the prototype made of scrap material. This is not the color that will be used. Other adjustments that will be made to this prototype:
no loop on top
  Son’s nose will be slightly less pointy
  no rings on back for interchangeable strap option. Purse strap will not be removable.
I will update this section as well as on social media with any new info as soon as I have it.
✧ freebies ✧
When you purchase a bag, you will receive the following free items as part of your pledge!
x1 enamel pin. 1.5 inches, with 2 rubber backing posts. The bones in the bag have a pearlescent effect.
x1 faux leather knife keychain. Give to your frog so that he may secure his own skeletons to place inside the bag. 
x2 ita inserts. Each bag comes with default pastel pink and blue. 
The free enamel pin and knife keychain are one per person. If you wish to purchase more, you may do so via Backerkit once the campaign is over. If you pledge for the pin and knife only, you do not get anything free. 
Update, July 10th: As celebration for absolutely destroying the funding goal, knife keychains will now be 1 per bag instead of 1 per person. 
✧ ita inserts ✧
Want more colors to choose from? Need more inserts to display your giant frog pin collection? well you’re in luck because they come in packs of 2; each pack costs $5. All inserts feature a small lilypad design on the lower right corner. There are 6 extra inserts total. 
The following extra inserts will be purchasable once the campaign is over via Backerkit.
Pastels - 1 yellow & 1 light purple insert
  Minimalist - 1 black & 1 white insert
  Holographic - 1 light & 1 blueish purplish insert
  Inserts are NOT interchangeable between any of the bags. If you want multiple bags and multiple insert packs, you will be able to add them to your pledge once the campaign is over via Backerkit. If you do not see the combination of items you want, just go for the correct amount of bags. you can purchase more inserts and pins later. 
 ✧ unlockable stretch goals ✧
i like the color pink. i realize that some people do not. hence, i have made some more neutral color variations as stretch goals. If the dollar amount stated under each bag is met during the Kickstarter, you will be able to select it as an option once the campaign is over via Backerkit. I must have a minimum of 80 people per variation, so if I only get 20 people wanting a specific variation, I’ll have to ask you to choose again. 
$16,000: Backpack - Olive green outside, pastel blue interior lining.
$22,000: Purse - Olive green outside, pastel blue interior lining.
$28,000: Backpack - Dark grey/black outside, lavender interior lining. Color of facial features may change. 
$34,000: Purse - Dark grey/black outside, lavender interior lining. Color of facial features may change. 
$40,000: Purse - Pastel pink outside, pastel pink interior lining. Hot pink blush. this is the opposite of neutral colored
$50,000: Backpack - Pastel pink outside, pastel pink interior lining. Hot pink blush.
Mini bag color variations will unlock when the purse and backpack versions have both been unlocked. So if we reach $22,000, all 3 bags will be unlocked in olive. 
**Please note that colors chosen are approximate, and will vary between the two bags due to differences in the material.**
Edit July 8th @ 2pm: oh geez we already hit all the goals. i don't have time to make another graphic so here's the new color goals:
$75,000:  Lavender color for all bags
$95,000: Shimmery silver color for minibag and purse only (the backpack fabric doesn't have a shimmer option)
$105,000: Yellow for all bags (pastel for mini and purse, brighter for backpack)
✧ how this works: ✧
The Kickstarter campaign will run for 2 weeks. If you pledge, you will not be charged until the campaign ends. Once the campaign is over, I will be using Backerkit. Backerkit acts as a campaign extension and pre-order store. You will be able to select what variations you want, as well as purchase different add-ons, such as extra inserts or bags. This is also where you will pay for shipping. If you missed out on the campaign, you will still be able to pre-order what you want via the Backerkit pre-order store.
✧ you Must check your email: ✧
 do not just pledge and assume you will get your bag without having to do anything else. please use an email that you will check, and keep an eye out for emails from Kickstarter and Backerkit. If you do not fill out your Backerkit survey when it is sent to you, I will not be able to send you your bags. instead i will just keep your Kickstarter money until you ask me for a refund, or pay the shipping you owe. 
You should also keep an eye on your email in case your Kickstarter payment doesn't go through. If there is an issue when Kickstarter tries to collect your payment when the campaign is over, you will have only 1 week to fix it. 
✧ timeline: ✧
Once the campaign ends, it will take 2 weeks for Kickstarter to give me the funds so that I may purchase the goods. In those two weeks, I will set up the Backerkit preorder store. Backers do not need to access Backerkit until I send out the surveys, and that is when you will be able to purchase add ons. 
I will then wait 1-2 weeks until I have everyone's surveys, requested add-ons, and shipping payments.
Bag production is estimated to take 1 month. Due to the heavy load, they must be shipped to me via boat, which will take 30-35 days. After that, it will take me ?? weeks to check all bags, pack, and ship. I am a full time student, so how long this takes greatly depends on my school schedule and how many family members I am able to force into helping me. 
The current time estimation is October, 2020. But that is just an estimate. I would like to avoid the holidays as much as possible, so at the Very latest things would be mailed out in November. worst case scenario, though. 
✧ questions? ✧
If you have any urgent questions, please do not message me via Kickstarter! Please use the contact form on my website to get in touch, and I'll respond to your email as soon as I am able. but please first check the Kickstarter FAQ, the bag FAQ currently on my website, and read over this whole article closely to see if your question has already been answered.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
• COVID: Outbreaks could happen and cause delays in manufacturing or shipment to me. Some countries are currently not accepting packages from the US, so please check your local postal office to see if you are able to receive mail from me.
• Shipping delays: Depending on how many orders I receive, there may be a delay in how long it takes me to sort, pack, and ship. I run my shop by myself and am a full time student. I recruit my mom into helping me, but due to COVID can't recruit any friends into helping. The current timeframe is only an estimate. I can guarantee they will be shipped before November.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Less than 15% of orders remaining to be shipped!
updates.update_content:
Finally, I can see the light at the end of the tunnel! We are so close to the end, and I am super grateful to everyone who has waited so patiently!

The current status of things:
I have shipped all mini bags, inserts, wallets, keychains, & pins to my warehouse for them to fulfill
I have shipped as many backpacks as I could, and all but a few boxes of the medium purses.

updates.update_userinfo: 83% done, shipping remaining bags to warehouse
updates.update_content:
Quick update letting folks who are still waiting for bags know that the rest of the bags are being sent to my warehouse for them to fulfill. They are a lot faster than I am. I am hoping everyone's orders will be shipped out during the month of May! If you haven't gotten tracking information from me yet, that means your order will be fulfilled by the warehouse. 

~Rachel

If you’d like to know my Immediate Packing Status instead of waiting for monthly Kickstarter updates, I now have a status update page on my website. I update it frequently & provide details on where I’m at.

Current Progress

updates.update_userinfo: 58% done with fulfillment! & don’t toss silica packets
updates.update_content:
if you have already received your items, you can safely ignore my remaining email updates. These will just be updates for folks still waiting on their packages.
Don’t throw away the silica packets!!
In the bags packaging, there are usually 2 tiny white packets that say silica, do not eat. These things absorb smells. Put them inside your frog bag instead of tossing them out!! This is the fastest way to remove any fishy smells your frogs might have inside. Once the smell is gone from all interior pockets, you can throw away the packets.

updates.update_userinfo: The rest of the bags and inserts have Finally arrived!
updates.update_content: After fighting the delivery company for over a week (which was a process of many phone calls, begging, and tears), the remaining frog bags and inserts have been delivered to my storage unit! My dad and I spent all day yesterday helping the nice delivery man get them into the unit, and then started trying to locate the 5 unmarked boxes of inserts from their random locations in the stacks. We managed to find 3 after hours of hunting. 😭

updates.update_userinfo: Large backpacks & inserts trapped in warehouse, hopefully freed soon
updates.update_content:
Hello to everyone who hasn't received their frogs yet! I wanted to provide an update to y'all on frog status, since it is very sad to see others already enjoying their frogs!
The bags reached the port near me over a week ago, and have been sitting in a port warehouse. A big winter storm this last week across the US has caused a lot of shipping delays, and now there is a huge backlog of shipments that arrived at the warehouse, which pushed my frogs to the back. Because for some reason frogs do not take priority over other shipments for large companies or important supplies.

I have printed almost 38% of all labels!
My sister, my dad, and I have been working nonstop every day packing frog bags! It is chaotic, but we are getting through the orders as fast as we can!

Things that are in my house:

updates.update_userinfo: many bags have arrived at my house
updates.update_content:
3 FedEx trucks full of boxes arrived, which is more than the 18 boxes I was expecting. I have no clue what is in the boxes. I am pretty sure they are mint purses and mini bags, but I honestly have no clue. I will be locking orders and shipping stuff out based on what boxes I am able to reach.

If you need to change your address, please do so via your Backerkit confirmation email. If you lost that email, you can get a new one from frogbag.backerkit.com ! If you are moving soon but don't know where you will be when it is shipped out, Even if your address is locked now I might not be able to ship it for a few weeks, depending on what I am able to excavate out of the garage.

updates.update_userinfo: Frog bags have started arriving at my house!
updates.update_content:
I randomly got a shipment today of 2 boxes! One contains mint purses, the other mint mini bags!

I supposedly will be receiving 4 more boxes on Monday the 18th. The other 10 boxes from this first batch will be delivered according to the whims of FedEx. This first batch of 16 total boxes contains mint purses, all mini bags, and knife keychains.

updates.update_userinfo: Charging cards on Jan 8th, bags on their way to me
updates.update_content:
If you are paying via card on Backerkit: I will charge all cards on Friday, January 8th!
• If there is something wrong with your payment info when I try to charge, Backerkit will email you and let you know. Please fix it as soon as you are able to, delays will result in your order being filled last.

campaign.story:
Hey All, I'm Liz, artist behind @LizHarryDesign and this is my 16th Kickstarter  - I'm a graphic designer by trade and love my side hustle making products inspired by my many FEELINGS. My designs are centred around the themes of self-care & work I'm doing around my own self-doubt as I navigate this journey of making a living from what I draw!   
Me celebrating my lockdown birthday in April by turning myself into a bday cupcake!
All the items in this collection are inspired by living through these first months of isolation.
I designed them because visual reminders REALLY help me - and I'm hoping they'll be talismans for self-care for you lovely peeps through these unusual times. 
Sample of the battery pin in pastel & nickel
The campaign finishes 31st July and I'm hoping to have the funded rewards ready to start shipping late AUGUST. Though these designs are inspired by this lockdown period my hope is they'll bring comfort through any period of crisis. 
All rewards now UNLOCKED!!!

One of the illustrations that'll feature the colouring book, A4 with 20 illustrations
If the project hits its funding goal you can pick the colour-way you'd like of any of the pins in the survey after the campaign ends - for your pledge just select the AMOUNT of items you'd like.
To say thank you to you the wonderful Kickstarter Community, for making these designs a reality I'm including some fun extras with your rewards:
  FREE large holographic vinyl sticker with a pledge for any item
 All backers instantly get this with their pledge! 
 U N L O C K E D 
Free Holographic ticket sticker with EVERY PLEDGE!
FREE Postcard Print Set of 4 postcards with a pledge for any item
 We’ve reached 100 backers so every backer will get these in with their pledge! 
 U N L O C K E D 
Postcard set in with EVERY pledge!
FREE Enamel Pin for all backers with a pledge for 2 or more items
We’ve reached 200 backers so every pledge of 2 or more items will include a free TAKE THE NAP pin!
 U N L O C K E D 
FREE 'TAKE THE NAP' sleep mask pin for pledges of 2 items or above. In Pink & Gold / Mint & Nickel OR Lilac & Nickel
If you'd like to add items to your pledge, you can do this by adding the amount to  your pledge.
For example, if you pledged for a 2 Item Earlybird -  £16 + £2  for U.K. shipping costs and you decided that you wanted to add a fourth item (£8) your new total would be: £16 + £2 + £8 = £26 
I've got to say...without your pledges & the kickstarter community I couldn't make my collections happen - you do that - it makes all the difference to me as a small biz. So not only do I make my kickstarter pledges extra special as a backer I'll always let you know first about upcoming product drops and seconds sales via updates.
And as a Kickstarter backer to one of my campaigns you get exclusive prices, EARLY BIRD REWARDS - and if that isn't enough already you'll also get the exclusive freebies!
Finished pins from my summer 2019 kickstarter
This project will run from beginning to end of July. It takes around two weeks for Kickstarter to collect funds and transfer them to me. As soon as funds are transferred, the rewards will immediately go into production. This can take up to around 3 weeks, and if there are any delays I will of course let you all know.
Beginning of September - Rewards will begin to ship! Delivery times are estimated below:
 UK - 3-5 working days
 Rest of the World - 3-4 weeks depending on recipients postal service
Finished pins from my 2018 Halloween kickstarter campaign
Please double check your address details are correct so I can get your rewards to you safely and speedily.
💌 UK Backers
                               Your pins will be sent out Royal Mail Signed For Second Class
💌 Backers outside the UK
                               Your pins will be sent out International Standard Service. Pledges over 5 pins will be sent International Tracked. I always get proof of postage for everything I send out, just in case :)
💌OUT OUT OF THE UK if you're international and under 5 items and would prefer you item tracked please add an additional £4.50 to your pledge this expedited service takes approx 7-10 working days and I'll DM you your tracking number through kickstarter once your reward is shipped.
Completed pins from the Halloween 2019 kickstarter
Thank you so much for checking out my new campaign! I couldn't do any of this without the encouragement and support of all you amazing peeps, and I'm so grateful for the time to take to read, comment, share & pledge!
If you'd like to come say hi on social media and follow along with my shenanigans click on the images to follow me in the following spots,
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
These enamel items are being manufactured for me - potentially we could hit delays if the manufacturer experiences any issues - but this is my 16th project and I'm working with a manufacturer who has shown themselves to have a high quality of work and to deliver on time - so hopefully all good!

If, however, there are any delays, I will keep all backers updated in my KICKSTARTER UPDATES.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
This is a merch line made for fans, by a fan, to celebrate to return of a band who defined a generation and gave us all the will to keep on living. This one's for all you rock n' rollers, all you crash queens and motor babies: Listen up, and check out the campaign below!
The original goal is to fund 8 pin designs. There are two pins representing each era, but you can choose any number of pins in any combination as your reward!
Pins have gold metal plating are soft enamel with epoxy coating (AKA the look of hard enamel, but with more detail!) They vary slightly in size, all between 1.6" (40mm) and 1.75” (45mm). All pins come on a backing card with rubber pin backs, and all pins have 2 posts for stability.
You can select any number of, and any combination of pins in your reward.
Check out the Stretch Goals to see what other pins and merchandise can be unlocked once the original goal is reached!
After the original goal is reached, stretch goals can be unlocked at these levels:
PIN SETS • UNLOCKED!!
Pin sets have the same specs as the original 8 designs. Each set includes two pins.
LAST WORDS SET HAS UNLOCKED at $4,500 and includes both pins shown below. 
 SUMMERTIME SET HAS UNLOCKED at $6,000 and includes both pins shown below. 
The cost of each pin set is $20.
STICKERS • UNLOCKED!!
Stickers of the original 8 designs HAVE BEEN UNLOCKED at $7,500.  
Each sticker is around 3x3" in size and is holographic. They're also weatherproof! 
Stickers will be available at:
 $5 each
 $30 for a set of 8 (Save 25%!)
*PLEASE NOTE: There is an error in the copy for the Three (3) Pins reward tier. The set of 8 stickers does NOT come with that reward. I'm so sorry for the confusion!*
T-SHIRT • UNLOCKED!!
The Lady of Sorrows t-shirt HAS BEEN UNLOCKED at $10,000.
Details of the Lady of Sorrows shirt design (with watermark).
Shirts feature a small pocket design on the front and a large back design. Each shirt is individually silkscreened with off-white ink onto a black fashion tee made of 100% combed ring-spun cotton (that means they're suuuuper soft).
Each Lady of Sorrows Shirt is $30.
Shirts are unisex sizing and available in sizes XS - 3XL. Size chart available below:
PENNANT • UNLOCKED!!
The Not Okay pennant HAS BEEN UNLOCKED at $12,500.
Detail of the Not Okay pennant (with watermark).
These traditional pennants are made of black felt with a white and red screen printed design. Pennants are 9x27” in size.
Each Not Okay pennant is $25. 
Mock up of the Not Okay pennant as wall decor.
TOTE BAG • UNLOCKED!!
The To The End tote bag HAS BEEN UNLOCKED at $15,000. 
Tote bags are made of black heavy-weight canvas (12oz as opposed to the thinner 6oz) and feature an off-white screen printed design. Each bag is 15x16” in size.
Each To The End tote bag is $20.
Detail of the To The End design (with watermark).
BANDANA • UNLOCKED!!
The Art is the Weapon bandana HAS BEEN UNLOCKED at $17,500.
Two views of the Art is the Weapon mock up.
Bandanas are made of 100% cotton, black fabric with a yellow screen-printed design. Each bandana is 22x22” when fully unfolded. They can be worn as an accessory and even look good hung on a wall!
Each Art is the Weapon bandana is $15.
Detail of the Art is the Weapon bandana design (with watermark).
BASEBALL T-SHIRT • UNLOCKED!!
The To The End baseball tee HAS BEEN UNLOCKED at $20,000.
Shirts feature a front design on a baseball-style t-shirt. Each shirt is individually silkscreened with white ink onto a black-and-white tee made of 52% combed ring-spun cotton and 48% polyester. Shirts feature a black base with white collar and sleeve detailing.
Detail of the To The End design can be found under the Tote Bag section.
Each To The End baseball tee is $40.
Shirts are unisex sizing and available in sizes XS - 2XL. Size chart available below:
BANNER • UNLOCKED!!
The House of Wolves banner HAS BEEN UNLOCKED at $22,500.

These banners are made of black felt with a white and yellow screen printed design. Each banner is 18x24” in size and has two grommets for hanging in the top corners.
Each House of Wolves banner is $55.
Mock ups of the House of Wolves banner as wall decor.
Detail of the House of Wolves banner mock up (with watermark).
 FREE STICKER • UNLOCKED!! 
The To The End sticker HAS BEEN UNLOCKED at $47,500.
The To The End sticker is a holographic sticker that will be included FREE with every pledge! The sticker is approximately 3x4" in size, black with holographic detailing, and is also water-resistant like the other stickers in the campaign.
LIMITED EDITION PINS • UNLOCKED!!
The Limited Edition Colorway Pins HAVE BEEN UNLOCKED at $60,000.
Pins have the same specs as the original designs, but with a limited edition red-dyed metal color way. These pins will ONLY be made for this campaign.
RETURN PIN • UNLOCKED!!
The Limited Edition Return Pin HAS BEEN UNLOCKED at $75,000.
The Return pin comes in both gold and red color ways with similar specs to the other pins in the campaign. Backers who pledge $75 or more (before shipping) will receive a Return pin FREE with their pledge.
Backers will also be able to choose the Return pin as an individual pin if they have not backed for $75 or more. The Return pin will automatically be added to pledges that include the All Pins or All Pins + All Pin Sets in the corresponding color to the set that you choose.
FREE STICKER • UNLOCKED!!
The Return Holographic Sticker HAS BEEN UNLOCKED at $80,000.
The Return sticker is a holographic sticker that will be included FREE with every pledge! The sticker is approximately 2x3" in size, black and white with holographic detailing, and is also water-resistant like the other stickers in the campaign. 
DAD HATS • UNLOCKED!!
The Look Alive Sunshine and Not Okay dad hats have been unlocked at $85,000.
Hats are soft cotton in the popular “dad hat” style with embroidered detailing. The Look Alive Sunshine hat is black with yellow and white embroidered detail. The Not Okay hat is black with a red brim, and has red and white detailing.
Hats are sold separately. The cost of each hat is $20.
PLEASE NOTE: Hats are NOT included in the “All Merch” bundle, as they were added late after the bundle was created. To receive a hat, you must add the necessary costs to your existing pledge (use the Pledge Calculator below to help!) or pledge at the Dad Hat tier.
Look Alive Sunshine dad hat mock up.
Not Okay dad hat mock up.
Can't find the perfect tier pledge for you? That's okay! I've put together this Pledge Calculator to help you figure out how to pledge for the merch you want. The instructions and calculator chart are below.
STEP 1: Select the reward tier for the most expensive item that you want. Example: If you're interested in an enamel pin ($12), a tote bag ($20) and a banner ($55), choose the banner ($55 + $8 shipping) reward tier to start.
STEP 2: Now you'll be adding the funds needed for the rest of your items. The guide shows each item and their cost + shipping. Add the necessary funds for each item you choose to pledge for. Example: An enamel pin is $12 and shipping is free. A tote bag is $20 + $5 shipping. $12 + $20 + $5 = $37 gets added.
STEP 3: Add all your numbers together. Starting reward tier + additional item total + additional shipping total = PLEDGE TOTAL. Example: $55 starting (+$8 shipping) + $32 (added item cost) + $5 (added shipping cost) =  $100 TOTAL.
Have any questions? Do the numbers not quite add up, or does your shipping seem off? Send an email to deadkickstarter@gmail.com and I'll help you sort it out!
ADD ON ITEMS COST:
 July 24 - Kickstarter campaign ends.
 Mid-August - Surveys sent out after funding.
 September - Production of rewards.
 October - November - Fulfillment and shipment to all backers.
Please keep in mind: This predicted timeline is based on turnaround estimates given by manufacturers and my own experience in fulfilling Kickstarters and pre-orders.
 Your pledge will go towards:
 Production of rewards - 60%
 Shipping and shipping supplies - 30%
 Taxes + Fees - 10%
These percentages may change slightly as stretch goals are reached.
Any questions, concerns, or just want to give me a shout on social media? Here are all the places you can find me and my work:
Website | Twitter | Instagram
Feel free to shoot me an email at deadkickstarter@gmail.com and I'll get back to you as soon as possible!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my second Kickstarter campaign, my first over 750% funded with all rewards sent out on schedule. I'm very familiar with the pin production process and have a reliable manufacturer I work with. The stretch goal products will be new ventures for me, but I'm working closely with the small businesses helping me bring this project to life and am confident they'll help me through any issues. 

COVID-19 may affect production and shipping times, but I've tried to account for any delays in my timeline and hope to stick to it. All buyers will be kept informed throughout the process and will be aware of delays for any reason.

The images used in this campaign are digital mock-ups of the final products and minor adjustments to the design may occur during production.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping is Almost Complete + Restocks and Brand New Merch!
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers and Friends,
It's with much excitement (and relief) that I announce: Shipping on Back From The Dead is almost complete! I can't believe this project began eight months ago and is coming to a (near) close with over 2,000 packages being sent out to all of you. As one project wraps up, another can begin... We'll get into that more in the update, though.
Shipping Update as of November 20th

updates.update_userinfo: Pins are Here! Shipping Update + New Merch Line Coming Soon!
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers and Friends!
Since you've probably gleaned the important info from the title of this update already, let's jump into it: The pins have arrived! They are here, beautiful and shiny and plentiful, to say the least. Now that I have the pins in-hand, here's what it means for the shipping timeline:
Shipping Update

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping is Starting! Everything You Need To Know
updates.update_content:
Hey Backers and Friends,
I can't believe I'm finally saying this: Shipping will begin on October 2nd! It's been a long road to get here, but I'm so excited to get these merch items into your hands and hope you'll find it was well worth the wait.
In the interest of full transparency– and I mean full, after reading this update you will know everything that I know– I'm going to outline everything about what I'm doing on my end, so you know what to expect from this part of the process. Please read everything if you can find the few minutes to spare, so you know what's coming up in the next month and a half.

updates.update_userinfo: Production is Underway, Cards are Getting Charged + a Pin Sneak Peek!
updates.update_content:
Hey backers and friends,
August 31st was the official last day for surveys and pre-orders, which means we get to move into the next exciting phase of Back From The Dead. But first I wanted to say thank you again to all of you who filled out your surveys, added on items, shared and ordered from the pre-order store: You helped get this project just shy of $180,000. There aren't words for what I feel when I realize that 2,088 of you helped make this merch line a reality. Thank you for all of your support, in the many ways you gave it.
Production on the merch is underway!

Hey Backers and Friends,
As we get ready to move into the next phase of the campaign, we first have to wrap up this one...
 This is the LAST CALL for surveys + survey updates!

updates.update_userinfo: Surveys are Coming 8/10 + A Secret Menu Item!
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers and Friends!
Exciting but (relatively) short update for you today, becaaaause...
Surveys are coming on Monday, August 10!
It's time! Starting on Monday, August 10th you’ll receive an email with a special link to your personalized BackerKit survey. , since I need the information gathered from surveys to start production and fulfill rewards!

updates.update_userinfo: The End. (But Really, Just the Beginning!): What Comes Next
updates.update_content:
Hey backers and friends,
It was 2013 and I was two months shy of graduating from art school when my favorite band in the world broke up. Back then my dream was to make a career designing t-shirts, posters, any kind of art that was both unique and affordable, but at the very, very top of my bucket list? Design their merch. Though I'm grateful to have made many cool things and accomplished a lot in my career, I'd long since made peace with the fact that I probably wouldn't ever get that dream opportunity.

updates.update_userinfo: Dad Hats, Free Pins + Stickers, and One Week to Go!
updates.update_content:
Hey Backers and Friends,
We're staring down the final week of the Back From The Dead campaign, and I couldn't be more grateful: There are over 1,000 of you now– which is blowing my mind– and together we've raised well over $80,000 to bring all sorts of merch to life. With one week left to go, I can't wait to see where these last few days take us.
With that in mind, here are some things you should know about the home stretch:
The Final Stretch Goal: Dad Hats

updates.update_userinfo: New Pins and Stretch Goals + Seeking Promotional Help on Your Favorite Platforms!
updates.update_content:
Hey Backers and Friends!
Here we are at Update #2 with three weeks left in the campaign. I don't want to bombard you guys with updates, so I'm trying to space them out and wait until I've got a bunch of things to talk about at once. 
First and foremost: Thank you to all of the new backers that have come on since my last update, and thank you again to everyone who's been here from the jump! There are 765 of you now who've put over $64,000 into the campaign– I don't even know how to comprehend those numbers, my mind is just blown. Every single pledge matters and I can't thank you enough for making this merch line possible.

project_data.project_name: Back from the Dead: Enamel Pin + Merch Line

campaign.story:
Base Goal: Art Block. A cute white block at wit's end, completely distraught and frustrated with splatters of paint on it. (Unlocked)
Hi, it's Geoffrey! I'm a pin artist and graphic designer. Follow me on Instagram (@itsgeoffrey) and check out my Etsy Shop for pins I've already created!
Creative Clout is a pin collection to celebrate the joys (and frustrations) of being a digital illustrator and graphic designer. With silly puns and relatable lines like "Make it Pop," Creative Clout was made for the modern artist.
This pin project will allow me to focus on each element using some of the best quality materials possible. Each pin will be hard enamel with a brilliantly reflective, rose gold finish. They range from a generous size of 1.5" (38mm) to a statement-piece-worthy size of 1.75" (44.5mm). The pins will be mounted on their own special cards with a secret message behind each pin.
Backer's Tips
Risk-free pledging: Pledge now, pay later! You can also increase, decrease, or cancel your pledge before the end of the campaign. If this campaign doesn't reach its goal, you will not be charged. Please pledge for as much as you think you'd like. 
Limited time offers: Pledges cannot be changed after the end of the campaign, so make sure you get everything you want! Also, Early Bird specials are only available for a limited time.
Lowest price possible: Backing this project not only guarantees that these pins will be produced, but will also guarantee you're getting high-quality pins at the lowest price possible! Pins after this campaign will be available on my Etsy for $12 each (+shipping) rather than the Kickstarter special of $10 each (+shipping) or Kickstarter Early Bird special of $9 each (+shipping)!
Customize your pledge: Want more pins than your pledge is worth? Add $10 per additional pin you would like to receive! For example: To get 5 pins and you select a 3× Hard Enamel Pin pledge, add $20 + shipping to your total. You can adjust your pledge while the campaign is still live, so you can change your pin pledge until June 19th, 10PM HST.  
My goal is to get my entire pin series successfully backed. If my base goal is surpassed, I'll incrementally unlock these designs.
A Folder with a Cute Face with the caption "Back Up Your Files" Stretch Goal (Unlocked)
Dollar Bills with "Exposure" written on it Stretch Goal (Unlocked)
Vector Arch with the caption "I Love My Curves" Stretch Goal (Unlocked)
Windows with the caption "Make It Pop" Stretch Goal (Unlocked)
A Moon and Cloud with the caption "Dream in RGB" Stretch Goal (Unlocked)
A Sun and Cloud with the caption "Live in CMYK" Stretch Goal (Unlocked)
Crop Tool with the caption "I Don't Give a Crop" Stretch Goal (Unlocked)
Stack of files with the caption "Font Hoarder" Stretch Goal (Unlocked)
Funding Info: Production (73%), Shipping (12%), Kickstarter Fees (10%), Packaging (5%)
 Majority of my funding will be allocated to production of pins and fees. If all stretch goals are unlocked, I will be able to allocate a little more towards packaging!    
 Based on my past projects with my manufacturer, I can expect my pins to be produced and shipped to me by early August. From there, I will grade and package the pins myself and begin sending out orders early to mid-August. Should there be any delays in the timeline, I will update all my backers on Kickstarter.
 I'm an artist and post illustrations and comics on Instagram. The comics centered around graphic design and art humor quickly gained popularity and are the reason why I want to produce this pin series.
I've been selling merchandise for over 10 years and started selling enamel pins for the past 2 years. I also design stickers, homemade embroidery patches, and paint mini canvases for sale on Etsy Below are a few pins I designed over the past few years and I cannot wait to order my next round of designs. 
A gallery of some of the pins I have created in the past 2 years.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Enamel colors and rose gold finish may differ from my digital illustrations as colors are finalized. This is a natural part of the pin making process. I am confident with my pin vendor and they are also dedicated to producing the highest quality pins they can. 

My projected timeline is fairly generous, but if there are any delays on production due to color errors, I will communicate with my backers as quickly and as transparently as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
My pins will be produced using casted zinc alloy for long-lasting durability. Typical pins are produced with stamped iron, a low-cost material that will not last as long.
Sustainable materials
Despite being a package-loving designer, I have a commitment to produce low-impact packaging. I plan to use minimalistic, recyclable cards that will not contain harmful or unsustainable finishes. My packaging will be dedicated to protecting your pins with minimal impact to the environment.

When the campaign is complete, I will send out a survey with an option for backers to opt-out of extra packaging to minimize waste.

updates.update_content:
Hi Everyone,
I was busy this weekend pumping out rewards and I am pleased to say that almost all rewards have been sent. Please check your emails for the tracking numbers! Please message me if you have not received one and I'll be more than happy to locate it for you.
If you wanted to add more pins to your reward but have not paid via Paypal, your package was put on hold. Please check your messages and we'll sort out outstanding payments and get your reward back on its way to you!

Hey everyone,
Yesterday, I posted onto my IG Story a series of videos giving you folks a closer look at each and every pin. At the very end, there was a surprise cloud clutch upgrade I offered to all of my backers for a very limited time. I only had 100 pins-worth of clutches and they were gone within a few hours. Thank you everyone that responded so quickly! I thought it would be a nice little thing that I could do for my backers and you all are so hardcore.
If you still wanted cloud clutches, please support my fellow pin maker @magic_circle (this is her etsy) She and her friends custom made these clutches.

updates.update_userinfo: A Special Surprise! Don't miss this free upgrade.
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!
It seems like we're making good time right now. The manufacturer is almost finished completing my pins and they look fantastic, if I do say so myself! The last pin to be produced is Dream in RGB, which unfortunately missed the group shot, but I'm sure will come out beautifully. Below is the photo I was sent today. I'm super excited! Are you?
My postcards and card backings are also in production and are expected to reach me at the end of this month. I was able to splurge on nicer cards since we unlocked every tier, so I'm pretty excited about that. I'm a print geek, so any time I get to see my designs produced in physical form is such a treat.

updates.update_userinfo: So close, you can almost taste it! (And a special KS surprise)
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
Mondays couldn't get any better. As of this afternoon, Font Hoarder was unlocked. What does that mean? It means we completed ALL STRETCH GOALS!
What does that mean?
This means that every design is guaranteed to be produced! If you haven't updated your pledge just yet, make sure you do that now! With less than 2 weeks go to on this campaign, once pledges are closed, Make sure you pledge for as many pins as you would like. Every design is now available!

campaign.story:
My name is Savannah and I am the creator behind Bulbalana! This will  be my fifth Kickstarter, with my previous three being very successful! I  am happy to now say that I have a little over a year of pin making experience under  my belt and over 50 designs brought to life. It has been a life changing  journey that I hope to continue with this Kickstarter! Before I start  rambling, let us move onto the designs.
It is important to remember that you are not  charged until the goal is met AND the Kickstarter ends! Pledge now, pay  later! So if you see something you want unlocked, the sooner you pledge  the better! 
 The Designs
*example image of the background spun to show all three scenes.


Timeline
✦ June 5th - Kickstarter Launches for 20 Days
✦ June 19th - Kickstarter ends
✦ Allow 14-17 days for Errored Payments to be corrected and funds to be released. 
✦ Early July - Manufacturing Begins, allow 4-6 weeks for production and delivery.
✦ Late August - Pins received, graded, and shipping of pledges begins.
✦ Early September - The last of pledges have been shipped. September is included in the timeline as a buffer to help account for any delays or  longer production time if a large amount of pins are ordered.
Budget
✦ 60%- Manufacturing and shipment of pins to me!
✦ 25% - Packaging and Shipping
✦ 5% - Additional Pin costs (if remakes or changes are needed)
✦ 10% -Kickstarter Fees
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
✦ The final pins may vary slightly from the designs shown here. This may happen because of the manufacturing process of making pins real! If there are any major changes that need to be made, which I do not expect to happen, all backers will be notified! 

✦ Delays in shipping and production of pins may occur and are expected when creating enamel pins. This may happen because of production errors and manufacturing defects. If there are any delays, all backers will be immediately notified! 

✦ I will be ordering these pins through a manufacturer that I have a established relationship with. I do trust the quality of their product but because every single pin is handmade, there is expected to be minor defects or flaws. Standard grade pins will be used to fulfill pledges and these pins may have minor defects that are only visible under extremely close inspection. Pins with more noticeable flaws are Seconds grade and will not be used to fulfill pledges. Seconds quality pins will be sold in my shop at a discounted rate. By pledging to this campaign, you agree to these grading standards. 

✦ Please double check your address to reduce the chance of a package being lost! Once a package is mailed, it is out of my control but I will do my best to assist and accommodate for any lost packages. All domestic packages will be sent with tracking information. Due to the high cost of international shipping, they will not be sent with tracking information. 
 
✦ Backers are responsible for any extra duties or customs fees
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hello friends ❤
In this journey I hope to bring a bunch of motivational designs to life so we can share some positive vibes in this community. 
Instead of the usual 2" stickers, I'm planning to do 3" stickers this time! And all acrylic keychains will be holographic. Because the bigger, the easier to get the message out right? :D 
Remember Kickstarter doesn't charge you until end of the campaign, so you can pledge now and pay later! It'll help me unlock my goals faster so do consider pledging early!
Initial Goals
Self Care Chansey & I Got Chu
You Can Be Anything / Fight For Justice
Stay Hydrated 
Dream Big / Never Give Up 
You Are BOOtiful 
Me Time 
Ally
Love is Love
Sticker & Keychain Designs

All base shipping prices in the Kickstarter project are for untracked shipping, to help you save costs. In each tier there's details to upgrade to tracked shipping, you can simply add it to your pledge to upgrade it :) 
Shipping times vary between different countries - there may be delays due to the pandemic, but hopefully by the time this project ends, things will be much better in the world :) 
Regular Shipping Estimates (due to the coronavirus, shipping times are almost double regular shipping times, I'll be posting updates if any issues arrise) 
USA - 14-30 business days
Canada: 14 - 20 business days
Europe- 14-40 business days
Asia: 5-10 business days
Others: 20-50 business days
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
• Actual colours may look different in real life compared to how they look on our screens. These are also my own mockup designs, and are not confirmed artwork proofs from my manufacturer, so there may be changes in sizes of the pins (in case details are too small), changes in colour or slight tweaks to details.
• I use pantone colouring to ensure the colour comes out as intended. However mistakes and delays in manufacturing are out of my control. Fortunately I have a very good relationship with my manufacturer and will keep everyone updated in case of any issues or delays
• The base tier shipping costs are for untracked shipping. Unfortunately, I will not be able to reship rewards if they go missing in the mail. I rarely have packages go missing but I do recommend upgrading to tracked shipping (cost reflected in each tier rewards) for security and a peace of mind.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

project_data.project_name: Motivational & Positivity Pins

campaign.story:
Hello! I'm Mollie or @sugarxnova on instagram! I'm an artist, sweets-lover and enamel pin maker.
I've made many art-based enamel pins in the past and wanted to make a new set for this year! My hope is to create something artists will proudly wear as we keep making the art that we love so much!
You can increase, decrease or even cancel your pledge at any time during the Kickstarter! You will only be charged when the Kickstarter campaigns ends. If we don't reach our goal by the end of the the campaign date you will not be charged!
Pledging helps to unlock designs! You can pledge for all the items you want, regardless of their locked/unlocked status. Let's work together to get all these designs unlocked!
Pledging will not only help the pins get produced, but will give you a great discount! After this campaign has ended, all the unlocked pins and stickers will be sold for a higher price in my online store! 
If you are an early bird backer or regular backer and you would like to add additional pins or stickers to your pledge: add $11 per pin and/or $2 per sticker to your current pledge total.
-
To change your pledge tier, click the the "Manage Your Pledge" button (at the top of the campaign page or by clicking your current reward tier). Then click the "Change your pledge" button and select "New reward tier".
To change your pledge amount, click the the "Manage Your Pledge" button (at the top of the campaign page or by clicking your current reward tier). Then click the "Change your pledge" button. Add your add-on total to the current pledge amount and it will update! 
 All parcels within the United States will receive a tracking number once the orders are shipped!
For international backers:
International parcels are shipped using a Global Advantage Program. This postage method is only partially tracked in order to keep costs low for international backers. It is commonly only tracked until the destination county. Packages very rarely get lost in the mail, but if in the unlikely event this does happen, just reach out to me and I will make sure your are taken care of. I can be reached by email at hellosugarnova@gmail.com
Also, please be aware that International backers are responsible for any customs fees their country may ask for, so plan accordingly! 
 Returns: If for any reason you are unhappy with your purchase and would like to return it, simply send the pins to me and I will refund you the cost of the pins. (unfortunately, shipping costs are non-refundable). Returned pins must be in new condition.
Customer service is very important to me! Be sure to check out the 650+ 5-star reviews on my etsy!
April 24th - Kickstarter Launches
May 4th - Kickstarter Ends
May 5-10th - Surveys sent out
Mid May - Production order placed
Mid-Late June - Orders packed and sent off to backers!
Thank you so much for your support and pledges! Every single pledge is SO appreciated and I'm really excited to see what we can unlock together!!
xoxo, Mollie @sugarxnova
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Delays in the pins' production and color variations are always a possibility when dealing with enamel pin manufacturers. I have a trusted manufacturer that I have used many times and feel confident in their abilities to get the pins made correctly and on time.

I will keep all my backers updated continuously throughout the process and will do my best to keep everything moving smoothly. Please check back on this page for updates or email me at hellosugarnova@gmail.com if you have any additional questions.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
