project_data.project_name: Maker Magic II - Art Based Enamel Pins

campaign.story:
Hi! I’m MJ and this is my ninth Kickstarter project for my brand, o.mj studio!
This collection will feature an assortment of LIQUID CATS in all shapes and sizes!
Reaching the initial goal of S$300 would unlock the first Pin - BOBA CAT!
The remaining pins will be available as Stretch Goals! By pledging, you'll get the pins at a discount and any extras will then be sold on my Online Store. Also, your credit card will not be charged until the campaign ends successfully so don’t worry (':
The pins are hard enamel and are about 1 - 1.3 inches (specifics are provided below) with gold plating. They will come with my brand logo at the back as well as colored rubber clutches and a backing card! You guys can stick your freebie mini stickers over the holes left by the pin posts and still use the backing cards as cute bookmarks or something! (:
*B GRADE PIN BUNDLE*
I've also added a B Grade Pin Bundle which will include all 10 Liquid Cats Pin Designs (inclusive of the Box Cat Freebie Pin) at a discounted price. These pins will have noticeable flaws (eg. noticeable underfilled enamel, visible scratches / particles on surface, visible specks on plating etc.) but they are still good for wearing it out on your favorite bags! The Bundle will also include the Mini Matching Stickers for the pins, the Meme Cat Acrylic Charm and the Mystery Small Pouch! The Sticker Pack will not be included in this bundle!

 (1) Mini Sticker of corresponding design with each pin pledged!
These stickers will be the same size as the actual pins and can be pasted over the holes left by the pins on the backing card. Please don't throw the backing cards away (': They can be reused as bookmarks etc.
(2) Freebie Box Cat Pin for backers pledging for the 4 Pins tier and above! 
This pin will be a freebie for backers pledging for the 4 Pins tier and above and they will either be A/B Grades depending on the quality of the batch and availability. Specifics of the pin can be found above. You can also choose this pin design as one of your pledged pins, in which it will be an A Grade. 
(3) Mystery Acrylic Charm for backers pledging for the 6 Pins tier!
The Acrylic Charm will be double-sided (image flipped at the back) with single-sided epoxy on the front. It will come with a Star Keyring! This is also available as an Add-on!
Hope you guys get the meme reference! 8D 
(4) Liquid Cats Sticker Pack for backers pledging for the Ultimate Pin Bundle tier!
The Sticker Pack consists of 10 stickers featuring all the LIQUID CATS from this campaign! They are waterproof but not weatherproof so I would avoid outdoor and dishwasher usage etc. (': but they'll be perfect for your bullet journals, diaries and even phones and laptops! They are around 1.5 - 2 inches in width so they are about twice the size of the matching mini stickers that would come which every pin pledged.  They will come in Matte Glitter Laminate and there will be small *shimmery* sparkles on the stickers! They are also available as Add-ons for any pin tier! (Please refer to the Add-ons section below)
(5) Liquid Cats Small Pouch for backers pledging for the Ultimate Pin Bundle tier & B Grade Pin Bundle tier!
This Pouch will be an extra little something for backers who pledge for the Ultimate Pin Bundle tier. The material has a soft touch, much softer than the typical canvas material! The design will be kept a secret so I hope you guys will like it when you unwrap your Bundle package! This will not be available as an Add-on! Maybe I'll add it to my online store some time in the future!
This Unicorn Smoothie Cat will be printed professionally as a Holographic Sticker to capture all its shiny and shimmery goodness! 
*EARLY BIRD SPECIAL* The first 50 Backers will receive this freebie Limited-Edition Holographic Sticker! Backers of the Ultimate Pin Bundle Tier will also receive this sticker (so you'll get two if you're part of both)!
It is also available as an Add-on if you guys would like to adopt one of this good boi!
As usual, there will be some color differences between the display colors and the actual pins and stickers!
Please add the corresponding amount to your current pledge amount for the ADD-ONS as stated below:
(1) Holographic Smoothie Cat Sticker: SGD$3
(2) Meme Cat Acrylic Keychain: SGD$7
(3) Liquid Cats Sticker Pack: SGD$10
(4) Additional Liquid Cats Pin: SGD$13
PIN MANUFACTURING: 60% of the funds will go towards the production of the pins. This includes the pins itself, rubber pin clutches and the shipment of pins to me.
PACKAGING & SHIPPING: 30% of the funds will go into packaging and shipping. This includes bubble mailers, cellophane sleeves, shipping labels and backing card.
KICKSTARTER FEES: 10% of the fund goes towards Kickstarter as they charge every successful campaign a small fee for using their platform as well as transaction fees.
1 March 2020: Kickstarter Launches!
16 March 2020: Last Day of Campaign!
17 March 2020: Kickstarter Ends // Survey Sent Out within 3 days // Production order placed
May 2020: Pins arrive // Grading, Packaging and Shipping commences (I'm including more buffer time in light of the slower production due to the virus situation)
June 2020: All Pins shipped out (The pins may take up to a month to reach you depending on the shipping duration)
If the project is funded successfully, a survey will be sent to each backer upon the campaign’s completion within 3 days, allowing you to select the pin(s) of your choice from the unlocked pins. Please complete the survey by the stipulated deadline or your pins will be selected at random. Please also note that if you do not fill up the survey with shipping information, I will not be able to mail your Kickstarter rewards to you since there is no address provided :O
Each pin package will be sent out in a plastic bubble mailer / cardboard box depending on the quantity of pins. Shipping fees will be added on to any pledge you make.
Rewards will be shipped via SingPost and shipping fees are stated after selecting your reward tier.
Backers who pledge for a single pin / acrylic charm will have their package mailed out as Normal Mail without tracking information to lower cost. (SGD$6)
All other packages of two or more pins will be mailed with tracking information though depending on the overseas postal administration, it may be limited.
*Singaporean Backers: Do note that since shipping is free (for most tiers), the package will not be tracked. Only backers who pledge for the 6 Pins Tier and above will have their packages mailed with tracking information.*
Any additional tax, fees or customs’ charges are the responsibility of the backer.
Lost packages:  I will not be able to cover the cost in the case of lost packages but if there are any issues with the delivery, do let me know.
Instagram: @o.mj_studio
Email: studio.omj@gmail.com
You can see more pictures of my enamel pins and merchandise on my Instagram page and Etsy Store and feel free to drop me an email/message if you have any queries! (:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There remains the possibility of delays in production and shipping duration. However, I will ensure prompt communication with the manufacturer during the entire production process.

There might be slight variation in the color of pin and shape of the mold between the mockup and actual production but such changes will be minor. (Pantone colors may not display in the same manner on your display screen)

I will also personally scrutinize the quality of each and every pin prior to shipment to ensure that every backer receives their rewards in the best condition (:
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

project_data.project_name: Liquid Cats Hard Enamel Pins

campaign.story:
Boo! I'm Geen aka Geeniejay, and this is my first Halloween pin collection which is something I've been dreaming of for a very long time. As it's the most wonderful time of the year, I have tried my best to capture the most wonderful spooks, goofs and cutes in these pins! I hope you like them, now step on in...
*Door creaks open* Welcome to Geenoween! Be careful where you step as there's a few disgruntled bat macarons hopping around in the dark.
Geenoween is where all of your spooky dreams come true, bringing together the best elements of spooky season to create a rather large collection of pins featuring; spooky treats, witch's essentials, kawaii familiars and other creepy creatures lurking around the corner. 
Whether they are your companions for the spooky season, or to help you show off your creepy spirit through the rest of the boring year, these pins are waiting for you to choose them, or haunt you if you don't! Muhuhahaha!
All the Geenoween pins will be hard enamel, gold plated, have rubber clutches, and my signature stamped on the back. The sizing will vary and will be specified next to each design!
Buying multiple pins means multiple savings! The more pins you pledge for, the bigger the discount. All pins in the Kickstarter are a lower price than they will be once made and sold in my shop. In addition to this, larger pledges will notice that rewards of 11 pins or more have an even bigger discount! More on this in the "Why Kickstarter?" section below!
Stretch Goals:
If new pins get unlocked that you want to add to your pledge, you can either; use the 'Manage' button next to your pledge details and add the necessary amount, or alter your reward tier to the amount of pins stated in the reward title.
All stretch goal amounts are in GBP - Pound Sterling.
Early Birds:
Early bird tiers will get 2 free sticker sheets! If we unlock more extras along the way, they will either be automatically included in the Early Bird rewards for free, or be discounted.
Once the campaign ends, a survey will be sent out for you to tell me which pins you have selected for your pledge.
 cheaper prices! I'll be doing these pins at a special Kickstarter only price of £6. Whereas, all 30mm and 40mm pins are £7 in my shop. That means savings of £1 per pin. Larger or more complicated pins (such as the love potion and castle designs) will be sold for £9 in my shop. Which makes it a saving of £3! But keep reading...
 EVEN MORE SAVINGS! Reward tiers for 11 or more pins turn into the price of just £5 per pin. So if you were to buy the full collection through Kickstarter rather than my shop, the total saving would be £28! 
 buy now, pay later! You can secure a pin spot now and Kickstarter will take the funds from your bank when this campaign ends. You can check the end date at the top of the campaign!
 you can edit, increase, decrease or cancel your pledge at any time whilst the campaign is still running
 extra prezzies! I'll be giving free sticker sheets for all early bird pledges. There may also be more freebies added along the way depending how the project goes!

10th September - campaign goes live
10th October - campaign ends
2 weeks whilst funds are processed, then I can order the pins and any extras
Pins will take about 20 days in production
November - pins arrive with me and I quality check, pin onto backing cards, and package up the rewards to post
The costs are split up into categories - pins and extras production, packaging (backing cards/mailers/bags) and shipping, and kickstarter fees. Here's a graph to show the comparative figures:
I'm an illustrator living in Stafford, UK. My main inspirations for my work are fashion, Japan, kawaii culture, my favourite shows and movies, and of course, Halloween! I've always been attracted to the creepier side of life since a young ghoul, watching The Nightmare Before Christmas and reading Tim Burton books opened my little mind to the macabre and I never looked back! If you would like to see my other pins and many more cute and creepy items you can have a haunt of my links here:
Etsy shop
Instagram
Twitter
Facebook
Thank you and well done for making it out of Geenoween alive. Happy Halloween!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my 4th Kickstarter project and usually, the process is pretty smooth. However, there can be delays due to production times and possibly faulty pins.

All news and delays will be posted as updates in the "Updates" section to keep all backers as informed as possible. If you have any questions you can leave comments on those updates or contact me directly on Instagram.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: ALL pins posted!! And shipping info
updates.update_content:
GHOULS!! I've done it, I've just finished packing the last batch, and all the pins are now officially posted and on their way to your loving arms. I've seen so many of you posting about them already!
Some shipping info particularly for international customers: 
International posting times can vary a lot and unfortunately the times that Royal Mail provide aren't the most reliable. So if you're outside of Europe, your arrival time can be up to 4-6 weeks, especially if you are in the USA, as the postage system there has been rather slow over the past 6 months!

Hello again! Just a quick one to say that these tiers; Early Bird 2, Early Bird 3, and Creep it Real (3), have all been posted today. 
The next batch starts with Baby Ghoul (2) that I finished packing today!  I’ve seen a few of you already receiving them and it’s making me so happy! So excited to keep seeing all your photos as each batch goes out 💗  Thanks everyone!

Hello everyone! Thank you for your patience!
I've been grading and backing the pins like crazy over the holiday period and this weekend the first batch of pins will be posted!
Starting with Early Bird 1 Pin and Basic Witch backers, I will be going down the backer reward tiers and posting in batches to get them out as fast as possible.

Hello ghouls! It's took a little longer than initially expected, but the Geenoween pins have started their travels!
My manufacturer posted the pins today (5 boxes) to me, and I am so excited and nervous!
In the mean time since we last spoke, I have been designing the backing card which I'm excited to tell you is my first time making custom shaped backing cards. I really think your spooky souls are going to like them! As well as that, I've ordered the sticker sheets so they should all be arriving any day now :)

Hello everyone! 
I received some sample photos from my manufacturer yesterday yay! There are a couple mistakes that need to be fixed but everything else is looking perfect. So hopefully it wont be too much longer now!
My manufacturer has warned me that this is a very busy time for them so it may take longer than usual to finish. It's over 3,000 pins after all!

Just a quick update to announce that all surveys were sent out at the weekend and there's still 34 backers who haven't sent in their replies yet! If you're having any trouble feel free to message or comment.
Also, there are still 5 pledges that Kickstarter haven't been able to process the payment. So please do check your bank and pledger info to make sure it matches up otherwise I won't be able to send your pins!
Early birds! As part of your reward you can choose 2 of the 4 sticker sheet designs in the surveys that will be sent tomorrow.

You made it!*Door slowly creaks as it closes behind you* We defeated all the monsters and trap doors through the haunted house, and unlocked all the achievements!
We did it, ghouls! Every Geenoween pin design was unlocked and the campaign has now successfully ended. Here's what happens next:
I send out the surveys over the weekend to receive your pin choices and shipping details
Kickstarter gets to work gathering all the payments over the next 2 weeks

updates.update_userinfo: All designs ALMOST unlocked! And only 2 days to go!
updates.update_content:
Hello ghouls!
Since the last update we have unlocked:
Boo Cookie
Spooky Bunting
And we only have 1 design left to unlock to complete Geenoween! Everyone keep your fingers crossed that we unlock Froggochan in his Pumpkin Costume!!

project_data.project_name: Geenoween: Halloween Enamel Pin Collection

campaign.story:
Hello everyone! cutematter and Cosmic Skies Pins are teaming up to bring you this collection of Halloween inspired cuties to join the "Mofumofu" enamel pin collection launched on Kickstarter earlier this year by cutematter! With a short project timeline and early production, we plan for them to be in your hands just in time for Halloween this year so you can show them off!
Our initial goal is $500, that will fund the first pin. After the inital goal is met, we have the chance to unlock even more pins! Please refer to the graphic to view the order in which they will unlock. All pins come with a matching sticker and all pledges of 3 pins or more come with a free candycorn-chan mofumofu enamel pin~
As with the Mofumofu series, these are smaller "wearable" style pins that will be perfect for your Halloween co-ords and collections!
The funds from this project will be used for pin production, shipping, and necessary supplies such as mailers. The timeline for for these pins to be completed is mid October 2019, and as always we will keep you all updated as we receive progress photos and information on any possible delays.  Please note that the final colors/designs may be adjusted a bit! For examples of other pins we have made, please check out our instagram pages @shopcutematter and @cosmicskiespins. 
Thank you all for reading and for your support!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are risks and challenges associated with making enamel pins. Luckily I have been working with my factory for a long time now, and they are always willing to fix any mistakes that arise during the process of making the pins. I am confident that there will be few if any delays regarding defective product arriving to me. If you have any questions at all regarding the process or how kickstarter works, please feel free to message me!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!
I spent the day packing up everyone’s orders and I managed to finish them! All domestic backers should have received a message with their tracking number.
I did underestimate by a few stickers due to a few late surveys and the rush of completing this project before halloween, and instead of having people wait for me to get more in I sent an extra random pin and sticker to anyone affected by this! I am very sorry for the trouble, and if you have any issues please feel free to message me.

Hi everyone!!
I got some factory photos today and I’m happy to say the pins are almost finished! Once they are here i will ship them out ASAP so you guys can get them as close to Halloween as possible. Here are some photos❤️

Hi everyone!! I have a few last minute updates for the Kickstarter~
First off, a new variant of the witchy moon kitty is available to pledge for! It’s Artemis to go along with Luna ❤️
And here is the freebie pin design! We took a poll and this candy corn cutie was the winner, so he is free for everyone who pledges for 3+ pins. We will also be making free stickers for all backers as a thank you!

Hi everyone!!
I just wanted to say thank you for the overwhelming support! We did some calculations and were able to lower the amount at which everything is unlocked- so all pins are officially unlocked now ❤️
We’ll also soon be sharing a free mini pin to all backers pledged for 3+ pins! It’s going to be based on the little bow that Kero is wearing. So if you’d like to receive this reward, all you have to do is be pledged for 3 or more pins! As a reminder, if you have an early bird pledge, you can manually adjust your pledge and add $7 for each pin you would like to receive that way you get to keep your early bird discount. ❤️

project_data.project_name: Absence & Presence – A Witch-inspired Pin Collection

campaign.story:
Hey All, I'm Liz, artist behind LizHarryDesign and this is my 13th Kickstarter! This time I'm aiming to fund fees to make my MAGICAL & MYSTICAL inspired pins with phrases to help SPARK CONFIDENCE!
ME DESIGNING AT MY DESK
 The campaign finishes late-September and I'm hoping to have the funded rewards ready to start shipping mid OCTOBER (please check delivery times for specific rewards) But these designs aren't just for Halloween or Christmas they're for inspiring confidence ALL YEAR ROUND!
Details of the pin:
45mm High Pin
Lettering reads 'The MAGIC is ALREADY in YOU'
Available in 2 colourways
Two pins with rubber clasps to secure on reverse
Each pin comes with a matching sticker* and mini (A6) print
If the project hits its funding goal you can pick the colour-way you'd like of any of the pins in the survey after the campaign ends - for now just select the amount of pins you'd like.  
*New* GLITTER PALM PATCH available to add to your pledge now
 As a Kickstarter pledger to one of my campaigns you get exclusive prices - but I don't JUST mean the EARLY BIRD REWARDS - once all my items are in my shop each is priced differently, reflective of its manufacturing costs - but to my kickstarter pledgers the pins cost just £8 each! Because you're part of the process AND you get to say you helped make the pin its my way of saying 'thanks!' - if that isn't enough already you'll also get a matching *sticker & mini print with each perfectly packaged pin!
*If we surpass £1650 all pledges will come with a free sticker sheet with all the designs instead.
All of the pins in this campaign are on the larger side, and they all use a few colours, so they're priced £1 more than my previous campaigns, but I'm still doing my best to bring you alotta flair on a budget!
*Free STICKER SHEET with every pledge*
This PALM pin from my most recent collection was a starting point for these new designs
By backing this project you will help me raise the funds to get these pins & charms manufactured. The majority of the goal amount covers the production of the items these are all very detailed/large/colourful enamel pieces, so manufacturing costs are higher overall in this campaign. The amount that remains relates to postage and packaging costs in shipping the pins out to backers.
For those Early Birds to the campaign - there are special pledge amounts for those who support this campaign early on. Look for the Early Bird pledge amount - and grab yourself 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 OR 10 MAGICAL THEMED pins/charms/earrings at a price especially for you SPIRIT LOVERS!
At the end of the campaign - backers will be able to choose which designs they would like from the unlocked designs. The STRETCH GOALS LIST above give a hint as to what they will be - the actual design will be revealed as we get nearer to the goals!
Once the pins are manufactured all post within the UK will be sent out ROYAL MAIL 2nd Class signed postage. For international deliveries there's standard international shipping which can take up to 30 days.
💌OUT OUT OF THE UK if you'd like your item tracked* please add an additional £4.50 to your pledge this service takes 5-7 working days and I'll DM you your tracking number through kickstarter once your reward is shipped.
No tracking numbers will be available with standard shipping (although I always obtain proof of postage) untracked orders will be sent at your own liability and dealt with on a case by case basis if reported missing.
*Please note tracked shipping is highly recommended if your pledge is larger than 2/3 pins to ensure speedy tracked delivery.
  Being a visual person my home is on instagram! Click on the image links below to stop by and say hello:
And stop by my shop to check out my other designs 
Or give my video a watch to hear me talk about my process & influences...
PLAY
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
These pins are being manufactured for me - therefore the production process is outside of my control. Potentially we could hit delays if the manufacturer experiences any issues - but this is my 12th project and I'm working with a manufacturer who has shown themselves to have a high quality of work and to deliver on time - so hopefully all good!

If, however, there are any delays, I will keep all backers updated in my KICKSTARTER UPDATES.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Have you seen my new 2020 enamel PIN, PATCH & NECKLACE kickstarter yet?
updates.update_content:
Hey All! I've kicked off 2020 with a bang creating these accessories which I hope will help you be intentional in the year ahead!
I launched these accessories on 1st January 2020 to help empower myself - and hopefully others to say YES or NO to 1 thing in 2020.

campaign.story:
This is a story about heaven, humanity, tragedy, and new beginnings. It's a tribute. A history. A love letter.
This is the extraordinary story of Notre Dame de Paris.  
What is the story about?
The Girl and the Cathedral is not a dry retelling of history. Rather, in the spirit of The Little Prince, it is the extraordinary tale of a small girl with an island in the Seine. There, she begins a garden—but not a garden of flowers. It will be a garden of people, she says: Paris. 
In the center of her garden, the little girl plants her greatest treasure of all: Notre Dame de Paris. She watches as heaven reaches through the cathedral's windows. She wonders as the people in her garden change through kingdoms and empires and revolutions. She weeps as war ravages and burns. Over 850 years of history, her garden changes—as people must. And through it all, her most beloved flower, Notre Dame, resolutely offers divine solace and light, and the little girl learns much about life, freedom, love, loss, and the glory of new beginnings. It is a story about Notre Dame, but much deeper, it is a story about all that Notre Dame has stood for. 
The little girl admires the most beautiful flower in her garden: Notre Dame de Paris.
Includes faux stained glass windows built right into the cover
Built into the front cover are a series of stained glass windows (made with printed clear plastic). Hold the book up to the light, and each window glows!
Comes with a fold-out timeline of architectural and period drawings
A stunning 4-page flap folds out to reveal original architectural drawings and artwork of the cathedral throughout the centuries.  
Introduces children to famous figures
Astute readers will find references to famous Parisians who changed the world. You'll spot:
Famous thinkers and scientists like Madam Curie
Artists, writers, and musicians like Debussy, Ravel, Monet, Jules Verne, and Victor Hugo
The first hot air balloon flight!

The Teacher

Exclusive Honors

A likeness of your child illustrated in one of the scenes in the book!
Your name included in the Book Angels section of the book
10 hardcover copies (plenty to share with friends and family ;)
10 books donated to kids in need
PLUS, pick any one of the Deluxe Gift Packages above
Why we created this book and how we're giving back
For more than 850 years, Notre Dame brought a piece of heaven to her island on the Seine. Her people loved her. She loved her people. Her song rang across the city and across the years, bells mingled with mystery through the ups and downs of joy, war, suffering, prosperity, and happiness. Her story spans the ages of kings, emperors, presidents, revolution, and change. 
And then, like most of the world, we were stunned as we watched flames erupt through her roof. Like the light that pours through her windows, we had come to believe she would always be there—a beacon of hope and inspiration, a quiet touch of the divine in the midst of the world's clamor.
We are grateful to know that Notre Dame will always be there, due in large part to the generosity of the world and those that love her. 
While that reconstruction goes on, we wish to offer a tribute of our own—a story of hope and love, of life and rebirth. In this book, through illustration and prose, we pay homage to the grand story of Notre Dame—who she is, how she was, and what she has come to mean to millions the world over for 850 years. And in the spirit of giving back, we pledge that for every book sold, we will donate a book to kids in need—book for book.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The illustrations are mostly finished and the manuscript is in editing. For publishing, we're partnered with Bushel & Peck Books, a children's publishing company. Their team has published hundreds of books in the course of their publishing career, including several with complex engineering (such as this one!). Their experience means the risks to this project are very minimal.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
We heard from several of you that you're missing the "Shine On Notre Dame" vinyl clings in your packages. Not to worry! We have them ready to send. The U.S. Post Office simply doesn't allow us to include them in media mail packages (which is how the books were mailed), so these are being sent separately by regular mail this week. Expect them by the end of the week!

Dear backers,
We're pleased to announce that packages have been shipped! Books will be coming to you via the U.S. Postal Service. If you ordered a deluxe gift package, those will be arriving in a flat-rate USPS box; all other books are coming book rate in padded envelopes (just so you know what to look for!). 
We're grateful to the wonderful staff at the post office who patiently spent 3 hours shipping everything out for us. It was incredible to see all the places—from Texas to Singapore to France and beyond—that the girl and her beloved cathedral will be going!

Dear backers,
We're happy to report that our shipment of books is on its way to us from the printer! And we already have the seed balls, stained glass butterflies, prints, and everything else needed to put your reward packages together. We expect to have everything assembled and in the mail by the end of next week. 
We hope this book, like Notre Dame herself, brings you a welcome dose of light and peace during this troubling time.

Dear backers,
We're thrilled to announce that The Girl and the Cathedral is heading to the printer today. The book is just stunning. The illustrations, the endpapers, the architectural details—it's a treasure, and we're immensely proud of it. And behalf of all of us, we wish to thank you for your support and encouragement. It simply wouldn't have happened without you.
We're on track to receive stock sometime in late March, which means your rewards should be arriving during the month of April. We'll be sending a survey out soon to request your shipping addresses—please be sure to fill that out!

Today was the end of our campaign to raise funds to bring "The Girl and the Cathedral" to bookshelves and into the homes of people across the world. This is a beautiful book, a beautiful story, and I know you will love looking at the unique and expert illustrations provided by Sara Ugolotti. The team at Bushel & Beck Publishing and I will be thrilled to send out first edition copies of the book next year, a book you made happen. 
I am personally at a loss for words to express how much I appreciate your contribution.

campaign.story:
Chris Stein from Blondie on "The Decline of Mall Civilization"

The Decline of Mall Civilization
In 2010, I borrowed a scanner from a friend to digitize some old negatives and I came across ancient images capturing life inside shopping malls, a consumer culture that had been decimated by the Internet. I put the images online and they went viral. So I kickstarted a book, "Malls Across America", and they went more viral. In a crazy twist of fate, that book ended up getting released by the publisher Steidl who printed the work that inspired those photos - books by William Eggleston and Robert Frank.  Unfortunately, Steidl didn't print nearly enough of the books, so the Kickstarter backers of that project, "Malls Across America", were some of the few people who were able to get it. It has been out of print for 6 years now, and currently trades for upwards of $1000.  At some point I want to re-publish that book, but for the time being it remains out of print and out of reach. At first I thought I would use some of the classic images in the new book, "The Decline of Mall Civilization", but I found hundreds of other powerful images that deserved to be seen so we decided to keep it completely separate. The two books have very different feels as well. "Malls Across America", which was designed by the incomparable Peter Miles, is all single images over double page spreads. This time we spent a lot of time and effort pairing the images into diptychs that play off of each other in interesting ways.
We are incredibly excited to make "Decline of Mall Civilization" available.  We hope you might consider pre-ordering it via this Kickstarter - don't miss out. 
Sebastian and me by the blue Corolla that carried us across country.
Backstory
In 1989, I was a sophomore at NYU when I took my first photo class, "Color Printing".  My teacher was awesome and our first assignment was to watch the film "River's Edge".  At the time, I was dating a girl who went to Stony Brook and I'd take the Long Island Railroad out to see her every other weekend.  One weekend, shortly after I had started the class and had to find a subject for my class project, I happened to go to the Smith Haven Mall with her and immediately knew I'd found a place to shoot. I was a Religious Studies major who took a lot of anthropology and sociology courses, which helped me to think of the the mall in complex ways. I was especially interested in considering the mall as something of a privatized public square. While I focused on the people, I thought about the way that they interacted with each other and the space. The teacher loved the work and encouraged me to continue it that summer. So my friend Sebastian and I packed ourselves in his Corolla station wagon and we hit the road without any real plan at all. 
Richard Sandler on "The Decline of Mall Civilization". Sandler published "Eyes of the City" last year
Our first stop was Columbus Ohio. We stayed with my aunt but we didn't find a mall. We then hightailed it to Detroit where we hit the jackpot with the Woodfield Mall.  It's a beauty and there are probably a dozen in the book from that one. Next stop was Chicago- then South Dakota, and on and on. All in all, we hit about 15 malls. We got some great images but it wasn't really their time. By 1989, the "Pictures Generation" - with its focus on more constructed and deconstructed images - had pushed street photography out of the galleries. They were doubling down on big ideas and conceptual work. I went on to take a couple other photo classes, but turned my attention to making music and making films. I shot a lot of images, but my main outlets for them were fanzines and album covers. I moved on to making films.  In 2010, I re-discovered these slides and the rest is history. 
The 10 images that will be available as limited artist's proofs 
Once you back the project you'll be able to see more of the images in the book via the updates. Below are the 10 images that will be available as artist proofs as part of the Kickstarter.  
Print choice 1- from Malls Across America
Print choice 2 - from Malls Across America
Print choice 3 - from Malls Across America
Print choice 4 - from Malls Across America
Print Choice 5 - from Malls Across America
Print choice 6 - from Decline of Mall Civilization
Print choice 7 - from Decline of Mall Civilization
Print choice number 8 - from Decline of Mall Civilization
Print choice 9 - from Decline of Mall Civilization
Print Choice 10 - from Decline of Mall Civilization - this will be the cover image
Four images at the Nasher museum. Two of these are still available - see below
Framed image #1 "Escalator couple" from Nasher Museum show - 1 framed print available
Framed image #2 "Youth Gone Wild" from Nasher Museum show - one framed print available
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have the book designed and ready to print, the printer picked out, schedule set, and a package shipper arranged to get the books out in a timely manner. If the Kickstarter is successful we'll have the money to print the books and have them back by November at the latest. Backers outside the US will receive their books a bit later as shipping takes a while- but we will make every effort to do so efficiently. We are exploring shipping cartons of book to Europe directly from the printing plant to streamline the process.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: The Decline of Mall Civilization Book

It is 112 pages with all new images (you may have seen some of them as they have gone viral- but there are no repeats from Malls Across America). Our schedule calls for the books to reach us by October and we hope to turn them around by November for early Christmas shopping. The last book sold out before it hit stores, so act fast to make sure you don't miss out

updates.update_userinfo: The Last 200 Copies of The Decline of Mall Civilization are on their way to the US
updates.update_content:
Hello,
We recently arranged to have the last 200 copies of The Decline of Mall Civilization first edition shipped to us from the printer in Italy.  We wanted to let backers know in case anyone has a friend that's coveting a copy. The cost is $78 - which is a deal considering copies are selling for $300+.  There are also a few signed copies available.
Thank you!
Rumur Inc

I was scanning for the next book project, photos of the underground music scene I shot from 89-95. After the mall trip in 89 I started a band and started documenting the world I was a part of. In 1993 we went on tour with a band called Half Japanese and I shot a lot. While in Minneapolis we went to The Mall of America. I shot black and whit because that’s what I had.
The books in the US are gone. We are figuring out whether to ship the Last 200 from Europe. We will let you know if we do.

I want to once again thank all of you for the profound support you have shown us. Our first kickstarter was almost a decade ago, and we've learned a lot, and evolved. I'm happy to say that we have been able to deliver something like 95% of the rewards. There are a couple dozen people who have not responded to the requests for information via updates, email, and messages. We're holding onto copies for you- but we can't get it to you unless you get your address to us. 
There are about 70 copies left in the US and 350 in Europe. We are getting those shipped to us but it will take a few months. In the meantime send your friends to Rumur.com/malls to get their copy now.

We just went through everything- and except for a handful of people who have never responded to our entreaties for shipping information- all the books are out. We apologize for the slight delay on the Australian and Canadian orders.  Due to a miscommunication with the shipper (who forgot to tell us that they needed the item price for customs) those packages finally went out last week I'm very sorry about that.  The Canadian ones should have arrived in time for the holidays. However, I believe the Australian ones might have missed the holiday deadline.  Please know that this is all we have been doing for the past month. We used a shipping company that is near my house so I have been back and forth repeatedly to make sure that things were going smoothly.  Unfortunately, they are a wildly busy shop due to the holidays so when they put the AU and CA ones to the side to await that information they forgot to tell me they needed it.  Thankfully we got it straightened out.

I just tracked 180 packages- of those 170 plus had arrived or were at a PO for pickup-  A few in California are scheduled for Saturday (there seems to be a back up at the San Francisco sort facility as all of the undelivered are going through there) and one in Hawaii is the 23rd. If you don't have your package by Monday I'll get you a tracking number. I stopped by the shipping place yesterday and saw that they were still in the process of getting Canada and Australia out the door. I let them know how important it is and they hopefully went out today.
thanks for the messages and shares- keep them coming. I'm so glad the book is resonating os much!  We have a couple hundred left so hit Rumur.com/malls fast if you know know someone who wants one or want to get another.
It's so exciting that the books are starting to reach you!

It was a crazy weekend! Between the Kickstarter backers and the attendees at Dashwood Books I signed nearly 100 copies on Friday - lots kid great conversations and reunions. Jaret Segovia, who recently found herself in one of the images, showed up. Another guy, David Yellen also showed up on Monday.
On Saturday we caught the Gary Winogrand show at the Brooklyn Museum. Gary was a big inspiration for my book but this was the first time I got to see his color work.

campaign.story:
Hello! I am Venetia, aka: ChocolateRaisinFury. I am a digital artist who has been working full time selling my own art for 3 years now, selling on websites such as Qwertee, ShirtPunch, TeeFury, and selling at conventions across the south of the UK. Now thanks to encouragement & help from Gilles Bone  (<3), and all of my wonderful social media followers (Thank you Rachelle for your advice as well!), I have decided to run my first ever Kickstarter for making enamel pins! 
The Hard Enamel pins are made from my Eeveelution collection, and different eeveelutions will (hopefully!) be unlocked as more stretch goals are reached. You will be able to select any of the unlocked pins you want at the end of the campaign :)
Each Eeveelution will also have glitter on their bodies! 
These are the first pins I have made, so the colour of my mock-ups may vary slightly from the final products (and they may vary with how they look on different computer screens), but I'll do my very best to work with the manufacturer for accuracy, and give updates to you guys!
The Rainbow Enamel pins in particular are designed for each individual pin to be unique, as is the nature of their manufacturing process.
Thanks to all of your support & feedback, I have added these pins on as stretch goals! 
** ARTWORK MAY CHANGE SLIGHTLY **  I am working with my manufacturer and am in the process of sorting out proofs to make sure the pins come out as I want them to, but I may have to simplify some of the more complicated elements. 

Backing Card Preview:
As a thank you to everyone who pledges and sticks with me throughout my first ever Kickstarter, I'll be giving out these 5.5 x 8.5 inch sized mini foil prints, exclusive to Kickstarter campaigns!
 ☆ 70% - Mould Fees & Pin Production 
 ☆ 10-15% - Shipping
 ☆ 10% - Kickstarter fees
 ☆ The remainder goes to backing cards & packaging supplies.
 June: Kickstarter campaign runs
 July: Payments are processed & surveys sent out. Free prints will be ordered.
 Mid/ Late July: Kickstarter funds come in, Pins & Packaging are ordered.
 Mid/Late September: Pins arrive and I begin the grading process. 
 Late October/ Mid November: Rewards get sent out to all the lovely people who pledged! <3 
I have put November as a send date incase things run late as this is my first campaign, I wanna make sure I get things right :) plus since I am based in the UK it may take a while for US & International orders to arrive!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As previously mentioned, this is my first Kickstarter and Enamel Pin collection but I will do my best to get everything sorted in a timely manner, and solve any problems that may arise. Since I work for myself and my business, I can dedicate all of my time to this campaign. The designs have also already been approved by the manufacturer. 

Rewards are sent out untracked due to the high price of tracked shipping, but if you'd like the extra security and you'd like your pins to be sent with tracking, just add £9 (GBP) to your pledge and include in the comments that you'd like it :)

As also previously stated, with any pre-order the final product can vary from the mock-ups. Hard Enamel paints can come out quite differently to on screen colours, but with the help of others who have much experience in the pin industry, I'll do my best to keep them looking good :) 

There may be hold ups due to shipping delays or misprints, but I have faith in this manufacturing company. There may also be delays incase of a huge number of backers since it's just me working on this project, but in this event I will enlist help from my ever-faithful friends <3
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: And the final packages with Arcanine & Shiny Leafeon have gone out the door!

The re-makes have arrived!
I’ve had a look through and they both look great, so I’ll get to grading and packaging, then I’ll start packing up the final orders. 
The deadline for christmas international shipping is this coming Monday. I know some of you ordered these as christmas presents so I’ll do my best to get them out as soon as possible.
If you are truly desperate to get them on time, please send me a message and I’ll do what I can

updates.update_userinfo: Packages shipped & Re-makes on their way
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
Small update to say that as of last week (other than those waiting for Arcanine and Shiny Leafeon, and a few people I am waiting to hear back from), all orderes have now been shipped! I can’t thank everyone enough for being patient with me getting their orders out. I wanted to get all 1000+ orders shipped a week sooner, but not only did Royal Mail screw me over (again) resulting in having to re-label 331 packages that were all out of order, I also had a funeral to attend.  So honestly, I give a huge thank you to everyone who’s been kind to me over these last few weeks.

updates.update_userinfo: Pin & Tonic came to my rescue, pins are going out the door!
updates.update_content:
So sorry about all the updates - but I just wanted to let you all know that Chloe at Pin&Tonic came to my rescue and gave me a huge load of Royal Mail postal sacks so I’ve been able to go full swing into shipping!
Thanks to her I sent out this lot today:

updates.update_userinfo: Small update & Royal Mail being a pain
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
Small update that (with occasional help from  Milliebeedoodles ) I have packed up around 700 orders, but unfortunately because Royal Mail are being a PAIN, they are currently sat in my house -.-

updates.update_userinfo: Re-makes are being made & a quick thank you
updates.update_content:
Heya!
Small update this time - just to let everyone know that the re-makes are being made. My manufacturer estimated it would take about 30 working days to complete. 
I also wanted to extend a huge thank you to everyone for your patience with these 💙 This campaign has been a huge learning curve for me and your kindness and understanding has really meant a lot!

updates.update_userinfo: Please check your address & Arcanine and Shiny Leafeon issues :(
updates.update_content:
Hey all,
First I’d like to send a quick message to double check your addresses, as the ability to edit them will be closed by 1pm GMT tomorrow (6th of October.)
For those of you who added extra pins and asked to be invoiced on the survey, I will be going through and sending out invoiced this week & next so please keep an eye out for them and pay them as soon as you can 💙  (for those of you who have already messaged me, don’t worry!)

They’re all here! 
The second batch has finally arrived 💙 I will spend the next few days grading them and making sure all is well, and if it is they’ll join the queue of ones waiting to be packaged up :)

Photos are heeerreee!! ^^ I’m still practicing at taking photos of pins so I aplologise that they’re not as professional looking as they could be, but I really wanted to share them with you guys! <3 
I have to admit I love how varied the rainbow pins are in colour, It makes each one unique <3 
I’ll be spending the next few days grading these until the next batch are sent off :)

updates.update_userinfo: First set of pins are on their way!! (& a Displate message)
updates.update_content:
The first set of pins are on their way and I am so excited!!
I’ll take pictures for you all as soon as they arrive! In the mean time I’ve been busy packing up all the free prints in baggies to help protect them on their travels to you :) 
Also, since so many of you have been so kind as to look out for my art and message me about this, I’m sending out a message to everyone about   . A few of you have had a sponsored ad come up with my Starry Eeveelutions piece in it. (This isn’t the ad but this is a screenshot of the website)

project_data.project_name: Starry Eeveelutions

campaign.story:
Misu-Misu is an original animated, short film that tells the story of an exceptional cat's life and the people who loved her. Misu-Misu promises to deliver a light-hearted short film that covers the joy and loss of having a pet in your life.

The world feels heavy at the moment. There are very heavy topics that we could be covering instead but in response to the anxiety that the world can sometimes bring, Misu-Misu delivers a light but important piece of life that many of us can relate with.
Our pets are a welcomed distraction from a complex world to a simple one, one of unconditional love. 

We've chosen to keep all of our rewards digital so that we can put all of the money we raise into production. Although we love rewards as much as anyone, the work needed to source and send out physical items would take time away from production and our team isn't big enough to support that.
We do promise that the digital rewards are awesome!!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Misu-Misu is already in production and we are fully committed to finishing the film. Help us increase our production quality and get there faster with your contribution!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Your name will appear as a backer in the film's end credits.

Download our digital art book and see all of the work (and re-work) it took to make Misu-Misu.
Your name will appear as a backer in the film's end credits and you'll receive our digital calendar and our original storyboard!

support.title: Art Book
support.descp:
Get a paperback copy of our Misu-Misu's art book including early sketches, storyboard and behind the scenes photos.
Your name will appear as a backer in the film's end credits and you'll receive our digital calendar and our original storyboard!

support.title: Early Backer Thanks in Credits
support.descp:
You believed in this film before anyone else! Your name will appear as an early backer in the film's end credits.
You'll also receive our digital calendar!

updates.update_content:
Hi backers!

We are having our premiere on Friday but have become aware that not everyone can make it. You can see the film now on our website or on Vimeo as well. 

You can also see and share the film on Vimeo using this link: https://vimeo.com/565824486

Hi Backers,

This film has been a huge learning experience for me as a filmmaker and creative. Thank you for allowing me the opportunity to bring the story of my dear kitty to life.

I appreciate all your encouragement and help along the way. We raised $10k on Kickstarter but the film itself cost $28k to complete. I was a bit off with my estimation of what it would take to get this done with such a small team but the important thing is that we did it.
Working on backgrounds and final animations. Then it goes off to music scoring!
This is the first version of our color story. Garrett is looking for the perfect color language to drive the story visually.

updates.update_userinfo: Almost done with our final animatic
updates.update_content:
After completing our first pass of the animatic we’ve been editing and adjusting the story to create more dynamic timing.
Once we’re done with this step, we’ll begin working on our original score.
😸

Thank you so much to all of the supporters! This has been one of the longest months of my life but we made it.
Thank you!!!! 😸😽
Thank you SO MUCH to everyone who has contributed. We are roughly $1,300 away from our goal and only one more day to go!
We are so close to our goal. Thank you to those who have already donated. Please share with your friends and family and help finish this short film!

project_data.project_name: Misu-Misu

campaign.story:
Give your breasts some love! 
Nuudii’s unique featherlight technology hugs your natural shape with supreme comfort, while offering maximum versatility for your lifestyle and more than 12 ways to wear! Patented Technology. 
Created by women - Made by women - For women - Made in the USA 
This movement was inspired by listening to the voices of women and tested with over 500+ women ages 16-94 eager for something new. With Nuudii they found, confidence, freedom and a smile.

Embrace this new level of self-love by joining us with your pledge of support. 
We get it and we are passionate to make living with boobs or whatever you call them, so much easier. With Nuudii your boobs aren’t confined, they are cradled. Your natural shape is embraced and our super lightweight technology is so comfortable, you can wear Nuudii to bed. Did we mention no hardware? Yup, zero, nada, zilch.
Just to be clear, this product is not a bra. It is an innovation and truly, dare we say it, a straight up revolution for your breasts. 

 Nuudii’s flexible straps adapt to clothing styles, the options are endless and so easy! 
Yep! A totally new experience for your boobs. Weighs 1½ oz, fine, yet durable, hugs your unique shape with 360° stretch for supreme comfort and hardware free (pain-free!).
The only bra alternative isn’t only comforting, it has the flexibility to hold you through all your monthly phases (yup those hormones!). Patented Technology. 

Nuudii covers a multitude of sizes and boob shapes, however we realize that this technology doesn’t expand to all our fabulous sizes...yet. Nuudii allows a very flexible fit. Take a look at the size chart and reach out to us with any questions. 
We strongly believe that women of all sizes should have access to our products. We aim to be fully inclusive by expanding our size offerings, and with your help we will be able to fund this must-be-done development.  
So Nuudii is not a bra, it's an experience. Look braless with a gentle lift and if you’re lucky, a little side boob. It asks you to love your boobs as they are. Nuudii allows your girls to be themselves. 
Contact us via email: curious@nuudiisystem.com 

Our sheer, light-weight fabric Nuu Light, Nuu Brownz, Nuu Black lets you celebrate the skin you’re in, each color works beautifully with all skin tones. 

Nuudii lets life flow, from one activity to another. This one product takes you from sleep to dressing up and everything in between. 
Nuudii’s flex straps, paired with our accessory clip transforms your look to prop up the girls a little more (if that’s what you desire), create a racerback, or a halter look in the front.
(1) Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge at the top right side of the page or click one of the Pre-Order Now buttons. Note, you may only make one pledge. 
(2) Payment - Enter payment information. Your payment will not be charged until the end of this campaign. 
(3) Size, Color & Shipping Information-Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your Size, Color and submit your Shipping, once the campaign has ended. 
(4) International Backers - We are giving great rates in Shipping Internationally -Note Local Duties, Taxes, and Fees: Some backers may have to local customs import duties and taxes; these backers will be responsible for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes.
  Our highly complex patented technology took us 3 years to develop through our dedicated and experienced team of three, along with our amazing manufacturer partner here in the US. Together we are committed to re-establishing this dying industry and creating jobs for other women. Did we mention that? Yes, women make our products. 
Our goal is to bring the Nuudii experience to women everywhere. Through this campaign our goal is to raise capital to add more sizes, build production and design more products that bring boob freedom. Our vision is to expand Nuudii Systems profile to include more women. It’s a win win for all.  Join us and be a part of expanding Nuudii with your pledge of support. 
PLAY


PLAY

PLAY

 Fairy boob Mother
PLAY


Love Nuudii but can’t pledge now?? Tell everyone about us on Instagram, Facebook or wherever you get social. Your voice is everything!

Kickstarter video was created by LA based Culprit Creative. For inquiries  go to CulpritCreative.com !
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Nuudii System has been over 3 years in development and was created by 3 women from the fashion Industry who have been listening to the needs, challenges and experiences of women and their boobs!
We have developed and Patent Approved Nuudii, and with a Design Patent pending. 
We found that by truly listening and involving women in the development process, we were able to engineer and design the best product. We aim to constantly evolve and expand our technology to include additional sizes so more women can have the Nuudii Experience. We are honored and excited to be here on Kickstarter, where we can connect directly with you (and your boobs! )

Boobs are wonderful , and complicated - just think about all sizes and shapes - and Bra Production is a highly complex industry - However, we created a 'never been done before' manufacturing process. We found an extraordinary partner in the US , that by working with Nuudii, is reviving a dying industry. This campaign will provide the much needed capital to fund the build out of our production lines, re-establish an industry and enable us to share Nuudii with women of throughout the world.
We created a duplicate factory line in our Design studio in Brooklyn, to ensure that our designer could develop Nuudii right alongside our wear testers and ensure that Nuudii could be easily recreated in a factory environment, (always a huge challenge for any industry is moving a prototype to a proper production environment ). 

We have now successfully tested a production run in the factory. We have built the supply chain of our Eco Friendly packaging and set up fulfillment for seamless deliveries. We have planned with all of our partners to allot time for production to fulfill and deliver rewards. 

RISKS 

1. We want to make sure our customer expects a completely new experience.
Nuudii does not feel or perform like you are wearing a bra - It is important to understand that this is different, it is not a bra and not the same experience as a bra.
Nuudii has no hardware, fits different, with the feel and look of being braless. 
There is no constriction, it allows your real shape to remain, while it gently lifts and allows your boobs to move within Nuudii. Nuudii System does not mold your boobs and allows them be themselves. Wearing Nuudii may show side boob and some sheerness. 

2) Sizing and how to guide our customers to order the right size.
Nuudii is a very flexible fit because of the stretch. We currently offer sizes Small, Medium and Large, which covers sizes 32B - 38DD. And Nuudii actually gets better with wear. We will expand sizes in the future when, with your help, we are able to fund this highly technical development process. 
For sizing and fit questions we have specialists on our team to connect with, as well as offering Free shipping with in the USA. When you receive your Nuudii and if you need a different size, simply let us know and send within 10 days of receiving your Nuudii and we will happily make a onetime exchange, free of charge (Note - shipping charges both ways apply for International orders exchanges).

Please note 
Local Duties, Taxes, and Fees: Some international backers will be subject to local customs import duties and taxes; these backers will be responsible for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Into the Unknown...
What started as a simple answer to a "Tarot" drawing prompt took me into a year-and-a-half long journey into the Unknown.
Due to my love for this particular cartoon, I decided to see what the Rider-Waite tarot design for "The Devil" might look like filtered through this lens. Thus, I created the first card. 
The First Card I Made!
My Instagram followers loved it so much, I tried my hand at a few more. And once I started thinking about the imagery in both the show and the Rider-Waite deck, I was consistently surprised at how well they overlapped. So I kept going and going and going to try and finish a full Major and Minor Arcana deck of 78 cards and designs.
Drawing on iconography from both the cartoon and the Rider-Waite deck, I've created individualized suits and pay tribute to the major players.
Major Arcana: Almost all of your favorite characters show up here--and maybe a few extras, too! 
Axes (Swords): These focus on the human inhabitants of the Unknown. 
Axes of the Unknown are acting as the traditional Swords suit
Pentacles: This suite is full of your favorite pumpkin people of Pottsfield, and maybe a couple vegetable folks from the pilot, too!  
Wands: Pays tribute to all of the animals within the Unknown.
Cups: Shows off those that live outside of the Unknown.
It's here that I ask for your help to turn this deck into a reality.
What You'll Get
Depending on your support, you will receive everything from stickers and prints to enamel pins and full tarot decks. Of course, the key goal is to produce a full deck of the Tarot of the Unknown.
The baseline projection of the deck features:
2.75" x 4.75" Standard-size, Full-Color Tarot Cards printed on 330 gsm-grade cardstock (300 gsm is the baseline standard for most decks of playing cards)
A unique card backing design for the deck
The CURRENT STRETCH GOALS HAVE BEEN HIT! All decks will now include the FOLLOWING!
A unique, magnetic box!
NOT FINAL ART!
Cards will be printed on 400 gsm-grade cardstock.
The Deck will have GOLD EDGES! 
A KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE! - 12 - 20 page mini-guide / Creator Commentary booklet, with a forward by Chris Paradis! (Chris Paradis is an educator, filmmaker & visual artist known for his indy millennium tarot deck, The Rock & Roll Tarot (2 ed.). The R&R tarot features pixelated image macros, from the 1st 50 years of Rock & Roll, melded with stichomancy to summon a type of mysticism only song lyrics & the temple of the juke box can bring. Chris’s life & soul card are both card VI, The Lovers.)
CURRENT KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE BONUSES!
EVERY Pledge gets a just-for-the-project weatherproof, vinyl sticker!
PLEDGES of $35 AND UP will receive a Kickstarter-Exclusive enamel pin! This is limited to ONE PIN per Pledge and ONLY available through Kickstarter! (For Pledges $25 and under, you may opt to chose the exclusive pin for your choice--or buy one as an Add-on for $6!)
 The pin will be soft enamel, with an epoxy coating, black plating, double-posted, and come with a unique "Tarot of the Unknown" backstamp. They will be, at least, 1.5" tall.
This Limited, Kickstarter-Exclusive Pin is ONE Per Pledge
You'll also have the opportunity to grab some other great Unknown merch:
A Four-Pack of Vinyl Stickers featuring some of the show's favorites! (These are approximately 3" each and are weatherproof!) 
Four Pack of Vinyl Stickers (Approx. 3" Each)
Enamel Pins! Choose from FOUR options at a Kickstarter-discounted price!
You'll be able to choose ANY of these! And perhaps a fifth design, too!
A Six-Pack of Vinyl Stickers featuring designs straight from the Tarot set! (These are approximately 2.5" x 3.5" and are weatherproof!)
Six Pack of Tarot Stickers (Approx. 2.5" x 3.5" Each)
5" x 7" Prints of YOUR CHOICE of Tarot designs
A 5.5" x 8.5", 100 page lined journal, featuring TWO design choices  
Both Journals are 100 pages total (Rock Facts contains 5 illustrations, 10 facts, and 90-lined pages; Tome is 100-lined pages)
OR, you can now choose the Daily Tarot Reading Journal, 100 pages, as shown below!
Inside the Daily Tarot Reading Journal
Cover for the Daily Tarot Journal!
A white t-shirt printed with your choice of the Tarot designs: "The Greg," "The Wirt," "The Beast," or "The Enoch" 
One Possible Shirt Option
If This Kickstarter Takes Off! (ALL STRETCH GOALS UNLOCKED! THANK YOU!)
EVERYTHING IS UNLOCKED! Look for NEW GOALS SOON!

How the Funds Will Be Spent
All of the funds will be spent between Kickstarter fees, Shipping Costs, Taxes, and Manufacturing to make the best possible product. Any additional funds will buy some fun bonuses--like exclusives stickers or pins. Beyond that, funds will be paid out for the work involved in this process.
The Manufacturing Process / Timeline
I already have two different manufacturers lined up. So, depending on the project's success, I have two options to fulfill the decks in a timely manner. This is nothing new for me, as I have outsourced my designs to manufacturers for enamel pins, stickers, key chains,  shirts, and even books. While printing a deck of cards is new to me, finding and dealing with a quality manufacturer is not.
Currently, I have the following projected timeline; however, this could change due to printing / manufacturing / shipping issues.
Now - July 14 - Finish the remaining Minor Arcana 
July 1 - Kickstarter Ends at 3:00 PM EST
July 15 - Kickstarter Funds are Released / Manufacturing Begins
September 22 - October 20 - Manufacturing is Complete and Items are Shipped from Manufacturer
Once I have the Items in hand, One Week will be for Signing / Personalizing Items
Shipping Begins as soon as possible after Personalization
My goal is to have these available before Halloween, but it may take longer in the production process / shipping from the manufacturer. Unless something goes drastically wrong, they should be available well before December 2019.
Add - Ons!
For ANY Pledge You May Add-On the Following via Kickstarter or You Can Be Invoiced via PayPal After Your Surveys:
4-Pack of Stickers $5 - Each
6-Pack of Tarot Stickers $10 - Each
Enamel Pin - $6 Each (Your Choice, Including the Kickstarter-Exclusive Design!)
Journal - $10 Each (Your Choice)
For Any Pledge of $35 and UP!
Additional, Unsigned Tarot Deck - $25 Each
Additional, SIGNED Tarot Deck - $35 Each
White T-Shirt of "The Greg," "The Wirt," "The Beast," or "The Enoch" - $15 (Your Choice)
THANK YOU! And if you'd like, please consider sharing this Project!
Here is an Instagram Image that can be shared!
Please feel free to share this image far and wide, with instructions on finding this Kickstarter!
Final Notes
This deck was designed as a parody of the source material.
For INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING, the fees charged will cover First-Class International Shipping and nothing more. Insurance will be optional, and all import fees, taxes, etc. that may be imposed by your town, county, country, etc. are your responsibility. The fee charged here ONLY covers the cost of shipping.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While I've worked with many manufacturers, new ones can cause new problems. This might mean some delays in the manufacturing process. However, I've already been working with / talking to the possible manufacturers and seem to be on a solid track in communications with them.

Along those lines, damaged product and / or misprints may take some time to fix.

Shipping is another area where things can go awry. While I've based this Kickstarter on a specific number of decks to be made, shipping could be drastically delayed if the success is beyond my expectations. It may change me getting the final products from a couple weeks to a couple months.

The other part of that is USPS shipping. Packages go missing or are damaged. To help remedy this, I will be shipping ALL Domestic Pledges that include Tarot decks Priority Mail, which should not only speed up the delivery, but it provides $50 of insurance that can be claimed if the package is lost. I will do my best to work with you to fix these shipping issues the best possible way, from replacing the lost items to filing a claim to sending a new package if additional postage is paid. International Pledges will be shipped via First-Class International Packages that have tracking. Insurance will be optional. 

The last issue could simply be an act of God that takes me out of commission. This is something I'll be handling on my own, so if something catastrophic were to happen to me, then it may delay the process. I plan on being active in the community and posts, so you will have a sense of my presence.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
