updates.update_userinfo: PLEDGES ARE SHIPPED! ... whew.... and a Small Note About Extra Exclusive Bags
updates.update_content:
After a grueling two weeks of packing and sorting and signing and compiling and printing and taping and dropping things off at the post office, every Pledge HAS BEEN SHIPPED!
That being said, if you have not either already received your Pledge or if you have not heard from me via Kickstarter with a tracking number--or an email from PayPal with a tracking number--feel free to let me know! (Along with that, there are a few individuals that I contacted with questions about their Pledges, or that simply have not responded to their Backer surveys. If you fall into either category, please submit your survey and / or be sure to check your Kickstarter messages for a question or two from me.)
Lastly, now that all is shipped, it looks like I have a small handful of bags available. If you would like a cloth bag, please let me know, and we can work something out.

Hey, everyone!
The Decks have arrived, and I've already been pushing through to get stuff out to you all! As some of you may have noticed, tracking info has been sent your way!
(Again, there's not much by way of a particular order. I'm simply having to go through as I can. That being said, if you Pledged for a bag, it may take a few more weeks before I'll have them in hand from Flight of the Parcel. She's been delivering them in small batches, and I'm fulfilling Pledges as I can. I couldn't have been happier with these, either, as look at how perfectly they hold the deck box!)

As the headline says, I should have the decks SOON!
Because of this, PLEASE double-check and / or update your addresses as soon as possible. (And if you haven't responded to the survey at all, yet, please do!) I will be shipping out the different tiers at random / as I can, so while I don't have an official "change it by this date" cut-off, just know that your deck and other pledged items could be headed to you anytime, starting NEXT WEEK!

Hello, everyone!
I hope this update finds you well! If not, perhaps this will perk you up: THE DECKS ARE ON THEIR WAY TO ME! If everything goes smoothly, I should have them in the next couple weeks, so that I can start the process of signing decks, pulling orders together, then the MASSIVE task of shipping everything out. It's going to be quite the undertaking, and I'm sure that there will be some hiccups. So, already, I ask for your patience, as I WILL do my best to take care of each and every one of you!

updates.update_userinfo: Most Everything is Nearing Completion! ($25 and Under Tiers Have Shipped!)
updates.update_content:
Hey Folks!
Real Quick: The first three Pledge Tiers of $25 or less have shipped! Depending on your location, these should arrive in the next few days--or weeks, so keep an eye out--and let me know if you think something is amiss.
At this point in time, almost everything is either produced and waiting in my home or in the final stages of production!

Hey, Everyone!
It's been a minute since the last update, but I wanted to ensure that there was something TO update before I bothered you with more. So... here's the rundown!
As of last Tuesday, Kickstarter released the funds, and production is moving right along.
Currently In-Production:

Folks, I don't even know where to begin. The support has blown me away at every stage, from the Pledges to the shares to the words of encouragement and more. This was a huge task and one that has taken up an enormous part of my life, so it means more to me than you'll ever know that you've all made this happen in such a gigantic way.
Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.
With the closure of the Kickstarter, I'll be in a bit of a "fund limbo" while they process everyone's payment and the funds are released. In that time, I will continue to finish the box designs and prep all of the cards for printing.

updates.update_userinfo: Exclusive Pin, Card Backs, and New Journal Option Reveal!
updates.update_content:
Now that we've almost hit the end, I've been racing to pull everything together for the final reveals!
First, the pin! It seemed fitting that what started this whole adventure should be commemorated with the Kickstarter Exclusive pin. It is limited to ONE pin per Pledge. Remember, EVERY PLEDGE of $35 and up is AUTOMATICALLY getting this pin for free! (For those Pledging $25 and under, you can either choose this for the Pin--if it's included in the tier--or you can Pledge for it as an add-on for an additional $6.)

This is the home stretch, everyone! Not much time left to finalize your choices and add-ons, so please be sure to get everything you want, especially as some of these items--like the bag and shirts--are only available through this Kickstarter!
(A quick note about the shirts, as I've had a few folks ask for them as an add on. Like the bags, if you message me with the design choice and shirt size, I am more than willing to do those as an add on to ANY tier! Just be sure to let me know before the Project ends; otherwise, I cannot guarantee your shirt size and design choice.)

project_data.project_name: Tarot of the Unknown: A 78-Card Cartoon Inspired Deck

campaign.story:
Hi, I'm Beatrice Blue. I'm a Montreal-based illustrator and storyteller from Spain, who loves exploring and adventures. You might know me from Instagram, where I started the #ChildhoodWeek challenge, or my Once Upon a Unicorn Horn book. 
To say thank you to all those who enjoy my work and continuously support me throughout my journey, I am very excited to announce this campaign to launch my first art book – Wonder.
I want to create a book that illustrates the explorative and imaginative mindset, and inspires readers to seek the wonders all around them to always grow as artists.
Across the pages of Wonder, I will share my design insights and discuss the elements of my work that help me to tell enchanting stories. You will discover my detailed thoughts on how and where I find my inspiration and ideas, how I turn ideas into illustrations, as well as my process of understanding concepts and developing them in both traditional and digital media. This book will also contain an extensive collection of my best artwork, including new designs and characters, as well as never-before-seen sketches. 
Throughout its creation, I consider WONDER to be a new piece of art in itself. My aim is to make it feel like a treasure to keep with you at all times. It will be finished with beautiful magical effects, such as glow-in-the-dark accents, and its handy portable size makes it perfect to carry on your own adventures, to read wherever and whenever you want. 
As this is quite an ambitious project, I am super happy to be working with 3dtotal Publishing, who are experienced in creating many amazing artbooks and educational resources for artists. 
If this campaign is successful in funding, I hope you enjoy reading the book as much as I have enjoyed creating it! 
Below are the exclusive items you can receive across the tiers, that are only available during this campaign. Some tiers are limited though, so get yours quick and don't miss out!  
SIGNED BOOK
I am offering a selection of signed, first edition copies of the book across a selection of tiers. There will only be a limited number of these available, so make sure to secure yours before they're gone!
TOTE BAG
You can also pledge for an eco-friendly canvas tote bag screen-printed with glow-in-the-dark ink along with your copy of the book!
ORIGINAL ARTWORKS
Tiers 12-16 are limited to only one backer each. These tiers include an original piece created by me, as well as a signed copy of the book, a tote bag, a riso print, and a set of enamel pins. 
Little Pow: Markers, oil colored pencils and neon pencils on cold pressed Canson watercolor paper.
Wolf boy: Oil colored pencils, neon pencils and oil pastels on cold pressed Strathmore watercolor paper.
Storm: Gouache, oil pastels, neon pencils and oil colored pencils on cold pressed Strathmore watercolor paper.
Bird Girls: Oil colored pencils and neon pencils on cold pressed Strathmore watercolor paper.
Wonder: Pencil, markers, oil colored pencils, neon pencils and oil pastels on handmade watercolor paper.
RISO PRINT
There are also opportunities to receive an A4 riso print, designed by me, with your copy of the book. 
ENAMEL PIN SET
Additionally, I have designed four enamel pins for this campaign. These are only offered across certain tiers, so make sure to select the right tier if you would like these pins.  
As previously mentioned, launching this book through Kickstarter allows us to thank those who made this book possible by adding stretch goal rewards to the campaign. I have designed three high-quality rewards to be given away if we can meet certain targets. The more the campaign funds, the more exclusive items we can give our supporters! 
Stretch goals are available to all backers from Tier 2 and above.
Thank you for your interest in this project. I hope you will consider joining me on this journey to help me turn this book into a reality.
Beatrice 
3dtotal Publishing is able to ship worldwide! Simply select your pledge option and your location, and Kickstarter will calculate the shipping for you. 
 All rewards will be sent out at the same time (both signed and unsigned). However, if there is a very high number of backers, please keep in mind that it will take us a few days to work our way through packaging all the rewards. 3dtotal Publishing has a fulfilment company lined up to do this as quickly as possible, so once dispatched, rewards should reach you in 10-15 working days.  
We have fulfilled many successful Kickstarters and we have a great record for delivering parcels around the world. For this campaign we will only be offering tracked shipping to certain locations as we're really determined that you receive your parcel first time without any hiccups or problems with delivery. Parcels sent to the UK, USA and Europe will be sent using our regular and reliable service.
Unforeseen delays that are out of our control can occur during delivery, so please allow an additional two weeks before checking up on your package. We will be doing our best to make sure everything gets to you on time!  
For those who are not familiar with Kickstarter, it’s a worldwide crowd-funding platform for artists and their creative projects. Once the funding period ends, we will start finalizing the book and the extra rewards, which will be sent to you in December. About a month before that, we will send you a survey through Kickstarter, asking for your address – the reason we wait until a few weeks before is so that we have everyone’s most up-to-date details. When the survey is ready for you to fill in, you will receive an email through Kickstarter. We ask that you fill the survey in as soon as possible, to avoid any delays in sending out your reward! 
As seasoned users of Kickstarter, 3dtotal Publishing know that a very small number of backers don’t fill in the survey at the end of a Kickstarter campaign, making it impossible for us to process and ship their rewards. 3dtotal pledges to hold all rewards for backers that fail to fill in their survey for 12 months and to make multiple efforts to contact the backers in question to try to successfully deliver their items.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
One of the biggest challenges will be producing and delivering everything to you on time. We've selected an expert printer to work with and a fulfilment company 3dtotal Publishing has an established relationship with, so everything is in place as much as possible to ensure smooth production and delivery by the end of December 2019.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Find Beatrice's enchanting work in Earth Draw III - and help us protect rainforests
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone,
We hope you are all well!
As well as creating inspiring and informative art books, we are also committed to helping the planet and the people who inhabit it, and since 2018 we have run a yearly creative crowdfunding project called Earth Draw to raise funds for environmental charities. 
This year, we are teaming up with Beatrice Blue and 13 other fantastic artists to create a limited edition, high-quality art annual.

Hi everyone,
We did it! 
We'd like to say a huge thank you to everyone who has backed this campaign, shared it with friends and family, and supported Beatrice in making her first art book become a reality. We're so grateful to you all for making this project a success, raising £35,731!

Hi everyone,
The campaign is almost at an end, but we're so grateful for all your support in helping this book become a reality.

Hi everyone
Can you believe we're almost halfway through the campaign? 
We got something exciting in the post today, a first look at Beatrice's riso print that is up for grabs across certain tiers!
Check out the stunning final design below...

Hi everyone,
Fantastic news! We are now successfully funded, and thanks to you this amazing book Wonder will be brought to life!


You may have already seen our first stretch goal has been announced, if we pass £40,000 all backers of Tier 2 and above will also receive a free sheet of stickers, designed by Beatrice herself! So spread the word about this campaign and help us unlock as many exclusive goodies as possible.

Hi everyone,
We'd like to say a big thank you to everyone who has supported this campaign so far! 
There is currently less than £1000 to go until we are fully funded, so please join us in sharing this campaign with friends and family so we can make this book become a reality!

project_data.project_name: Wonder: The Art and Practice of Beatrice Blue

campaign.story:
Hey All, I'm Liz, artist behind LizHarryDesign and this is my 12th Kickstarter! This time I'm aiming to fund fees to make my SUMMER inspired pins that celebrate all that is the rollercoaster of this freelance life!
The campaign finishes mid-june and I'm hoping to have the funded rewards ready to start shipping END of JUNE / START of JULY (please check delivery times for specific rewards) But these designs aren't just for when the sun shines they're for wearing to remind you to take it easy ALL YEAR ROUND!
Details of the pin:
50mm High Pin
Lettering reads 'self care factor 50 - AVOID BURNOUT'
Two pins with rubber clasps to secure on reverse
Each pin comes with a matching sticker* and mini (A6) print
If the project hits its funding goal you can pick the colourway you'd like of any of the pins in the survey after the campaign ends - for now just select the amount of pins you'd like.
As a Kickstarter pledger to one of my campaigns you get exclusive prices - but I don't JUST mean the EARLY BIRD REWARDS - once all my items are in my shop each is priced differently, reflective of its manufacturing costs - but to my kickstarter pledgers the pins cost just £8 each! Because you're part of the process AND you get to say you helped make the pin its my way of saying 'thanks!' - if that isn't enough already you'll also get a matching *sticker & mini print with each perfectly packaged pin! 
*If we surpass £1650 all pledges will come with a free sticker sheet with all the designs instead.
All of the pins in this campaign are on the larger side, and they all use a few colours, so they're priced £1 more than my previous campaigns, but I'm still doing my best to bring you alotta flair on a budget!
The NEW Fish & Chips Laser Cut Necklace in MINT



By backing this project you will help me raise the funds to get these pins manufactured. The majority of the goal amount covers the production of the pins, these are all very detailed/large/colourful pins, so manufacturing costs are higher overall in this campaign. The amount that remains relates to postage and packaging costs in shipping the pins out to backers.
For those Early Birds to the campaign - there are special pledge amounts for those who support this campaign early on. Look for the Early Bird pledge amount - and grab yourself 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6 BEACH THEMED pins/bobby pins/earrings at a price especially for you COASTAL LOVERS!
At the end of the campaign - backers will be able to choose which designs they would like from the unlocked pins. The STRETCH GOALS LIST and funding targets image below give a hint as to what they will be - the actual design will be revealed as we get nearer to the goals!
The LASERCUT FISH & CHIP hairslides £15 each


Pins from my 2018 Halloween Collection
It makes me so happy when people return to pledge to a new collection - and I know lots of you pledged to my Halloween Kickstarter (Shown above) so wherever you see a pin offered in multiple colourways that other option will co-ordinate with my halloween 2018 collection colours - cause we all love a good colour co-ordinating pin collection!


Once the pins are manufactured all post within the UK will be sent out ROYAL MAIL 2nd Class signed postage. For international deliveries there's standard international shipping which can take up to 30days, or in surveys tick for International Tracked shipping for an extra £4.50 which takes 5-7 working days with tracking.
This means no tracking numbers will be available with standard shipping (although I always obtain proof of postage).
Please note tracked shipping is highly recommended if your pledge is larger than 2/3 pins.
Being a visual person my home is on instagram! Click on the image links below to stop by and say hello:
And stop by my shop to check out my other designs
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
These pins are being manufactured for me - therefore the production process is outside of my control. Potentially we could hit delays if the manufacturer experiences any issues - but this is my 12th project and I'm working with a manufacturer who has shown themselves to have a high quality of work and to deliver on time - so hopefully all good!

If, however, there are any delays, I will keep all backers updated in my KICKSTARTER UPDATES.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Update: EVERY Goal has been funded, and each pin pledge receives an equal amount in stickers! Example: 3 pins = 3 stickers. Scroll for all the info!  💖  Thank you!  💖  
Hello everyone, my name is Ariel! I go by @theroseraptor on instagram.  💖 
I am a storyteller and an artist who loves pins. (and dinosaurs!) 💖💖💖💖                                  
In pursuit of my dream to tell stories, part of that journey now includes making pins. Yay! Although this is my first kickstarter, this is not my first time making a pin.
  💖 Share if you'd like to see more Dino-Knights unlocked, and support our fight against the Meteor! 💖
The amazing thing about Kickstarter is the ability to pledge now and pay ONLY when the campaign is successful. If the initial goal is not funded, you will not be charged. There is no risk! You can also change your pledge amount at any time before the end of the 30 day campaign.
 By pledging to this Kickstarter, you are getting these adorable dinos at the best possible price, retail value is between 12$ to 14$. Yay savings!  ✨   ✨   ✨  
All funds go towards the production, packing, and shipping of the pins. 
Let's unlock those stretch goals, knights! 
Pin details include:
✨Gold plating  ✨ Two rubber backings   ✨ Back stamped   ✨ Backing cards   ✨ Glitter enamel (on select pins.)  ✨ Varied sizes    ✨ Really cute dinosaurs!
This pin is a 1.25" gold plated pin with pink glitter enamel. It is the first pin I've made and I'm pretty proud of it. I hope this gives you confidence in backing this project! ✨ ✨ ✨ 
Once surveys are sent out, this pin will be available as an option!
💖 NEED TO CHANGE YOUR PLEDGE? 💖
Early Birds: Add 8$ for each additional pin you'd like.
Regular Pledge: Add 10$ for each additional pin you'd like.
Stickers: Add 3$ for each additional sticker you'd like.  
 ✨  Once the campaign has ended I will send out surveys for the pins.
 ✨  End June/early July orders will be made once funds are released from KS.
 ✨  August the orders will be received, graded, sorted, and packed.
 ✨  September all orders will be shipped!  💖  
💖 FUNDING 💖
70% will go towards manufacturing of the pins, 20% towards shipping and packaging, and the other 10% will be in Kickstarter fees.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
✨ Colors may look slightly different than they do on the screen - Pantones look different in person! 
✨ Due to how pins are made, there is room for error on the manufacturer’s side in production, color, defects, and shipping.
All of these things are completely out of my control. 
I will do my best to ensure you get beautiful quality pins, and should I deem the pins are not up to standard, I will have the pins remade.
✨ Should anything happen, I will keep all of you informed via email and Instagram. 
Thank you! 💖
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
You read that right! Yesterday I sent out the majority of all backer rewards!  Many of you should have received an email with a tracking number, unless you only ordered stickers, or are an international backer. 
 THAT MEANS YOUR REWARDS ARE ON THEIR WAY!! AHHHHH!!!!❤️❤️ 
 First: When you receive your order, the extra goodie I included is a mini print! 😱❤️YAY! Although... it’s kinda tough to get it out of the mailers...so be careful!! 😅  
Two: Make sure to post pictures on Instagram or Twitter and tag me (@theroseraptor) so I can see those beautiful Dino’s in their new homes!

Hello lovelies! (⚠️International Backers PLEASE read!⚠️)
If you've watched my insta stories you might have seen that Stamps.com decided to stop working for me, and wouldn't allow me to add funds to buy and print labels. And with no weekend support, I couldn't get the issue resolved. Funnnnn, right? (;´༎ຶД༎ຶ`)
Despite that, tomorrow we should have our account fixed and be able to print those labels. The goal is to have the MAJORITY of the packages in the mail tomorrow, and Tuesday. (Monday and Tuesday.)

Hello my lovely knights,
I wanted to give you all a quick update. ❤️
First, please check if you received a direct message from me. Some backers accidentally chose too many stickers (Thanks to KS's confusing wording in multiple choice options, which I can't change.) or didn't choose enough, or didn't respond to the survey at all. Please take a moment to check your inbox so I can make sure to prep your orders correctly.

✨ GOOD NEWS, EVERYONE! ✨
Look what I got in the mail yesterday!

Hello everyone!
Reward surveys have been sent out! Yay!
Please fill out the surveys as soon as possible! This helps greatly in the upcoming orders!
I have left the option to change your address at any time before I ship them, to give flexibility to those moving, or who might be unsure where to send them. So if you need to change your address before August, just fill the form out now, and change your address later!

It’s official!
The Dino-Knights Hard Enamel Pin Story is FUNDED!
Thank you all for your support from beginning to end! Bringing these Dino’s to life and seeing how much people love them brings me so much joy! I CANNOT wait to send the final pins out to you!

campaign.story:
Hello friends!
Welcome to my next Project inspired by the Avatar and his friends! There are a total of 18 main designs and a total of 5 mini designs to unlock as well, which brings the total designs for Book 1 to 23 designs! 
These are the main 7 designs I want to get funded for sure and the rest will be stretch goals! If all of Book 1 designs get funded, I will start to post Book 2 designs for everyone and see if we can get those unlocked as well! We only got 30 days to fund these so hopefully we can see some of these come to life!
These will each be 1.75 in size, all hard enamel and with different types of metal for each one. The mini designs will be 1 inch in size!

Book 1 
1. The Great Bridge - $400
2. Must Restore My Honor - $800
3. Just a Boomerang Guy - $1200
4. Moon Princess - $1600
5. Flying Bison - $2000
6. Floating Rock Lemur - $2400
7. Rock King - $2800

Stretch Goals:
8. Dragon Teapot - $3200
9. Blue Spirit Mask - $3600
10. My Cabbages! - $4000
11. Koi Fish - $4400
12. Whistle - $4800
13. Hay There! - $5200
14. Quote Necklace - $5600
15. Unagi - $6000
16. Penguin Sledding - $6400
17. Relics - $7200
18. Sokka Doodle Bison (Number 6 Only) - $7500
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is the biggest Kickstarter I've done yet and it's just a matter of being patient with me! I am hoping we can at least unlock 10 of these, I worked very hard on all these fan art inspired pins! I just ask that everyone be patient as this month goes by and pins go into production and what not!

Hi!
Pins are finally here and I’ll be grading them through the week and I’m just currently waiting on some stickers to arrive and I’ll be shipping these out by Friday to everyone so keep an eye out on them!!!
Thank you for all your patience everyone!

Hey guys!
Thank you for all your patience on these pins!!! I’m So happy to say these are arriving finally by the end of July and I’ll be shipping them out ASAP!!!!
For those who are interested I will be having another Kickstarter for this because the previous quick one I had failed to get funded but I will be including Book 1 and Book 2 designs in this Kickstarter so watch out for that some time in the Fall!!!!
Here’s a sneak peak of Aang who glows in the dark by the way! ^_^

Hi everyone!
We’re coming up to the end date of this! Thank you so much for all the support!
If you’d like to add on the first stretch goal which is Uncle Iroh’s Jasmine Tea - just add $10 to your pledge and I’ll make sure to include this one in your package!
We keep teetering underneath $3200 but if we can keep it above $3100 I can fund this design from my own pocket!

💜Avatar The Last Airbender Update: ⁣ ⁣ I’ve updated the banner to reflect the main goals for this Kickstarter which are just the characters. The other designs I’m sad to say I doubt will be unlocked as I only have 10 days left on the Kickstarter and people have been canceling their pledges left and right so yeah it’s bummed me out! ⁣ ⁣ BUT I will still leave those other stretch goals in case we somehow manage to unlock a design or two. But I’ve decided that if a lot of you are still interested in the other designs I do want to unlock them - I’m going to make another Kickstarter with only those designs and see if we could unlock them that way.⁣ ⁣ 💜I do appreciate all the support that the Kickstarter has gotten and still has so thank you.⁣ ⁣ 💜Have a nice weekend everyone, I’ll be back up and running next week hopefully. ⁣ ⁣

campaign.story:
Whats lurking inside your straw?












This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 600+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $280MM raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have successfully completed 3 Kickstarter campaigns in the past (all of which were delivered on time).
 
We take the trust of our backers very seriously, and understand that you are only backing us because you expect a quality product in a reasonable amount of time. Before giving delivery dates of any kind, we evaluate the entire process from design, engineering, tooling, testing, production and shipping. The delivery dates we have selected have been carefully evaluated and selected because of their high degree of achievability. 

We've spent the last few months designing and engineering the Rain Straw. We have already chosen our factory and have made two separate trips to their facilities in preparation for full scale production. The factory we have chosen is a reputable factory with a strong track record of delivering quality products on time. 
 
Of course, surprises can happen and not everything can be foreseen ahead of time. Between tooling, sourcing, and logistics, certain processes can delay timelines. With that being said, we are confident that we will once again deliver our products on time. We will keep all of our backers informed of any potential hurdles as they may arise. We've learned a lot from previous Kickstarter campaigns, and we're committed to complete transparency and accountability with our backers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
To get more technical, Hush Iced relaxes the nervous system by simulating deep touch pressure therapy -- which increases serotonin and melatonin levels while decreasing cortisol levels -- improving your mood and promoting restful sleep at the same time. 
Hush Iced is unique in that it provides a cooler way to reap the benefits of weighted blankets. 
Did you know that when you’re getting ready to take a snooze, your body temperature decreases to initiate sleep? Science shows that room temperature should be between 68-72 degrees for the optimum sleep benefits. 
Hush Iced can help you get there by preventing you from overheating, even during the nastiest heat wave. 
Hush Iced uses the same advanced weight distribution technology as the classic Hush Blanket, but with a lighter, cool-to-the-touch cover. Hush Iced’s proprietary bamboo and cotton blend helps wick away sweat during hot summer months, while still providing weighted relief.
 At Hush, we believe in love at first sleep! If you do not absolutely love your blanket after night one, we will give you 99 more tries or your money back!
 Two years ago, we came up with the idea for the Hush Blanket, a weighted blanket designed for those who wanted to relax and fall asleep, fast. But we noticed one thing, Hush was great during fall and winter, even during spring, but it was admittedly hard to use during the grueling, hot summer months. And we found that was the case with most other weighted blankets.
We set out to change that.
Hush Iced was created for use even when it’s hot out, with an amazing breathable fabric and a lighter, cool-to-the-touch cover, so you can stay cool and calm all summer long.

 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.
 We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Hush a reality. 
We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a Hush Iced blanket, if you’re a supporter of Hush, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! 
Check out our other weighted blankets in Canada.

Your Hush Iced blankets will be shipping July 2019! We’re able to get them to you so soon because we are backed with great manufacturers who lead the production of our first Hush blankets. 
International shipping costs will be paid after the campaign when accurate shipping costs are calculated for your country.
If we get enough pledges from each country, we can send your Hush blankets in bulk, which would cost even less in shipping!
In addition, not charging international shipping on Kickstarter means it’s excluded from Kickstarter’s commissions -- and we can pass those savings on to you!
You will be able to choose different add-ons and update your shipping addresses 1-2 weeks after the campaign ends in the post-campaign survey, which can affect shipping price. We do ask that you include a physical address -- no P.O. Boxes, please!
You will also be responsible for all international duties. U.S. and Canadian orders will not incur duties.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team of engineers and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfilment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring the Hush collection to your homes, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey Hushlers,
Here is your quick weekly update on what is happening in the Hush shipping world!
International orders have successfully arrived to Chicago yesterday and are have been received by DHL there. As previously mentioned, we have the tracking numbers but will only upload to you once we see the initial movement in their system to avoid any confusion. We can't wait for you to get everything!
Western Seaboard Orders have finally continued movement. The remaining orders that are missing have been picked, around 120 shipped today and the rest being prepared for a Thursday induction into the US for US orders. Tracking numbers to follow!

Hey Hushlers!
Sorry we didn't get an update out on Thursday as we wanted to solidify a few things before we came to you with some concrete news. 
We have only good news though :)
After leaving our old warehouse we found a reliable partner who we can work with and it is proving to give us some positive movement. 
International Orders

campaign.story:
✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦
Shadow Box Insect Pins
Inspired by framed insect collections, this collaborative project by Coey Kuhn and Shy Custis draws on occult themes for a series of pins suitable for wear or display.
With cohesive motifs and colors across the series, you can mix and match pins into your ideal arrangements for framing, or into fitting combinations to wear with the day's outfit.
This series includes specialty additions like stone inlays, collar chains, and moving parts. Pledge now to help fund our first two sets, share with others to help unlock the rest!
Sample Photos of the Base Sets. Click for Fullview
✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦
Reward Details
All 8 pin sets have been unlocked!
5 mini accent pins (unlocked: free additional "Infinity" accent with every set of accents!)
5 stickers for all $10+ pledges
4x6 inch embossed backing cards (included with every set) for use in displays
Bonus pins unlocked! For info on how bonus pins will be awarded, see this update. 
 The final stretch goal has been met!! Every backer pledging to a pin tier will get the Sulfur Moth pin for free!
The series is plated in an antique gold finish, with black and white matte soft enamel, and clasp-style pin backs.
✦✦ Sets vs. Individual Pins ✦✦ We originally built this campaign around pin sets for logistical reasons; since the two of us fulfill KS rewards ourselves, shipping sets of pins would make the process much smoother with less room for error. Sets also allowed us to structure stretch goals to optimize how many pins might get unlocked. We never could have imagined it would be this successful!! We are completely floored by how this campaign is performing, and can't thank our backers enough.
Because of the campaign's amazing trajectory, we've partnered with BackerKit to allow $40+ backers to add additional sets AND individual pins to their existing pledges after funding (at a discount!). All pins will also be openly available on our shop after funding (including individuals), however at higher prices than being offered to backers.
Clink for Fullview
Detail specs for several of the specialty pins
✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦
 Stretch Goals
More pins are possible through stretch goals! 6 more sets of insect pins are unlockable at the goals below. 
✦✦ UPDATE ✦✦ Added goals for $60k and $100k because of the unexpected success! Thank you all so much, we're floored!
✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦
Fulfillment & Tentative Timeline
While all art for the series is completed and ready for production, please keep in mind fulfillment progress is dependent on the final number of backers and our manufacturer's processes. We gave ourselves a generous-but-tentative delivery date of October 2019, but will be updating backers regularly as production progresses should the project be funded.
If successful, surveys to collect backer's set choices and addresses will be sent out shortly after funding so that we can tally pin quantities to be produced. As this leaves several months between address collection and reward shipments, we will have the option open for backers to edit their address until shipments begin. We will also be announcing a couple weeks before shipments begin for those needing a reminder.
✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The largest potential problem is if something were to be delayed on our manufacturer's end; all art is complete and formatted, and we've already worked with our supplier on getting samples made for the base sets. All we need is funding to get everything made!

We do online sales and are regularly shipping orders out to customers. We're no strangers to shipping merch and customer service!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Show your love for Studio Ghibli films!
The Studio Ghibli spinning pin set are finally here! This set include designs from several films including Spirited Away, How's Moving Castle, Princess Mononoke, Kiki's Delivery Service, Ponyo, and My Neighbor Totoro!  Each design will be unlocked once the goal is reached. I've had an experience designing an enamel pin in the past (scroll down to the bottom for picture).
Pledging is the only way to unlock the design you want. You can always change your pledge amount until the last day of the campaign.
You will not be charged until the campaign is successfully funded. 
Since these designs will all be spinning pins, please watch the video below to see how they will work. 
SPIRITED AWAY PIN ADD-ON IS NOW AVAILABLE!
Note: This pin is not part of this Kickstarter goals, therefore it will only part of your pledge by adding $15. 
-Please see the first update on how to add this to your reward-
A little bit about me, my name is Jessica and I’m the owner of Daruma Cat (@daruma.cat on instagram) or Daruma Cat on Etsy. As a graphic designer, illustrator and designer, I enjoy drawing whimsical things relating to anime and video games. I’m back for my second kickstarter this time around. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact me :)
 Disclaimer:  I'm not the intellectual property owner of the characters used in these designs. 
10% - Kickstarter Fee
10% - Packaging
80% - Production
December 12 - 31  : Kickstarter duration (Surveys will be sent after the campaign is successfully funded)
 January: Kickstarter fund received & Production time
February : All the pins will be shipped!
Please note that these are only the estimate, if there are any changes, all backers will be notified otherwise.
A sample of my past enamel pin

There can be a delay in pin productions and shipping during the holidays but I will do my best to keep everything as close to the original schedule as possible. If there is any changes in the timeline, all backers will be notified immediately.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
*ALL DESIGNS ARE UNLOCKED*
Hi! I’m MJ and this is my second Kickstarter project for my new and growing brand, o.mj studio! I wish to bring to life my designs inspired by the Wizarding World and Harry Potter franchise and share it with anyone who might be a fan too (: 
Reaching the initial goal of S$300 would unlock the first pin, NIFFLER (isn't he a cutie??). I have many designs of our beloved Fantastic Beasts as Stretch Goals so if the design you are interested in is still locked, please still pledge to help unlock them since you can edit your pledge anytime before the campaign ends if it remains locked! By pledging, you'll get the pins at a discount and any extras will then be sold on my online store. 
Also, your credit card will not be charged until the campaign ends successfully so don’t worry (':  
The pins are hard enamel (smooth finish) and range around 1 inch (specifics are provided below) with varying finishes (gold, rose gold, nickel plating etc.) They will come with my brand logo at the back as well as a colored rubber clutches and a specially designed backing card!
ALL DESIGNS ARE UNLOCKED so you can choose from any of the 9 designs (:
THANK YOU SO MUCH EVERYONE (':
You can also comment if there's a specific Fantastic Beast you'll like to be available as a pin if all the stretch goals are fulfilled!
**If you are currently pledged to the Early Bird tiers and would like to add more pins, please select the available Early Bird slots for higher quantity pins. If these are no longer available, please add S$10 for each additional pin manually to your pledge to remain on the Early Bird tiers and do drop me a note during the survey to specify the design (: **
 *UPDATED* FREEBIE STICKERS!!
We've unlocked both the free Matching Die-Cut Sticker for each pin pledged and the Mini Sticker Pack (of all 9 designs!)
Every backer will be receiving: 
(1) Matching Die-Cut Sticker for each pin pledged and, 
(2) Mini Sticker Pack(of all 9 designs!) made fully by me in my humble abode as a gratitude to you guys and a lil' extra something for your support! These will be on Matte Sticker Paper and they'll be perfect to spice up your bullet journals or even pasted over your pin backing card (to cover up the empty spot left by your pin!) and reused as a bookmark or something! Hope you guys will like it and it's my way of showing my appreciation (': I might even throw in some stickers of your favorite characters from the franchise (as seen in the background) depending on the availability! (; 
 *If you would like an additional set of this Mini Sticker Pack, you can just add SGD$3 to your current pledge amount!* 
PIN MANUFACTURING: 60% of the funds will go towards the production of the pins. This includes the pins itself, rubber pin clutches and the shipment of pins to me.
PACKAGING & SHIPPING: 30% of the funds will go into packaging and shipping. This includes bubble mailers, cellophane sleeves, shipping labels and backing card.
KICKSTARTER FEES: 10% of the fund goes towards Kickstarter as they charge every successful campaign a small fee for using their platform as well as transaction fees.
16 December 2018: Kickstarter Launches!  
3 January 2019: Last Day of Campaign!
4 January 2019: Kickstarter Ends // Survey Sent Out within a week // Production order placed (probably earlier if I can get a gauge on the demand for the designs - I've placed the order already (: )
February 2019: Pins arrive // Packaging and Shipping commences
March 2019: All pins shipped out
If the project is funded successfully, a survey will be sent to each backer upon the campaign’s completion, allowing you to select the pin(s) of your choice from the unlocked pins. Please complete the survey by the stipulated deadline or your pins will be selected at random. Please also note that if you do not fill up the survey with shipping information, I will not be able to mail your Kickstarter rewards to you since there is no address provided :O
Each pin package will be sent out in a plastic bubble mailer. Shipping fees will be added on to any pledge you make. 
Domestic (Singapore only) – Rewards will be sent via SingPost Normal Mail with no additional cost for Single Pins. For higher reward tiers, shipping fees are stated after selecting your reward tier.
International – Rewards will be shipped via SingPost and shipping fees are stated after selecting your reward tier. 
Additional S$3 would be charged if backers prefer to have the package mailed as a Registered article with limited tracking information depending on the overseas postal administration. Lost packages will be insured up to the lower of S$68 or package value.
Any additional tax, fees or customs’ charges are the responsibility of the backer.
Lost packages: To keep shipping costs low, all other packages will be mailed via Normal Mail without tracking.  I will not be able to cover the cost in the case of lost packages for Normal Mail but if there are any issues with the delivery, do let me know. Shipping your package as a Registered article is available at an additional cost of S$3 so please adjust your pledge amount accordingly and let me know! 
I've recently funded my Christmas Enamel Pin successfully and I also have an existing collection of Dessert Animal Pins as seen below! (Check out my Instagram page for more information and pictures!)
PURCHASE AS AN ADD-ON 
These are available as well so if you interested in any of the designs, you can simply pledge an additional S$9 (no additional shipping) on top of your pledge for the Fantastic Beasts pins and let me know the design you want subsequently in the survey!
To purchase an additional pin from my existing collection, you have to change your pledge amount by first clicking on the "Manage Your Pledge" button (located at the top of the campaign page or by clicking your current reward tier) then clicking on the "Change your Pledge" button. Add the additional amount (S$9 x # of pins) to your current pledge amount with shipping. 
(Example: 2 Reward pins + 2 Existing Collection pins = $22 + $18 (2 x $9) + $6 shipping = $46)
Instagram: @o.mj_studio
Email: studio.omj@gmail.com
You can see more pictures of my enamel pins and merchandise on my Instagram page and feel free to drop me an email/message if you have any queries! (:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There remains the possibility of delays in production and shipping duration. However, I will ensure prompt communication with the manufacturer during the entire production process and since I have worked with the supplier before, the risks are minimal.

There might be slight variation in the color of pin and shape of the mold between the mockup and actual production but such changes will be minor. (color codes provided match the official Pantone colors but may not display exactly the same on your display screen)

I will also personally scrutinize the quality of each and every pin prior to shipment to ensure that every backer receives their rewards in the best condition.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hi! 
This is a campaign to help me fund my first venture into enamel pins. 
Whether it’s the enamel pins, the fluffy birds, love for Pokemon, or the overall cuteness that brought you here, I hope something among the bunch resonates with you!  
For starters, $450 CAD (approx. $340 USD) will let me run a batch for Altaria, the first design in the set. 
These fluffy lovebirds hold a special place in my heart. Gustan and Celestine are based on a painting I did in high school, and this campaign was originally created for bringing this design to life.
Stretch Goals
The two other designs, Eevee and Ninetales, will be unlockable at $750 CAD (approx. $570 USD) and $1000 CAD (approx. $760 USD) respectively. 
The first to unlock as a stretch goal would be the Eevee pin, in light of the recent Let's Go Pikachu / Eevee games! 
They're siblings, if you're wondering.
The last main design in the set will be everyone's favourite design, Ninetales!
The final main design in the set, because everything starts and ends with our love for ourselves.
We hit 1k for Ninetales way faster than I anticipated!! Thank you all! 
The last design in the series will be Dratini & Dragonair, unlocked at $1500 CAD (approx $1135 USD) 
I always felt that if I were to add another design to the trio, it would need to fit the theme both in design and meaning. After a long midnight chat with my mom, Safeguarded came to be.
All designs will be 4CM at their longest (widest??) point, with 2 back posts, hard enamel, gold-colour plating, and rubber clutches. 
Backing cards are in production! 
To keep costs low, shipping will be UNTRACKED for all backers! Shipping will be $3CAD within Canada, and $6CAD for international backers. 
Early Bird Tiers: 
Since the Beginning - $9CAD (approx $7 USD) for 1 pin 
From Here On Out - $18CAD (approx $13.5 USD) for 2 pins
Here All Along – $26CAD (approx $20 USD) for 3 pins
Regular Pricing Tiers:
-Sticker Tier Coming Soon- 
Alone != Lonely – $11CAD (approx $8.33 USD) for 1 pin 
Halves of a Whole - $21CAD (approx $16 USD) for 2 pins
Now to Eternity -  $30CAD (approx $23 USD) for 3 pins
Ever Upwards - $40CAD (approx $30 USD) for 4 pins
Milestone Rewards: 
Sticker option 1: Aurora Ninetales
All backers will receive two stickers with their pledge!
Sticker option 2: Marvel Scale Dratini
All backers will receive two stickers with their pledge!
Sticker Option 3 : Berry Eevee
All backers will receive two stickers with their pledge!
Sticker Option 4 : Midnight Altaria 
All backers will receive two stickers with their pledge!
 *For additional stickers, please add $2CAD to your pledge and let me know at the end of the campaign! 
As of December 12
Thank you so much! 
I can be found on Instagram as @lycheemochi_art - lots of resin art and doodles can be found there! 
-These are fan made designs of characters belonging to their original owners-
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
- Delays are not uncommon with enamel pin manufacturing due to errors and shipping time. I will be doing my best to keep everyone updated as we go! 
- These designs will be run through with the manufacturer and may be slightly adjusted for manufacturing purposes. 
- Due to monitor settings and manufacturing processes, colours may differ from what is present on screen. These are digital drawings representing (hopefully!) a physical product.

campaign.story:
Our goal is to create a box to showcase an independent artist every two months. It will contain original content designed by the artist and it will come with a mini zine to learn more about them (why not put a face on their name ?!), the way they work, and what inspire them on a daily basis. Every item will be imagined and designed by the artist and Mini Gallery Box will take care of the production and the shipping. Items will be made in France and Europe, and exclusively in France as soon as we can. 
For each box, we really want to listen to the artists to know what products they would like to create with us, and, why not make their wildest creative dreams come true ! The content of each box will be different, depending on the artists’ desire. If we can, we would love, later on, to put together a themed box with many artists from around the world !

If we are asking for 9 000 €, it is because we would like to make a second box right after this one this fall. It will be available in our online shop (coming soon !). We have no idea who the second artist will be but feel free to tell us wich artist you'd like to see featuring a box !
What is really important to us, and also our number one priority, is to pay the artists featured in our boxes very fairly. This is why we need you today : a share of the money will be used to pay the artist and the rest will be used to produce every item we designed for you ! 
If we reach our goal by the end of May, we will order all the items in June. Some of the items need 1 month to be made so we will receive all the merchandise in July. Your box will be shipped in July so you may receive it in August.
For the first box, Sibylline kindly accepted to collaborate with us. We wanted to go with a « Cosmos » themed box, which is something that keeps popping up in her illustrations. She is one of my favorite artists and I am very happy she accepted to be part of this crazy adventure ! If you don’t know her work yet, Sibylline is a freelance illustrator from France, she is very talented, draws women perfectly and portrays them with poetry and softness.  
You can find her here : Instagram // Twitter // Patreon  
Posts from Sibylline's instagram
The Cosmos themed box was like an evidence when we talked to Sibylline about the project. We knew right away we could make interesting and fun products with it. It is very important to us to establish a dialogue with the artists to create every boxes’ content, and want to know what they want to see in their box. We talked a lot with Sibylline and she wanted to include a coloring book for this first box, which is something she has always thought about, but wouldn’t have done herself. 
6 postcards + 6 kraft envelopes
A coloring book + a coloring pencils set (10 drawings)
An A5 sketchbook (32 pages)
An exclusive enamel pin (visual coming soon)
An A6 sticker sheet (visual coming soon)
A zine about the featured artist  
  If you want to help us but you can't afford any of the rewards, please feel free to share our Kickstarter page !
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are aware that this project is ambitious. This is something we always wanted to do so we will do our best to make you and the artists happy ! We are a team and if this project ever works, we know we can count on each other. We will do our best to make sure your box arrives on time. However, if we have a problem with one of our manufacturer, we will take the time to figure out how to solve it as soon as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Bears vs Babies is a card game where you build handsome, incredible monsters who go to war with horrible, awful babies. 
It was created by the same people who made Exploding Kittens: Elan Lee (Xbox, ARGs) and Matthew Inman (The Oatmeal). The game takes a few minutes to learn, it's kid-friendly, and each round takes about 20 minutes to play.
(Stretch Goals here!)
    THE ORIGIN STORY
                                   I’ve always wanted to make a card game. A few years ago, I started working on a game based on my comic, The Oatmeal, where you connect heads, torsos, arms, and legs to create a variety of monsters based on characters from my comic, such as the Bear-O-Dactyl. The original version of this game was doodled onto paper cutouts, and had no functioning game mechanic other than “build funny-looking things.” 
The very first version of the Oatmeal card game.
Two years ago I met Elan Lee, and he showed me a prototype of a game called “BombSquad,” which we renamed to Exploding Kittens. After Exploding Kittens launched, my creature-building game got put on hold.
After the dust from Exploding Kittens eventually settled, I asked Elan to help with the design of my monster-building game. I didn’t want this to be one of those games where you're trying to "out-comedy" one another; I wanted it to be more of a deck-building game, such as Dominion or Hearthstone, but without all the complexity. I wanted a monster-building game you could easily play at a party.
 Up until this point, my version of the game had a big problem:  when you played, you were on autopilot. You had no decisions to make and usually one correct action to perform on every turn.  Elan has been designing physical and digital games for most of his career (he invented the genre of alternate reality games, and was formerly the creative director of the Xbox), so he put his gargantuan puzzle-solving brain to work and added a layer of much-needed complexity to the game.  He tinkered a bunch and established the basic rules of conflict, construction, and the escalation mechanic that would define the core gameplay. The tricky part was keeping this simple enough to be a party game, but complicated enough to allow for depth and strategy. It’s easy to fall into two bad categories when designing tabletop games: either they’re easy to learn but completely random, or they’re very strategic but mind-numbingly boring. You have to walk a very thin line between the two. I think with Bears vs Babies we did that.
Our battle-hardened "Sharpie Deck"
After months of pestering everyone we knew to play the game with us and tweaking the rules bit by bit, we finally got it to the point where our friends pestered us to play, instead of vice versa. And that eventually brought us here, to Kickstarter, where we’re now pestering the whole internet to play with us.
And so here we are. 
Let the bear hugs and baby burping begin.
-Matt and Elan
----------
   ----------
                                                                                 Press Inquiries
Email: info@bearsvsbabies.com
----------
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Remember that one time two years ago when we built Exploding Kittens and shipped everything we promised to you ON TIME?

Seems like a pretty keen idea to try that again. We're going to use the same great folks at Ad Magic to print the game, and the same incredible team at Blackbox to get it over to you once it's printed.

The biggest risk is really just getting cocky. We know this won't be easy, and we know how hard we're going to have to work to get you your game in the timeframe we promised it.

Just like last time, we're going to keep things basic. We're not going to offer t-shirts, or posters, or anything else that will get in the way of us delivering the game to you as promised. We're keeping it as simple as possible: support our project and in return we'll send you the playable game.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Are you technically a grownup but don't feel like it?
Pretending to Grownup is a casual card game with 100 unique cards featuring common grownup situations. You can face these problems or use the power of your imagination to bend the rules.
Throughout the game you'll see which player is the most grownup by using the only three resources at a Grownup's disposal: time, money and energy.
However you can get a Unipegasaurus card which helps you bend the rules of being a grownup by using your imagination. (Uni-pega-saur-us)
All of the artwork is done by Megan McKay of webcomic Doodle for Food. When I discovered this comic I just fell in love with the likeable art style and wanted to base a game around it. When I thought of the Grownup hook, I contacted Megan and the game came together beautifully.
We also have some stretch goal cards being done by some of the absolute best webcomic talent out there. You'll likely recognize some of the comics below.
Have fun checking out the campaign while I go eat a whole box of cookies.
- Jason "Anarchy"
3 out of 100 original cards featuring grownup situations
  Optional: You can combine two decks and have up to eight players!
    On your turn you can "Take on More Responsibilities" by drawing two cards or you can challenge another player to see who's more grownup.
  You can challenge the player to your right by choosing a card and picking either the time, money or energy score to challenge.
  Declare:“I have more time” “I have more money” or “I have more energy”. If that player chooses to play a card, the player to THEIR right also has the option to challenge, which can set up combos for bigger scores.
  If a challenge occurs, all players reveal their score at the same time to see who wins. The winning player keeps all played cards as points. First to 12 points wins!
If nobody challenges the initial grownup card, that player keeps it as a point without the other players knowing the value. This adds a fun bluffing mechanic to the game!
A unipegasaurus is part unicorn, part pegasus and part dinosaur. This was an original creation of Megan's that was added to the game to represent imagination.
You can play these cards to bend the rules of the game (uni-pega-saur-us)
  This adorable guy is featured on 15 of the 100 cards getting into a bit of mischief. CUTENESS OVERLOAD!
   Click the image to see the comic!
                                                                        It's a Drinking Game and a Tabletop RPG! You're on an adventure but when your hero dies you must chug your drink in real life! Click for more info
   A simple RPG adventure for 1-4 players. Instead of being funny because it's loud and obnoxious, Haiku Warrior is funny because it's quiet and introspective and told entirely through haiku! Click for more info
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always a few things that could slow things down but I've been designing and publishing games for five years now and am definitely not figuring everything out for the first time.

The games are being printed with an established company and there is a nice safety bubble of time in place.

I'm a professional and my rep is on the line if I don't keep backers happy. I make games because they're great fun and I want everyone to have a really positive experience!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
We are cooking up a new album: Own It. We need you to help bring it out to the world!
STORY OF THE NEW ALBUM
The sound of this album crosses from dreamy bossanova up to the most upbeat rocknroll we've ever made. There are hooky guitar leads, and back & forth vocals between me (Keith), Madeline, Rebecca and Kendra. 
We started tracking right when we got home from our Brazil tour in December. Now we've built up every song with layered harmonies, melodic basslines and driving live drums.
After a lot of upheaval in the last year--the departure of two dear band members foremost--for us, this music reaches a new level of intimacy and courage. The album has aspiring ecosocialist anthems, sinewy love songs, a club jam for dancing in your bedroom, and a groovy party song about getting social anxiety at parties. I think we've made a set of songs far more personal, powerful and honest than we ever have.
Own It will have eleven tracks, all new originals. It's the first album I've ever made that I like to listen to on repeat. Finally, I have become a true rock n' roll narcissist.
Face up to your true self and find catharsis! Own It! Put a nail in capitalism's coffin! Own It! Destroy neoliberal malaise, inside and out! Own It!
HOW WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT
Your support will help us:
press the album to vinyl and CDs
promote the album with a fabulous publicity campaign
make 2 new music videos (inc. one planned for filming in Brazil!)
hit the road on a two-month tour this Oct.-Dec., across the US and Canada (and hopefully beyond ;), 23 cities and counting...
(bassist Kendra & me loosening up at a rest stop on tour)
We want to do this album as a self-release in large part because we feel we can count on you, dear community of T&W listeners, to help us own this album ourselves. Releasing with a label usually means you don't earn a cent on selling/streaming your album until you've paid back the label's expenses, usually at least a year after the release. 
If we own this album ourselves, we'll get sustained by it right away, meaning we can focus on live shows and making new songs. Even better, owning this album ourselves means we get to release it on the timeline we want--which means new music sooner for you.
Thank you for anything you can offer to support, and thank you for being a part of making this music come to life.  Let's own it together.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We plan to officially release the album on October 7. A week before that, we plan to send it digitally and ship it physically to all our Kickstarter supporters. 

Crazy things can happen to timelines in the music biz, but everything is lined up solid for that right now.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Hand-drawn Lyrics/Art + album + tote
support.descp: Pick your favorite T&W song and favorite shape: Keith will hand draw you a one-of-a-kind poster with the lyrics and "bauhaus-y" art, in archival ink on 96g paper. For whatever room you keep it in, will confer good luck and aesthetic harmony for 1 year minimum. By request, will include tabs/chords to play the song. Also includes signed album (vinyl or CD), download code and tote.

support.title: Dinner Date with Trails and Ways
support.descp: The band will take you plus one out for dinner before our show, in any of our tour cities for our Oct-Dec tour. We will share the deep secrets of our songs, as we twirl spaghetti in the candlelight. And you get a signed album, vinyl or CD, download, and tote

support.title: Private House Show
support.descp: We will rock out for you and friends at your house. We tour all around the US/Canada in Oct-Dec, and we can do this as long as you're within an hour or so off our tour route. May need to be semi-acoustic, depending on the situation. Write us to figure it out; we promise a good time. And you get the album/download/tote combo too.

support.title: Custom Cover Song
support.descp: You pick a song, we'll record it in full band T&W style. You can pick anything, though discretion is advised, results may vary if you send us a Tool song. Mozart and Coltrane: also hard. We'll also send you a signed CD/vinyl and tote bag.

updates.update_content:
We're sharing a new song, called "Get Loud". On it we rock out about vanity, catharsis, and support groups; it feels cathartic to share it with you all.
Other good update: we've cruised past the 50% mark to fund the release of the new album. YOU RULE.

project_data.project_name: Trails and Ways - Own It | new full-length album

campaign.story:
About Our Project:
We are making our first full length album!!! It will have 10 original songs and one cover of a Disney song! It won't just be us, we have other musicians that will be featured on the album for a really full sound and will have the album engineered, mixed and mastered by some amazing professionals. 
Cheez-its are the best snack when recording
The album is entitled Little Sister, named after one of our original songs. We both have older siblings and the song is dedicated to them and the effect they have had on our lives and our goals.
Rachel, Khris (bass) & Zackary (engineer) at the studio
The plan is to get the album out in the right hands, so we will have a big promotion and marketing campaign for it. That's why we are starting our very first Kickstarter! $5500 is the bare minimum we need to get the album done. However, the more we make, the better we can make it and the more people we can reach (our BIG goal is $8,500). 
Zackary & Madison
We’re very excited to embark on this incredible journey. We’re so close and we’ve worked so hard. This year we are making our dreams a reality and with your help, we will get there! Thank you guys so much for your support!
About Rachel and Madison:
Rachel began singing at the age of two. No joke. She took her talents to the stage imediately by being a part of a performing arts group. Since then she's done over a 1,000 shows. With dancing and acting under her belt, she decided to learn how to write her own songs at the age of 9. With help from her musically talented dad, she learned music theory, guitar and piano. She began writing and performing her own material all across Los Angeles. She also started a Youtube channel and that got a lot of attention from new viewers and fans. She met Madison in 2011 and started Color Me Home with her.
Madison was always singing and dancing as a little girl. When she was 10, she told her dad that she wanted to learn how to write her own songs. Her words were, “I want to be able to write my own songs. Britney Spears just sings her songs, but I want to sing and write them both!” So her dad told her that you have to learn an instrument and write lyrics. And that’s when the piano came into her life. Her teenage years consisted of writing countless number of songs while learning jazz piano from legend, Arlette McCoy-Budwig. She also played all over Los Angeles and had her own band before meeting Rachel in 2011 and started a duo with her.
About Color Me Home:
Color Me Home began in 2011 when Madison asked Rachel to write a song with her. Acquaintances at the time, Rachel decided to give it a shot. The first song they wrote together was called “The Chase”, which is actually the first song off their EP “Over the Moon.” Finding out that they had a lot in common, they met up again... and again. They decided to form a duo and the fireworks exploded! They wrote more songs together and showed each other their solo songs too. That was the start of their first EP, which they made completely on their own, from start to finish. They released the EP in 2013 and played a lot of shows week after week in Los Angeles; from cafés and well known venues to street performing on 3rd Street Promenade in Santa Monica. 
In the last year, they focused on writing songs and putting out quality YouTube videos, taking suggestions from fans of covers they wanted to hear (check them out). Now they are working on their first full length album, which will be released this year! They have already started recording!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have pretty much everything nailed down. This has been 5 years in the making, so if anything comes up I know the both of us are prepared and can make it go right. 

We have already started the recording process and factored in unexpected expenses. 

The more money we raise the better and faster our album release will be.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
